It provides a broad understanding of international business, including management, marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship, with a strong focus on global markets and cross-cultural management. page_content.program: MSc in Management of Energy Transitions
page_content.program_description: This MSc equips students with the skills and knowledge demanded by the energy sector, including utilities, renewable energy firms, and governmental bodies. The curriculum covers a broad range of topics, such as offshore wind, interconnections, and energy supply chains. Students explore diverse energy solutions—including wind, solar, nuclear, fossil fuels, and hydrogen technologies—gaining a comprehensive understanding of their technical principles, challenges, and opportunities. Additionally, they study climate finance, carbon markets, and critical raw materials management, with a strong emphasis on energy efficiency to cultivate the strategic thinking essential for driving the energy transition. Graduates can pursue roles such as energy auditor, energy consultant, market analyst, energy manager, climate and carbon manager, energy analyst, or public affairs manager.

This program will enable students to become responsible leaders ready to drive change and make a difference in organizations. They will learn to evaluate transformations in the business environment, and organizational readiness for change across all functions, design transformations through innovative methods and practical experience to develop sustainable solutions at relevant scales and implement transformations by leading autonomous projects in a cross-functional team to make a positive impact and increase organization’s competitiveness.

Students will gain expertise in data science techniques, AI technologies, and their applications in business.

It aims to equip students with a strong foundation in general management and specialized knowledge in areas such as new venture creation, lifestyle hospitality management, brand design, and innovation management. The curriculum covers key subjects such as marketing, operations management, strategy, finance, and project management, while also emphasizing technological integration in hospitality. Graduates can pursue roles such as hotel general manager, project manager (for hotel openings, F&B concepts, brand development, etc.), corporate team leader (in marketing, HR, etc.), hotel sales or events manager, revenue manager, guest relations manager, and consultant for the hotel industry.

The courses covers essential concepts and tools in big data analytics. They learn how to collect, analyze, and interpret large datasets to make informed business decisions. Students have the opportunity to tailor their studies through various specializations or majors. They can study abroad, participate in international business projects, and engage with a diverse cohort of students and faculty.

The program delves into the principles and practices of building and managing strong brands. Students learn about brand positioning, brand equity, and brand development strategies. The curriculum emphasizes how to create compelling brand narratives and drive brand value.

It covers essential aspects of business development, including strategy formulation, market analysis, partnership building, and sales strategy. Students learn how to identify new business opportunities, develop strategic partnerships, and manage business growth initiatives.

is designed to provide students with advanced skills and knowledge in strategic management and consulting. page_content.program: MSc in Corporate Finance and Investment Banking

page_content.program_description: The MSc in Data Science for Marketing at Audencia Business School is designed to bridge the gap between data science and marketing. Students gain a thorough understanding of data science principles and techniques, including data collection, data cleaning, statistical analysis, and predictive modeling. The program emphasizes how these techniques can be applied to marketing challenges.

page_content.program: MSc in Digital Business & Data Management
page_content.program_description: This program aims to prepare students for the evolving landscape of digital business and data management. It focuses on integrating digital transformation strategies with robust data management practices, equipping students with the skills needed to drive business innovation and manage digital data effectively. Students gain expertise in managing and analyzing data. The curriculum includes training in data collection, data analysis, data visualization, and the use of data management tools and platforms. The focus is on how to use data to inform business decisions and strategies.

The MSc in Digital Marketing at Audencia Business School is designed to provide students with advanced knowledge and practical skills in the field of digital marketing.  covers key aspects of digital marketing, including strategy development, campaign management, and digital channels. Students gain hands-on experience with digital marketing tools and platforms. This includes training in search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), social media marketing, content marketing, and email marketing.

page_content.program: MSc in Entrepreneurship & Innovation for Impact
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to develop leaders who can launch and manage startups, as well as drive innovative solutions within established organizations with a focus on sustainability and societal benefit. The curriculum covers the fundamentals of starting and running new ventures. Students learn about business creation, funding strategies, venture development, and scaling startups. It includes practical insights into entrepreneurial processes and challenges.

page_content.program: MSc in Financial Analysis and Investment Management
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of financial analysis, investment strategies, and portfolio management. It prepares students for careers in finance by equipping them with the technical skills and analytical tools required to make informed financial decisions and manage investments effectively. Students gain expertise in managing investment portfolios, including asset allocation, risk management, and investment strategy development. The curriculum includes training on various investment vehicles such as equities, bonds, and alternative investments.

page_content.program: MSc in Financial Markets and Sustainable Investments
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Financial Markets and Sustainable Investments at Audencia Business School is designed to prepare students for careers in finance with a focus on sustainable investment practices and the integration of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) criteria into financial decision-making. The program covers the fundamentals of financial markets, including market structures, instruments, and trading strategies. Students gain a thorough understanding of how financial markets operate and how various financial products are valued and traded.

It covers key aspects of managing agricultural businesses, including production, supply chain management, and market analysis. Students gain insights into the food industry, including food production, distribution, and marketing. The curriculum addresses topics such as food safety, quality management, and consumer behavior in the food sector.

The MSc in International Management & Business at Audencia Business School is designed to prepare students for global leadership roles by providing a comprehensive understanding of international business practices, cross-cultural management, and global strategy. The program includes an international dimension, preparing students to work effectively in various global markets and understand international business regulations and practices.

page_content.program: MSc in Management for Sustainable Business

Students learn about sustainable business models, corporate social responsibility (CSR), and ethical management.

They also gain expertise in analyzing and interpreting performance data to support decision-making and drive improvements.

page_content.program: Mastère spécialisé® (MS) Stratégies Financières et Investissements Responsables
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on financial strategies and responsible investing. It is tailored for professionals and recent graduates who wish to specialize in financial management, investment strategies, and sustainable finance. The curriculum covers a range of topics related to financial strategy, investment management, and responsible investing. Graduates are prepared for roles in financial management, investment banking, asset management, and sustainability consulting.

The MBS Bachelor’s programme gives access to a wide range of positions in all sectors of activity or enables students to continue their studies at Master’s level. It covers essential business disciplines such as marketing, finance, management, and economics. By joining this Bachelor, students have access to a training program that is perfectly suited to the needs of companies, both nationally and internationally. MBS’s Bqchelor leads to the award of the Diplôme en Management International des Affaires – DMIA (Diploma in International Business Management) in the framework of the European Higher Education Area (EHEA), delivered under the authority of the French Ministry of Higher Education and Research.

MBS Grande Ecole Program offers professional experience, international immersion and a final year with a double degree, as well as the possibility of a sandwich course from the first year. It provides students a high level of employability in a wide range of managerial positions in all business sectors in France and abroad. It aims to develop well-rounded business leaders with a global perspective, strategic thinking, and the ability to adapt to dynamic business environments.

year_2.specialization: Master Engineering & Management x EPF Montpellier
All Masters of Science are available

page_content.program_description: The MSc in Digital Marketing & Omnichannel Strategy at Montpellier Business School (MBS) is a specialized graduate program designed to equip students with advanced skills and knowledge in digital marketing and integrated omnichannel strategies. Graduates can pursue roles such as: digital marketing specialist, CEM/CXM specialist, marketing manager, web campaign specialist, business analyst, marketing and communications consultant, brand and client experience designer and e-commerce manager.

page_content.program: MSc Luxury Marketing in a sustainable world
page_content.program_description: This MSc is a specialized program that aims to prepare and train future responsible leaders in luxury marketing. Studying luxury marketing in France, home to famous luxury brands (e.g., Hermes, Louis Vuitton, Dior, and Chanel), is a great choice for those aspiring to learn more about French excellence and how to market luxury products in a sustainable world. Graduates are prepared for a variety of roles in the luxury sector, including: luxury brand manager, luxury goods product manager, luxury retail merchandiser, luxury marketing communications & public relations manager, etc.

This MSc is tailored to provide students first-class levels of knowledge, tools and skills that make them highly attractive to potential international employers operating in multinational arenas. They will understand the global context of business. The curriculum focuses on latest trends, global supply chain management, international entrepreneurship, or international business law.

This  program covers essential topics such as supply chain strategy, logistics management, operations management, procurement, and inventory management. Students explore advanced topics like supply chain analytics, risk management, sustainable supply chains, and global supply chain management. They are highly expected to play the most important role in the following sectors: consulting, automotive, construction, pharmaceutical, electronics, cosmetics, industry (oil and gas, chemicals…), humanitarian sector, banking and consumer goods.

page_content.program: MSc Big Data & Artificial Intelligence for Business
page_content.program_description: This MSc in Big Data and Artificial intelligence aims to prepare ready managers, data scientists and leaders for digital enterprises of the future. By choosing this program, students will gain advanced skills in data analysis and AI technologies tailored for business applications. They are offered opportunities for internships, workshops, and networking with industry professionals to gain practical experience and insights.

This program delves into how organizations can leverage digital technologies to innovate, streamline processes, and enhance their business models. It also covers consulting methodologies, including how to assess organizational needs, design solutions, and implement strategies for digital change. The curriculum includes digital strategy, change management, business analytics, IT management, and consulting techniques. Students will have opportunities to engage with industry professionals through workshops, guest lectures, and networking events.

page_content.program: MSc Global Finance in a Sustainable World
page_content.program_description: MSc Global Finance in a Sustainable World covers advanced financial concepts and practices on a global scale, including financial markets, investment strategies, and risk management. It integrates sustainability principles into financial decision-making, exploring how financial practices can support sustainable development goals and address environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues.

This program aims to equip students with advanced skills and methodologies for effectively leading and managing complex projects. They learn advanced project management methodologies, tools, and techniques necessary for navigating complex project environments. Graduates are well-prepared for senior roles in project management, including positions such as project managers, program managers, project consultants, and roles in project management offices (PMOs) or consultancy firms. They can work across various industries such as construction, IT, engineering, and business services.

This program is designed to equip students with a broad understanding of international business practices and management principles. It covers fundamental areas such as international business strategy, marketing, finance, and economics. It also includes courses in management, organizational behavior, and business law. Students are prepared for successfully entering the business world through the various experiences of obtaining a double-degree abroad, and taking on internships during each year of the program.

page_content.program: Bachelor in Digital Marketing & E-Commerce Management
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor covers all aspects of digital marketing and e-commerce, highly professionalized with an international dimension from the first year. It allows students to acquire all the technical skills, digital culture, and essential certifications to thrive in the fields of digital marketing and e-commerce. The program also offers them the opportunity to immerse in French culture while benefiting from the business environment in France, known for its innovation in digital and e-commerce sectors.

The Master in Management at ESC Clermont Business School is a 2-year program designed to prepare students for leadership roles in various business contexts in France, Europe or world-wide. Students are offered the opportunity to from more than 70 specializations in France and around the world and to accumulate majors, minors or double degrees.

year_2.specialization: All Masters of Science are available
Ingénierie Financière et Innovation en Finance
Management des Etablissements Sanitaires et Sociaux
Mobility: Business Models and Vehicles for the Future

page_content.program_description: The MSc – Master of Science in Corporate Finance & Fintech at ESC Clermont Business School is a specialized program designed to address the evolving needs of the finance sector, with a particular emphasis on the intersection of traditional finance and emerging financial technologies. Students are offered the portfolio of technical and business skills essential to pass the CFA certification (Chartered Financial Analyst), which is the most recognized financial certification in the world.

MSc of Science International Commerce & Digital Marketing is designed to prepare students for careers in the global marketplace with a focus on international commerce and the rapidly evolving field of digital marketing. The curriculum focuses on topics such as digital marketing, international commerce & business, management & communication skills, career development & counseling, etc. The program also prepares students for roles in international trade, brand management, and global marketing strategy.

This MSc aims to provide a thorough understanding of project management principles and practices, preparing students to handle complex projects and lead project teams in various organizational contexts. Students may also study advanced topics such as agile project management, project portfolio management, and project governance. The program emphasizes also leadership skills and effective communication, crucial for managing diverse teams and stakeholders.

This program encourages students to acquire the concepts, methods and tools essential to becoming professionals in the field of supply chain management, which offer numerous opportunities in all sectors of activity and whatever the size of the company. It aims to develop experts who can effectively manage and optimize the flow of goods, services, and information across the supply chain.

page_content.program: Mastère spécialisé® (MS) Gestion des Ressources Humaines et Innovation Managériale
page_content.program_description: This program responds to a strong societal demand from organizations, as well as the academic world, from both students and scholars alike. It is a forward-thinking program aimed at equipping students with the knowledge and skills necessary to develop strategies and design solutions that address environmental and societal challenges in the context of the Anthropocene.

This MSc is tailored to respond to the digitalization of companies and the growing importance of data in management and decision-making by training future Business Intelligence experts. It provides a comprehensive understanding of business intelligence (BI) and analytics, preparing students to manage and analyze data effectively to support strategic business decisions. Students will learn about various BI tools and platforms.

This program trains students to work in a variety of corporate contexts, from small and medium-sized businesses to multinationals and start-ups. They are offered cross-disciplinary skills that enable them to operate according to the most up-to-date professional standards, and those most relevant to corporate challenges: innovation, business development, digital transformation and communication. The program attracts an international student body and emphasizes global business practices, providing a diverse and global learning environment.

The SCBS International BBA is aimed at students who wish to develop a global outlook and management skills essential for thriving in an international business environment. Graduates will be able to work in all types of organizations implementing the principles of responsible management : NGOS, international companies, international organizations and national export companies. Each year, courses focuses on a new region of the world and students develop their management skills.

This pioneering program is tailored to equip students with advanced management skills and prepare them for leadership roles in various industries. It guarantees a professional success by a deep understanding of management principles, strategic thinking, and global business practices. Through the Master’s degree, students will be able to choose from 5 specialization paths to become experts in their preferred field.

This MSc is designed to train agile entrepreneurs, aware of business ethics and multiculturalism. It provides a strong foundation in entrepreneurial skills, including how to start and grow a business, manage startups, and navigate the challenges of entrepreneurship. SCBS is known for its commitment to high-quality education and practical, industry-relevant training, which adds value to the MSc program.  Graduates are well-prepared for roles in startups, innovation departments within large companies, and consultancy positions focused on creativity and entrepreneurship.

is a specialized undergraduate program designed to prepare students for careers in the tourism industry. The curriculum focuses on tourism management, hospitality and event management, marketing and sales in tourism, sustainable tourism, etc. It often includes internships with tourism businesses, allowing students to gain hands-on experience and industry connections. They have the option to focus on specific areas within tourism sector.

year_3.specialization: Hospitality et stratégies expérientielles appliquées au tourisme
Hospitality et stratégies expérientielles appliquées au tourisme
Business developement et stratégies digitales appliquées au tourisme

page_content.program: Programme Grande École – spécialisation Innovation in Tourism
page_content.program_description: The Programme Grande École with a specialization in Innovation in Tourism is a high-level, advanced program aimed at students who are looking to delve into the cutting-edge aspects of the tourism industry. It is designed to cultivate leaders and innovators who can drive change and develop new solutions in tourism. Students learn about advanced principles of management and leadership in tourism., strategic planning and organizational behavior. he curriculum covers also the latest trends in technology and their applications in tourism, such as digital transformation, smart tourism, and big data.

Assistant designer web is a specialized training program designed for individuals looking to enter or advance in the field of web design. It focuses on equipping students with the skills and knowledge needed to create and manage visually appealing, user-friendly, and functional websites. They learn the basics of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design, ensuring that websites are intuitive and engaging.

This program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive education in graphic design. It provides techniques for creating hand-drawn and digital illustrations to enhance design projects. Students will have hands-on projects that simulate real-world design challenges, including branding, advertising, editorial design, and more.

page_content.program: Formation designer concepteur de projet – design global
page_content.program_description: Designer concepteur de projet – design global is a high-level, five-year program that focuses on comprehensive design project development. This advanced degree is aimed at preparing students to tackle complex design challenges. Students learn how to create innovative design concepts and solutions, from initial idea through to final execution. Graduates can pursue various advanced roles, including: design director, strategic designer, product manager, etc.

SKEMA's  Global BBA offers students practical business knowledge, an innovative curriculum, and an internationally immersive experience. With campuses in 5 different countries, students receive a truly global business education. Students can choose from various majors or specializations based on their interests, such as International Business, Marketing, Finance, or Entrepreneurship.

The Master in Management Grande École program at SKEMA Business School is a prestigious and highly-regarded graduate program designed to provide advanced business education with a strong emphasis on management, leadership, and global business practices. Students can choose from various specializations or tracks based on their career interests. The program integrates internships to provide hands-on experience and facilitate career entry.

year_1.specialization: Marketing numérique et analyse de données

year_2.specialization: All Masters of Science are available
Gestion de projet et chaîne d'approvisionnement
Marketing numérique et analyse de données
