page_content.program: MSc Auditing, Management Accounting & Information Systems
page_content.program_description: This program is tailored to equip students with an in-depth understanding of auditing, management control and information systems. It aims to give students a range of knowledge, skills and the ability to use them in a variety of operational and entrepreneurial situations to become responsible managers. The curriculum focuses on how digital transformation is changing the finance function by using artificial intelligence (AI) to improve performance through technologies such as robotic process automation (RPA) and chatbots. It encourages students to develop their individual managerial and research capabilities to make a difference for their companies.

This program integrates business consulting practices with advanced techniques in data analysis and decision intelligence. It typically covers areas such as business strategy, consulting methodologies, decision-making frameworks, data analytics, and artificial intelligence. Students learn how to apply these concepts and work on consulting projects, often in collaboration with real businesses.

This MSc is designed to provide advanced knowledge and skills in managing corporate finances. The program focuses on equipping students with a deep understanding of financial management principles, strategic financial decision-making, and the analytical tools needed to navigate the complexities of corporate finance.

This MSc was ranked among the top 10 entrepreneurial programs (Forbes 2020). It is tailored for individuals who aspire to become leaders in creating and managing new ventures or driving innovation within existing organizations. Students learn how to launch and develop an innovative business with start-up founders and corporate entrepreneurs. The courses include core subjects such as entrepreneurship theory, innovation management, business model design, venture creation, and strategic management.

This program aims to train students to make an immediate impact in their first job. It provides advanced knowledge and practical skills in financial markets, investment strategies, and portfolio management. The curriculum encourages students to have the tools and insights needed to excel in the finance industry, particularly in roles related to financial analysis, asset management, and investment banking. It is taught by experts who have solid academic backgrounds and professional experience in industry.

The MSc in International Business at SKEMA Business School is designed to prepare students for the complexities of managing and leading in a global business environment. The curriculum covers strategies for entering and operating in international markets, including market analysis and competitive positioning. Students often participate in projects with a global focus, providing practical experience in managing international business challenges.

page_content.program: MSc International Human Resources & Performance Management
page_content.program_description: This program emphasizes the strategic role of HR in enhancing organizational performance across diverse and international settings. It highlights also the low code/no-code approach to technology and digital transformation. Students have all the opportunities to work on projects or internships with multinational companies, providing practical experience and insights into international HR practices.

This MSc offers several distinct advantages for students aiming to excel in the global marketplace. It covers advanced concepts in international marketing, including market research, digital marketing, and brand management across diverse global markets. Companies contribute regularly to courses (Frost & Sullivan, Procter & Gamble, IBM, Valeo, Kantar, L’Oréal,...), thus providing a strong sense of operational realism and insight into their own business. Students can also customize their course of study by choosing campus-specific electives.

This MSc is designed for those aiming to build a career in the luxury and fashion industries. It equips students with skills related to new product development, marketing, strategic brand management and communications delivery. SKEMA Business School is well-regarded for its business programs and has a strong reputation in the field of luxury and fashion management. Students also have access to experienced fashion and luxury specialists.

page_content.program: MSc Project Management for Business Development
page_content.program_description: This program blends project management principles with business development strategies, offering a comprehensive education that covers both technical project management skills and strategic business growth. Students are offered training focused on IPMA ICB internationally recognized competencies and the curriculum highlights topics such as communication, problem-solving, strategic thinking, and collaborative leadership.

This program integrates sustainable finance and fintech, covering both the principles of sustainable investment and the latest technological innovations in financial services. It aims to develop area of traditional financial theory with additional skills ESG, CSR, impact investment and Fintech. Graduates are prepared for a range of roles in sustainable finance and fintech, such as ESG analyst, fintech consultant, financial technology manager, and sustainable investment strategist.

The MSc Sport, Event & Hospitality Management at SKEMA Business School is a specialized graduate program designed for individuals looking to pursue careers in the sports, events, and hospitality industries. This program combines advanced management education with practical experience, preparing students to excel in these dynamic and interconnected sectors. Students learn about topics such as sports marketing, event management, and the business of sports, covering everything from professional sports organizations to amateur sports events.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® (MS) Manager des Projets et Programmes​
page_content.program_description: This MS offers several compelling advantages for those looking to advance their careers in project and program management. offers an in-depth curriculum that covers both fundamental project management techniques and advanced program management strategies. This comprehensive approach ensures students are well-equipped to handle complex projects and programs. They have  opportunities to work on live projects with industry partners, which provide valuable experience and insights into current practices and challenges in project management.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® (MS) Chef de Projet Intelligence Artificielle
page_content.program_description: This program combines AI technology with project management principles. It covers the basics of artificial intelligence, including machine learning, deep learning, and data science. Students will gain a deep understanding of AI applications while learning how to manage projects involving these advanced technologies.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® (MS) Expert en Contrôle de Gestion, Audit et Système d'Information
page_content.program_description: This program offers several significant advantages, particularly for those are interested in a career that integrates financial control, auditing, and information systems management. It develop proficiency in advanced auditing techniques, financial control tools, and information systems management, equipping students with the skills needed to excel in these fields.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® (MS) Manager de la Chaîne Logistique et Achats
page_content.program_description: This program provides a deep dive into both logistics and procurement, covering essential aspects of supply chain management. This includes the optimization of supply chain processes, strategic procurement, and the management of supplier relationships. Students learn how enhance their ability to lead teams, manage complex supply chain operations, and develop strategic procurement plans.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® (MS) Manager en Gestion de Patrimoine Financier
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to equip students with the expertise needed to manage and grow high-net-worth individuals' and institutions' financial assets. It combines advanced financial knowledge with practical skills in wealth management, preparing students for careers in a highly competitive field. Students learn how to effectively communicate with and manage high-net-worth clients, understanding their needs and tailoring financial solutions to meet those needs.

This program is designed to prepare students for managerial roles in various business sectors. It focuses on developing both theoretical knowledge and practical skills necessary for overseeing and managing specific business activities. The courses cover essential topics such as management principles, marketing, finance, human resources, and operational management. Students learn about customer relationship management and the importance of understanding customer needs to drive business success.  They can pursue a variety of roles such as project manager, team leader, or business development manager, with opportunities to advance into higher management positions.

The Bachelor in Business Administration is a well-rounded program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed for successful careers in the global business environment. It covers key business areas such as finance, marketing, management, and entrepreneurship, etc. It integrates both French and American educational approaches and the courses are taught in English, catering to an international audience.

page_content.program: Diplôme de Comptabilité et de Gestion DCG
page_content.program_description: Diplôme de Comptabilité et de Gestion (DCG) at IGEFI is a comprehensive training course focused on accounting and management. The program covers a range of subjects including financial accounting, management accounting, taxation, law, and business management. It employs a mix of theoretical lectures, practical workshops, and interactive sessions to enhance learning.  Students often engage in internships and they are prepared to pursue various career paths, including roles in accounting firms, corporate finance, auditing, and consulting. The program also prepares students for further studies in accounting and finance.

This program focuses on equipping students with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills essential for managing financial activities within organizations. It  offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers key areas such as: financial accounting, management accounting, financial analysis, taxation, budgeting and forecasting, corporate finance and investment analysis, etc. It highlights analytical and critical thinking, communication and presentation skills, teamwork and collaboration, and so on.

page_content.program: MBA Direction Administrative et Financière DAF
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on equipping students with advanced skills in financial management, administration, and strategic decision-making. It is ideal for professionals aiming to enhance their leadership capabilities in finance and administration, particularly those looking to advance into senior management roles. Graduates often pursue roles such as financial manager, chief financial officer (CFO), or finance consultant, with opportunities in various sectors.

The Bachelor in Marketing & Business at IIDRAC Business School is designed to provide students with a comprehensive foundation in marketing principles and business strategies. It typically combines theoretical knowledge with practical experience, equipping them with skills in areas such as market research, digital marketing, consumer behavior, and strategic management. It offers a blend of core business subjects and specialized marketing courses, often covering topics like branding, social media marketing, and sales techniques.

Programme Grande École at ICARD Business School is a highly regarded program designed for students aiming for a successful career in business.It provides a strong foundation in core business areas while allowing for specialization, ensuring students gain both breadth and depth of knowledge. They also have the opportunities for study abroad and internships in global markets that help them develop a multicultural perspective, which is essential in today’s business world.

This program is designed for professionals looking to deepen their expertise in business management, particularly in areas like sales, marketing, and project management. It covers essential topics such as strategic management, business development, negotiation techniques, and financial analysis, tailored for the business engineering field.

This program focuses on equipping students with advanced skills in marketing strategies, digital business practices, and the integration of artificial intelligence in marketing. It covers essential topics such as digital marketing, e-commerce strategies, data analytics, consumer behavior, and the application of AI in marketing. The curriculum emphasizes the latest trends and technologies in the digital landscape, preparing students to navigate the rapidly evolving marketing environment.

This MBA is designed for professionals seeking to enhance their expertise in procurement and supply chain management. It covers critical topics such as supply chain strategy, procurement management, logistics, inventory control, and sustainability in supply chains. Graduates of this program are well-prepared for roles such as supply chain manager, procurement officer, logistics coordinator, and other leadership positions within the sector.

page_content.program: MBA Digital Business et Transformation des Organisations
page_content.program_description: This program aims to provide students with the skills and knowledge necessary to drive digital transformation in various organizations. The curriculum focuses on essential topics such as digital strategy, change management, innovation, data analytics, and the impact of emerging technologies on business processes. Student are well-prepared for leadership roles in digital strategy, business transformation, and innovation management across various sectors.

This program is tailored to prepare students for careers in commercial management and operations. The curriculum covers essential topics such as sales techniques, customer relationship management, marketing strategies, and business operations. It provides training in  negotiation techniques and digital marketing, preparing students for various roles in the commercial sector.

page_content.program: BTS Négociation et Digitalisation de la Relation Client (NDRC)
page_content.program_description: This BTS aims to provide students with the skills necessary to manage customer relationships in a digital environment. It highlights topics such as negotiation techniques, customer relationship management, digital marketing, and e-commerce strategies. The program prepares students for a range of roles in sales, customer service, and account management, particularly in sectors that emphasize digital engagement.

This BTS is designed to prepare students for careers in the real estate sector. This program covers various aspects of real estate management, sales, and investment, providing a solid foundation for entering the field. Students explore essential topics such as property management, real estate law, market analysis, valuation, and negotiation techniques. They are well-equipped for positions such as real estate agent, property manager, real estate consultant, and other roles within the real estate industry.

This program aims to  to prepare students for various roles in management support and organizational administration. It covers essential management concepts, business administration, organizational behavior, and operational support functions, equipping students with a well-rounded skill set. The program often includes networking opportunities with industry professionals and potential employers, enhancing job prospects for students.

This program is designed to provide students with a solid foundation in the field of international relations, preparing them for various careers in this dynamic area. It covers core topics such as international law, diplomacy, global governance, conflict resolution, and political theory. This diverse curriculum helps students understand the international interactions.

page_content.program: MSc Défense Cybersécurité et Gestion des Risques
page_content.program_description: This MSc is a specialized program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to navigate the complexities of cybersecurity, defense, and risk management. It covers a wide range of topics including cybersecurity fundamentals, risk assessment, crisis management, information warfare, and the legal and ethical implications of cyber operations. The curriculum includes hands-on learning through case studies, simulations, and internships, allowing students to apply theoretical concepts to real-world scenarios.

page_content.program: MSc Management d’Affaires Publiques Européennes et Internationales
page_content.program_description: This program is tailored to prepare students for careers in public affairs, focusing on European and international contexts. It highlights topics such as public policy analysis, international relations, European governance, diplomacy, and strategic communication. The courses integrate insights from political science, law, economics, and sociology, allowing students to understand the complexities of public affairs in a globalized environment.

This MSc focuses on the intersection of international relations and cybersecurity. It covers critical topics such as international relations theory, cybersecurity policies, cyber warfare, digital diplomacy, and the geopolitical implications of cyberspace. Graduates are well-prepared for careers in government, international organizations, cybersecurity firms, NGOs, and consulting, focusing on the strategic aspects of cybersecurity in international relations.

page_content.program: MSc Stratégie Internationales et Transition Agroalimentaire
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to address the complexities of global agricultural systems and food security in the context of international relations. It provides a comprehensive education that prepares students to tackle the pressing challenges in this field. They can pursue roles in international organizations, government agencies, NGOs, and private sector firms focusing on food security, agricultural policy, and sustainable development.

page_content.program: Bachelor Coordination de projets de développement international et sociétal
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor is tailored to provide  students with the skills and knowledge needed to manage and coordinate international and societal development projects. It focuses on essential topics such as project management, sustainable development, social entrepreneurship, and international cooperation. Students learn to design, implement, and evaluate development projects effectively. Graduates are prepared for various roles in international organizations, NGOs, governmental agencies, and private sector firms focused on development, project management, and social impact.

page_content.program: Bachelor Coordinateur de projets alternatifs et solidaires
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on equipping students with the skills necessary to manage projects that prioritize social and environmental impact. It blends theoretical knowledge with practical experience, emphasizing sustainable development, social entrepreneurship, and community engagement. Students typically learn about project management methodologies, stakeholder engagement, and the principles of responsible business practices.

page_content.program: MSc in Management de l’Innovation Sociale
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Management de l’Innovation Sociale is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in the field of social innovation. It focuses on developing skills necessary to create, manage, and scale innovative solutions that address social challenges. The curriculum often integrates social sciences, business management, and sustainability, enabling students to tackle complex societal issues from multiple angles.

This program is designed for those passionate about driving sustainable change and looking to work in areas such as international development, corporate social responsibility, or environmental management. Students learn to have a proactive approach, to have a true entrepreneurial position and therefore develop new products, services, processes. They are trained in financial analysis, projection and reporting, and so on.

page_content.program: MSc Coopération internationale et action humanitaire
page_content.program_description: This MSc is designed to prepare students for careers in international cooperation and humanitarian action. It covers essential topics such as humanitarian principles, project management, conflict resolution, and development policies, providing a strong theoretical and practical foundation. The curriculum focuses on real-world applications, students benefit from internships and fieldwork, allowing them to gain hands-on experience and build valuable skills in dynamic environments.

page_content.program: Bachelor en Management et Sciences de l'Ingénieur
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor aims  to train multi-skilled people to manage technological projects and it combines management principles with engineering sciences, preparing students for diverse careers at the intersection of business and technology. The curriculum covers essential topics in management, finance, marketing, and engineering. Students learn to apply technical skills in business contexts, focusing on problem-solving and strategic thinking.

page_content.program: BTS Agricole Gestion et Protection de la Nature (GPN) i
page_content.program_description: The BTS Agricole Gestion et Protection de la Nature (GPN) is a specialized program focused on the management and protection of natural environments. It focuses on the importance of biodiversity, ecosystem conservation, and sustainable land use practices. Students develop practical skills in managing natural resources, conducting environmental assessments, and implementing conservation projects.

page_content.program: Bachelor 3 Chargé de Projet Transition Écologique
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to prepare students for roles focused on ecological transition and sustainable development. It covers strategies and practices that promote ecological sustainability across various sectors, including energy, agriculture, and urban planning. The curriculum equips students with essential project management skills, including planning, implementation, and evaluation of sustainability projects.

This program is designed to prepare students for roles focused on quality, safety, and environmental management within organizations. It integrates of quality management, safety protocols, and environmental protection in various industries. Students learn about relevant laws, standards, and certifications related to quality, safety, and environmental practices, preparing them to ensure compliance within organizations.

page_content.program: MSc Manager de la Stratégie Environnementale et RSE
page_content.program_description: This MSc is designed for individuals aiming to become leaders in environmental strategy and corporate social responsibility (CSR). The curriculum covers a range of topics including sustainability management, environmental policy, ethical business practices, and stakeholder engagement. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as sustainability consultants, CSR managers, and environmental project leaders, working across various sectors, including corporate, non-profit, and public organizations.

page_content.program: MSc Manager de la Qualité Hygiène Sécurité Environnement
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in managing quality, hygiene, safety, and environmental issues within organizations. The curriculum covers the interrelationship between quality management, hygiene standards, safety regulations, and environmental protection, providing a comprehensive understanding of QHSE principles. Students also gain skills in managing QHSE projects, including planning, executing, and evaluating initiatives that improve workplace safety and environmental sustainability.

page_content.program: BTSA Analyse, Conduite et Stratégie de l’Entreprise agricole (ACSE)
page_content.program_description: The BTSA Analyse, Conduite et Stratégie de l’Entreprise agricole (ACSE) at IHEDREA is a specialized program designed to equip students with the skills needed to analyze, manage, and strategize within agricultural enterprises. It emphasizes the management and operational aspects of agricultural businesses, teaching students how to optimize production processes and improve business performance. Students learn to conduct analyses of agricultural enterprises, including financial assessments, market studies, and operational evaluations, enabling informed decision-making.

The BBA Agri et Agro Manager is a comprehensive program designed to prepare students for management roles within the agricultural and agribusiness sectors. It combines agricultural sciences with business management principles, providing a well-rounded education that addresses both technical and managerial aspects of the industry. Students engage with a wide range of subjects, including agronomy, economics, marketing, and supply chain management, allowing them to understand the agrifood sector.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® (MS) Manager Marketing Data et Commerce Électronique
page_content.program_description: This program is designed for professionals seeking expertise in the integration of marketing, data analytics, and e-commerce. It blends marketing with advanced data analytics and includes in-depth knowledge of e-commerce platforms tools to enhance online sales and customer experiences. Students will gain skills to manage digital platforms, optimize customer journeys and implement effective online business strategies. SKEMA provides a practical approach, with real-world projects and case studies. This allows students to apply their learning directly to current industry challenges. Graduates often pursue roles such as digital marketing manager, e-commerce manager, data analyst, CRM manager, and marketing consultant.

page_content.program: MSc Management et Expertise Agricole et Agroalimentaire
page_content.program_description: This MSc is a specialized program designed to prepare students for leadership roles in the agricultural and agri-food sectors. It  combines in-depth knowledge of agricultural management with expertise in food production, supply chain management, and innovation in the agri-food industry. Students learn about managing agricultural enterprises, marketing agri-food products, and navigating regulations specific to the agricultural sector. Graduates of this program are well-prepared for managerial and consultancy roles within: agri-food companies, agricultural cooperatives, government and international organizations focusing on agricultural policy, sustainability consulting in the agricultural sector.

page_content.program: MSc Management et Expertise Agricole et Agroalimentaire (Crédit Agricole)
page_content.program_description: This program is designed for those interested in the intersection of agricultural and agri-food industries with finance, banking, and insurance sectors. It prepares students for roles in financial institutions (like Crédit Agricole) that work closely with the agricultural sector, focusing on agricultural insurance, risk management, and financial solutions for agribusinesses. Crédit Agricole, one of France's leading banks in agriculture, is a partner of the program. This collaboration gives students insight into real-world banking and financial operations specific to the agricultural sector. The program provides both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, making graduates well-equipped for positions in agribusiness management, agricultural finance, or related fields.

page_content.program: Master 2 Droit du Patrimoine - Expertise Foncière
page_content.program_description: This Master is a specialized program focused on legal and property expertise within the agricultural and agri-business sectors. It typically covers: heritage law, real estate expertise, regulations and policies, etc. The program is ideal for students interested in legal expertise, land management, and the broader field of rural property, preparing them for careers in legal consulting, land appraisal, and rural estate management.

The BTS Communication program at SUP'DE COM is designed to prepare students for various careers in the communication field. This two-year diploma focuses on developing skills in areas such as public relations, marketing, advertising, and media. Students learn about communication strategies, digital media, event management, and project management. The coursework often includes practical projects, case studies, and internships. The program also covers a range of topics, blending creative and analytical skills. This helps students understand both the artistic and strategic aspects of communication. Students can pursue roles in the fields such as public relations officer, marketing assistant, social media manager, advertising assistant, digital marketing specialist, etc.

This program is designed to train future communication professionals with a blend of creative and strategic skills. It prepares students to become communication managers, focusing on the development of key competencies such as media planning, brand identity, creative strategy, and community management. Student work closely with companies through internships and alternance (work-study) from the second year​.

The Bachelor Communication & Digital aims to prepare students for careers in digital communication, focusing on the growing demand for digital marketing, social media management, and online content creation. Students learn how to engage audiences and manage brand presence across digital platforms. The curriculum covers topics like graphic design, video production, and creative storytelling.  Graduates are well-equipped for roles such as: web project manager, social media manager, data analyst, traffic manager, content media manager, etc.

This Bachelor focuses on combining communication strategies with ethical and civic engagement. It is ideal for students passionate about social responsibility, sustainability, and community-driven projects. Students learn key communication skills, such as media strategy, digital marketing, and event management, while developing expertise in ethical communication and project management for non-profits, NGOs, and civic organizations. The program also includes options for internships and international study​.

This Bachelor is a specialized program aimed at students who wish to combine communication expertise with entrepreneurship skills. It prepares students to create and manage businesses while applying strategic communication skills. They learn how to develop business models, marketing plans, and strategies for promoting new products and services. Graduates are prepared to either start their own businesses or take on roles in corporate communication, marketing, or as entrepreneurs within existing companies. Common career paths are open for them include communication managers, business developers, and graphic studio managers.

This program is designed to provide students with the essential skills in communication and event management. It is available across several campuses in France, including Lyon, Paris, Nice, and Toulouse, among others. Students learn to analyze, create, and implement communication strategies through modules on media planning, communication law, public relations, and digital strategies. It also covers all stages of event production, from logistics to defining event strategies, with a focus on sustainability and responsible practices (RSE). Through learning by doing, students engage in practical projects, challenges, and workshops. This approach helps them develop skills in media planning and event production.

This program is tailored specifically for students who are passionate about both communication and the gaming industry. It focuses on preparing students to become operational communication professionals, particularly within the growing field of e-sports. Students gain foundational knowledge in communication strategies while also diving deep into gaming-specific content, such as organizing gaming events, promoting games, and managing communities. The program opens up career opportunities in game marketing, event management, and community management, with strong industry connections and networking opportunities to enhance post-graduate employability.

Bachelor Communication & Métiers de l’influence is designed for students aiming to pursue careers in communication and influence marketing, such as social media managers, content creators, or community managers. This three-year program focuses on building skills in areas like social media strategy, content creation, public relations, digital marketing, and brand identity management. Graduates can pursue roles such as: content media manager, social media manager, brand Manager, community manager, web project manager, etc.

page_content.program: MSc Global Supply Chain Management & Procurement
page_content.program_description: This MSc focuses on preparing students for careers in managing and optimizing supply chains and procurement processes on a global scale. They will gain insights into the end-to-end management of supply chains, including logistics, operations, and distribution. The curriculum covers crucial topics like procurement strategies, supply chain risk management, sustainable supply chain practices, logistics optimization, and digital supply chain technologies. It gives them a broad and deep understanding of both the operational and strategic aspects of supply chain management. This program is taught by recognized academic researchers and highly regarded professionals. It usually includes opportunities for internships or collaborative projects with companies, allowing students to apply their knowledge in real-world settings.

The MSc Strategic Management & Consulting is designed to equip students with the knowledge and skills required to excel in strategic management and consulting roles. It focuses on the formulation, execution, and analysis of business strategies while preparing students to solve complex business challenges. The curriculum develop strategic thinking, analytical skills, quantitative approaches, and problem-solving abilities. It also enhances their presentation, communication, and social skills for effective teamwork in corporate strategy.

page_content.program: MSc Artificial Intelligence for Business Transformation
page_content.program_description: This MSc aims to provide students with the skills necessary to apply artificial intelligence (AI) to business processes and strategies. It blends AI technologies with management practices, focusing on how AI can drive business transformation across various industries. The program often cover topics like data analysis, AI strategy, ethics in AI, and digital transformation. Students engage in practical projects, working with real-world data and case studies to apply AI solutions in business contexts.

The Bachelor Communication & Sport is designed for students passionate about both communication and sports, preparing them for careers in sports business and related fields. It covers various aspects such as event management, sponsorship, media relations, and the broader sports industry. The curriculum is structured to allow students to balance academic studies with athletic training, particularly for those at a high level of sporting competition. It provides them with practical learning through workshops, challenges, internships and they also have opportunity for alternating work-study in the third year.

This program designed for students interested in the intersection of communication and the music industry. It offers a blend of practical learning and theoretical knowledge. Students gain expertise in cultural and musical communication, working on projects such as event management, artist promotion, and the creation of communication strategies for music-related initiatives. The curriculum covers courses on social media, marketing, media relations, creative strategies, and public relations, all tailored to this industry. Workshops, conferences, and real-world projects are integral to the program.

Bachelor Communication & Média audio aims at students interested in the growing field of audio content, such as radio, podcasts, and other audio formats, which are increasingly popular among brands and creators. It blends communication studies with specialized training in audio media, offering a unique focus on how to create, produce, and distribute content like podcasts and webradio, as well as techniques for writing and speaking for radio. Students also benefit from the studio facilities on campus, which allow them to work directly in an audio production environment.

The Bachelor Communication & Culture Food combines communication strategies with a deep dive into the world of food, catering to the booming food industry, including sectors like agro-food, street food, wines, and spirits. It covers various food-related modules like food basics, business models of the food sector, food event management and social media for food. Students also explore photography and video production for culinary content, packaging design, and communication law in the agro-food sector.

This Bachelor is tailored for students interested in working within the wine and spirits sector. It combines core communication studies with focus on the unique demands and characteristics of the wine and spirits industry, preparing students to effectively market and promote products in this field. The curriculum develop skills in branding, storytelling, and strategic communication specifically tailored to the field . This includes understanding industry trends, consumer behavior, and the role of heritage and authenticity in marketing. Graduates of this program are well-suited for roles in marketing, brand management, communication, public relations, or event management. They can work for wineries, distilleries, specialised agencies, or even in hospitality and luxury goods​.

The Mastère Manager de la communication at SUP'DE COM is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in the communication industry. It focuses on developing strategic communication skills, both in traditional and digital platforms, to meet the demands of modern businesses. The courses include modules on communication strategy, brand management, digital communication, crisis communication, and media relations. Students are offered several specializations tailored to the evolving needs of the communication industry. They can pursue roles such as communication manager, PR manager, digital strategist, or brand consultant in various industries including media, advertising, and corporate communication.

page_content.program: BTS SIO – Services Informatiques aux Organisations
page_content.program_description: The BTS SIO (Services Informatiques aux Organisations) is a two-year vocational program designed to train students in managing IT systems and providing services to organizations. It focuses on preparing them to work in IT departments of companies, handling everything from infrastructure management to software development. They learn about software development and creating applications for businesses. The curriculum covers programming, database management, and the development of business applications tailored to organizational needs.

This program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive foundation in computer science and IT engineering. It focuses on developing essential skills in programming, software development, system administration, databases, and networks. Students gain expertise in various programming languages (like Java, Python, web technologies, cybersecurity, and cloud computing. The curriculum is designed to foster project management abilities, critical thinking, and teamwork, preparing them for real-world IT challenges.

year_1.specialization: DEVOPS - Fullstack : Développeur en Intelligence Artificielle et Data Science
SYSOPS : Administrateur systèmes, réseaux et bases de données

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor Développeur IA is a specialized program aimed at training students to become experts in artificial intelligence (AI) development. It covers key areas such as: AI programming and algorithms, machine learning, data science, neural networks and deep learning and ethics in ai. Students are prepared for roles like AI developer, machine learning engineer, or data scientist.

page_content.program: Mastère SIN - Expert en informatique et système d'infotmation
page_content.program_description: This program aims to equip students with advanced expertise in computer engineering. This two-year program cover topics such as: advanced programming languages, systems and network architecture, cloud computing, cybersecurity, data management and artificial intelligence, software engineering methodologies, IT project management and strategic decision-making and emerging technologies. Graduates typically work as: IT project managers, systems architects, data engineers, network and security engineers, software development leaders, etc.

page_content.program: Mastère SIN - Expert en intelligence artificielle
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to develop advanced skills in artificial intelligence (AI) for professionals aiming to become experts in the field. It focuses on both the theoretical and practical aspects of AI, covering areas such as machine learning, deep learning, data science, natural language processing, and computer vision. Students gain expertise in the development of intelligent systems, AI-powered applications, and complex algorithms. The curriculum is structured to provide a comprehensive understanding of the latest AI technologies and their real-world applications,  in many sectors like robotics, automation, finance, healthcare, and more.

This program is designed to train cybersecurity professionals who can address modern security challenges. It focuses on equipping students with advanced knowledge and skills in safeguarding digital infrastructures and data. The curriculum covers key areas including: risk management and threat assessment, cyber defense strategies, cryptography and secure communications, ethical hacking and penetration testing, cybersecurity laws and regulations.

page_content.program: Mastère SIN - Expert en ingénierie des données
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on advanced data engineering and management. It is designed to provide students with the expertise required to handle large-scale data processing, storage, and analysis. They learn about data architecture and infrastructure design, database management and optimization, big data technologies, cloud computing for data engineering, advanced programming and algorithms, machine learning and data analytics, data security and governance. Graduates are prepared for roles such as data engineers, data architects, or big data specialists.

This program is designed for students interested in combining digital project management with a focus on data-driven marketing strategies. The curriculum covers project management skills, data-driven marketing, technical competencies and marketing strategy. Students learn to lead and manage digital projects and understand the lifecycle from conception to implementation. Graduates are prepared for roles such as digital project managers, marketing analysts, and digital strategists, and so on.

This program is tailored to prepare students for managing tourism establishments, such as hotels, resorts, and other hospitality venues. It focuses on the operational and managerial aspects of running a tourism business. The curriculum covers areas like event management, hospitality, tourism marketing, financial management, and customer service. Students learn how to manage staff, ensure customer satisfaction, and maintain operational efficiency in tourism settings. They can pursue careers as hotel managers, resort directors, tourism consultants, or even open their own tourism-related businesses.

This program is tailored for students aiming to build leadership skills and expertise in the global tourism industry. It focuses on equipping students with advanced knowledge of tourism management, including marketing strategies, project management, and sustainable tourism practices. It also emphasizes international business skills, preparing graduates to lead and manage in diverse, cross-cultural environments. The curriculum integrates global trends in tourism and business management, providing a comprehensive understanding of international markets.

This program prepares students for careers in managing and developing tourism in specific regions or territories. It focuses on the strategies and techniques necessary to enhance the tourism potential of a region, considering its cultural, natural, and economic assets. Students learn how to manage tourism projects, enhance local attractions, and boost the region's appeal to both domestic and international tourists. They have opportunities to pursue roles such as tourism development manager, destination manager, project manager for tourism enterprises and consultant in territorial development.

page_content.program: MBA Manager de la Stratégie Touristique et Commerciale
page_content.program_description: The MBA Manager de la Stratégie Touristique & Commerciale at IEFT is a specialized program designed to train students in the strategic and commercial aspects of the tourism industry. It aims to develop managerial skills, focusing on the strategic planning, marketing, and management of tourism-related businesses and destinations. Students explore commercial strategies to promote tourism services, including sales, business development, and partnerships. They can pursue careers as tourism managers, destination marketing directors, commercial strategy consultants, or business development managers in the tourism sector.

The BTS Tourisme at IEFT is a two-year higher education program designed to prepare students for careers in the tourism industry. It provides comprehensive training in the management of tourism services, customer relations, and the promotion of tourism products. The curriculum highlights areas such as: tourism knowledge and services, marketing and communication, tourism law and regulations, languages and technology in tourism.

This program is designed to provide students with foundational skills in digital technology. It focuses on essential digital competencies required for a wide range of careers in the tech industry. The courses likely cover areas such as: web development basics, digital project management, introduction to databases and data management, digital marketing foundations, cybersecurity awareness, user experience (UX) and interface design, etc. The program serves as a starting point for those looking to pursue advanced studies or careers in digital professions.

This MSc designed to train students in advanced digital skills, with a focus on digital transformation and innovation. It typically prepares students to take on leadership roles in tech-driven environments, providing expertise in areas such as digital strategy, technology innovation, data analytics, and digital marketing. The courses cover a wide range of digital technologies, platforms, and innovations, ensuring students gain a thorough understanding of digital ecosystems. Graduates can explore roles such as digital project managers, data-driven strategists, or digital consultants in industries that require cutting-edge digital expertise.

The MSc Data Protection Officer aims to train students to become experts in data protection, privacy laws, and regulatory compliance. It provides them with the skills to ensure organizations comply with data privacy regulations such as GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation). The curriculum includes understanding data security policies and privacy regulations, managing data breaches and establishing protocols for protecting personal data, conducting audits and risk assessments, implementing data protection strategies within organizations industry. Graduates typically pursue roles as data protection officers (DPOs), privacy consultants, or compliance officers, and so on.

This MSc is designed to equip students with the skills to lead and implement digital transformation strategies in organizations. It focuses on the integration of digital technologies into business models, processes, and operations, helping students become experts in guiding companies through digital evolution. Students are encouraged to lead roles in industries undergoing digital shifts, such as IT consulting, digital project management, and more.

The MSc UX/UI Manager is a specialized program designed to equip students with advanced skills in user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. It focuses on understanding user behavior, designing seamless digital interfaces, and managing design projects from conception to implementation. Students learn to manage cross-functional teams, coordinate with developers and marketers, and lead design projects. They also work on live projects and case studies to apply their learning.

The MSc Data Manager aims to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to manage data effectively in various organizational contexts. It develop professionals who can understand, manage, and leverage data to support business decisions and drive innovation. the program covers topics such as data management, data analysis, big data technologies and business intelligence.

This program is designed to prepare students for a global career in business with a strong =focus on international markets and cross-cultural management. It covers core business disciplines and foundational, advanced and specialized management topics. Students have the opportunity to participate in exchange programs with partner universities around the world, internships abroad, and international business projects.

year_2.specialization: Marketing, Customer Relationship Management and Digital Transformation

page_content.program: Bachelor in Management and Tech Design
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor is tailored for students who are eager to thrive as managers in the tech world. It is designed to integrate business management with technical and creative design skills. Students receive a strong grounding in management subjects such as marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship, preparing them to lead in tech-driven industries. The curriculum emphasizes design thinking, innovation, and the practical application of technology in solving business challenges. The program is highly international, with courses in English, opportunities for internships abroad, and a diverse student body.

ÉSEG is renowned for its Grande École Program, a prestigious program that is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in international business and management roles.This program is highly regarded for its rigorous academic content, global orientation, and strong focus on both theoretical and practical aspects of business. Students can choose from various specializations in areas such as finance, marketing, international business, and management.

year_4.specialization: Audit, Contrôle de Gestion & Direction Financière
Institutions Financières : Gestion des risques et conformité
Gestion des Opérations et de la Supply Chain
Management du Commerce de la Grande Distribution
Gestion des données pour les entreprises

year_5.specialization: Audit, Contrôle de Gestion & Direction Financière
Institutions Financières : Gestion des risques et conformité
Gestion des Opérations et de la Supply Chain
Management du Commerce de la Grande Distribution
Gestion des données pour les entreprises

page_content.program_description: This program focuses on legal studies that prepares students to assist lawyers, legal departments, and other professionals in the legal field. It typically covers foundational legal subjects, including civil law, business law, contract law, and procedural law, providing students with the necessary skills to handle legal documentation, conduct research, and offer administrative support in legal matters.

page_content.program: Bachelor droit des entreprises et RH
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor is designed for students interested in acquiring legal expertise related to business and human resources. It focuses on developing a solid foundation in business law, labor law, and the management of human resources. Students learn how to handle legal matters in corporate settings, including compliance and ethical considerations. Graduates can pursue careers in HR departments, legal consulting for businesses, or further specialize in law and human resources at the master’s level.

The Mastère Juriste Compliance is a specialized program focused on training legal professionals in compliance, which involves ensuring that organizations adhere to legal regulations and ethical standards. The curriculum typically covers key areas such as corporate law, financial regulations, data protection laws, anti-corruption laws, and risk management. It prepares students to work as compliance officers, legal advisors, or consultants within various sectors, including finance, pharmaceuticals, technology, and others. Students gain expertise in assessing legal risks, implementing compliance programs, and ensuring that companies meet regulatory obligations.

This program is tailored to prepare students for careers in business law with a focus on legal technology (LegalTech). It combines traditional legal training with an emphasis on digital transformation and technological tools used in the legal industry.  Students are introduced to cutting-edge technologies like digital contract management systems to improve legal processes. The curriculum also includes case studies, internships, and real-world projects to provide hands-on experience.

The Mastère Juriste des Contrats aims to prepare students for advanced roles in contract law and legal practice. It focuses on providing expertise in drafting, negotiating, and analyzing complex contracts across various sectors. Students explore different types of contracts, such as commercial, civil, corporate, and employment contracts. They also have opportunities for internships and networking with legal professionals.

page_content.program: Mastère juriste compliance du secteur financier
page_content.program_description: The Mastère juriste compliance du secteur financier is an advanced program tailored to prepare students for roles in compliance and regulatory affairs, which are critical in managing the legal risks and regulatory requirements of financial institutions. It offers in-depth understanding of financial regulations and compliance standards, both at the national and international levels. Graduates are prepared for careers in compliance departments, regulatory bodies, consulting firms, or legal departments of financial institutions.

This program focuses on developing skills in interior design and interior architecture. ESAIL is known for its specialized training that combines creativity, technical knowledge, and practical experience. It covers essential aspects of interior design, including space planning, materials, lighting, color theory, and furniture design, with an emphasis on creating functional and aesthetically pleasing environments. Graduates are equipped to pursue careers as interior designers, space planners, or work in interior architecture firms, focusing on areas such as residential, commercial, hospitality, or retail design.

This program focuses on the interior architecture profession. It trains students to become interior architects capable of designing functional, aesthetic, and sustainable interior spaces, whether in residential, commercial, or public environments. Students are trained in the project management aspects of interior architecture, including budgeting, client relationships, and the execution of design projects from concept to completion. They are equipped to work in various fields, including interior architecture firms, design agencies, or as independent consultants.

The Master in International Business (MIB) is a dynamic and comprehensive program designed to prepare students for successful careers in the global business environment. The curriculum covers essential topics such as international marketing, global supply chain management, international finance, and cross-cultural management. Students can choose from various elective courses to tailor their education to their interests and career goals.

page_content.program: Master in Strategy and Digital Transformation
page_content.program_description: This Master provides students with the digital technologies knowledge as well as the skills needed to design and successfully lead digital transformation. The curriculum typically includes foundational courses in strategic management, digital transformation, innovation management, and data analytics.The program usually includes internships, consulting projects, or collaboration with businesses on digital strategy and transformation initiatives. These practical components provide hands-on experience and enhance employability.

page_content.program: Master in International Sales Management Negotiation
page_content.program_description: This program encourages students to understand all elements of a negotiation process, and to fully engage in an interdisciplinary analysis of negotiation in a global environment. It focuses on the strategic and tactical aspects of negotiation, providing students with the tools to effectively manage and resolve conflicts, build relationships, and achieve favorable outcomes in international settings. Students explore topics such as negotiation theory, cross-cultural negotiation, and legal aspects of international trade.

page_content.program: Master in Digital Marketing & Customer Experience Management
page_content.program_description: This program aims to equip students with advanced skills in digital marketing and customer experience management and to address the growing demand for professionals skilled in these areas.It covers topics such as business ethics and sustainability, innovative project management, customer relationship management, etc.

The Master in Fashion Management is a specialized program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to be thrive in the dynamic and competitive fashion industry.  It combines business management principles with insights specific to the fashion sector, preparing graduates for various roles within this vibrant field. The curriculum covers essential areas of fashion management, including marketing, merchandising, supply chain management, and brand management. IÉSEG has strong connections with the fashion industry, providing students with networking opportunities through guest lectures, workshops, and events.

This Master is a highly regarded program designed to prepare students for careers in finance and related fields. It combines theoretical knowledge with practical application, providing them with the tools they need to succeed in a rapidly changing financial landscape. The Program offers courses to help them gain a better understanding of advanced topics in finance, including machine learning, financial modelling, risk analytics and artificial intelligence for finance. They can also choose from specializations that allow them to tailor their education to specific interests.

page_content.program: Master in International Accounting, Audit & Control
page_content.program_description: This program is designed for students who aim to build a career in accounting, auditing, and financial management within an international context. It emphasizes the integration of theoretical knowledge with practical skills relevant to the global business environment. Students have topics such as financial accounting, managerial accounting, auditing, risk management, and financial control. They also learn about international accounting standards (IFRS) and regulations, preparing them for global financial practices.

page_content.program: Master in AI & Data Analytics for Business
page_content.program_description: The Master in AI & Data Analytics for Business is a specialized program designed to provide students with the skills and knowledge needed to leverage big data for making strategic business decisions. It integrates technical training in data analytics with a strong foundation in business management. Students learn to analyze large and complex datasets using advanced analytical methods and tools such as machine learning, data mining, and predictive analytics. They can transform this data into actionable business insights, driving better decision-making across various industries.

page_content.program: Master in Business Analysis and Consulting
page_content.program_description: This program aims at preparing students for roles in business analysis, strategy, and consulting. It provides a comprehensive understanding of how to use data, analytics, and strategic insights to solve complex business problems and guide decision-making processes in various industries. The courses covers essential subjects like business strategy, operations, financial analysis, and organizational behavior, providing a strong foundation in business management. Students learn how to use advanced tools, business analytics software, and quantitative analysis methods.

This program is tailored to provide students a strategic perspective on cybersecurity, preparing them to handle complex security issues in organizations and ensure the protection of critical data and systems. The curriculum covers various aspects of cybersecurity, including risk management, information security, data protection, and ethical hacking. It provides a deep understanding of cybersecurity laws, regulations, and ethical issues affecting businesses globally. Students gain hands-on experience with advanced cybersecurity tools and technologies, including encryption, network security, and threat detection systems.

The Master in Management for Sustainability is tailored to equip students with the knowledge and skills necessary to lead and manage organizations with a focus on sustainable business practices. It focuses on the integration of sustainability into core business strategies, preparing students to address environmental, social, and economic challenges in the corporate world. Graduates are well-prepared to pursue careers in a range of industries, including corporate sustainability departments, NGOs, government agencies, and consulting firms specializing in sustainability.

This program is designed for individuals who are passionate about creating businesses with a positive societal and environmental impact. It equips students with the knowledge, tools, and mindset needed to become successful entrepreneurs who drive change and address global challenges through innovative business models. The curriculum covers core business disciplines like finance, marketing, strategy, and innovation, with a strong focus on impact-driven entrepreneurship. Graduates of the program are prepared to launch their own impact-driven startups, work as innovation managers within companies, or join the growing number of organizations focused on social enterprise and sustainability.

The KEDGE Bachelor in Management is an undergraduate program designed to equip students with essential management skills and a strong foundation in business principles, preparing them for a variety of career paths in the global business environment. The curriculum includes a wide range of subjects such as marketing, finance, operations management and entrepreneurship. The program often includes courses taught in English, catering to an international student body and preparing students for a globalized job market.

year_3.specialization: International transport, international trade and logistics
Transport international, commerce international et logistique

page_content.program_description: The International BBA (Bachelor of Business Administration) at KEDGE Business School is a comprehensive undergraduate program designed for students aiming to develop strong international business skills and cultural awareness. It focuses on providing them with the knowledge and competencies needed to thrive in a globalized business environment. The curriculum covers a wide range of business disciplines, including finance, marketing, management, and entrepreneurship. The program emphasizes an international approach to business, offering opportunities for exchanges and internships abroad.

The Bachelor Créativité et Design is a specialized undergraduate program that blends creative disciplines with business and design thinking. It is designed to develop students’ creative skills while also giving them a solid foundation in business management and entrepreneurship. The program offers courses in various creative disciplines such as design, visual arts, and innovation, allowing students to explore and hone their artistic abilities. In addition to creativity and design, the curriculum includes business courses covering marketing, management, finance, and entrepreneurship. Graduates can pursue careers in a wide range of creative fields, including product design, fashion, graphic design, marketing, and creative direction.

The Master in Management Program Grande École at KEDGE is a prestigious and comprehensive program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed in various management roles across industries. It offers a strong foundation in management, finance, marketing, and operations, with a focus on both theoretical knowledge and practical application. Students can also specialize in areas such as supply chain management, innovation, entrepreneurship, or international business, etc. They are encouraged to undertake internships or work placements as part of the program to gain real-world experience.=

year_2.specialization: All Masters of Science are available

year_1.specialization: Management des Opérations et des Système d’Information

page_content.program_description: The MSc Data Analytics for Business is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to analyze and interpret complex data to support business decision-making. It focuses on developing expertise in data science, statistical analysis, machine learning, and big data technologies, all of which are essential in today's data-driven business environment. The program covers a range of topics including data mining, predictive analytics, data visualization, and the application of these techniques to real-world business problems. Students benefit from a hands-on learning experience and they can pursue roles in various fields such as business analysis, data science, consulting, and strategic management. Career paths are also open in sectors like finance, marketing, and operations where data analytics is crucial.

This program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the banking and finance industry, equipping them with the skills necessary for a successful career in this dynamic sector. It focuses on areas such as financial markets, risk management, investment analysis, and corporate finance. Graduates are well-prepared for careers in investment banking, asset management, financial consulting, and corporate finance, among other paths.

This MSc aims to provide students with the skills and knowledge necessary to lead organizations through sustainable transformations. It focuses on sustainability as a strategic imperative, addressing the environmental, social, and economic challenges businesses face today. The curriculum is centered around sustainable business practices, covering topics like corporate social responsibility (CSR), sustainable innovation, and environmental management. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as sustainability consultants, corporate responsibility managers, and transformation project leaders, among others. They can work in various sectors, including corporate, non-profit, and governmental organizations.

This program addresses the increasing demand for professionals who understand the environmental, social, and governance (ESG) criteria that are becoming central to financial decision-making. It combines finance with sustainability, covering topics like responsible investment, impact finance, green finance, and the integration of ESG factors in financial analysis.  Students learn to assess the financial and non-financial impacts of business decisions, aligning them with sustainability goals. They also gain expertise in sustainable investment strategies and tools.

page_content.program: MSC Audit & Pilotage de la Performance
page_content.program_description: This MSc is tailored to equip students with the skills necessary to excel in auditing, controlling, and performance management roles within organizations. It focuses on developing expertise in financial and management control, risk management, internal auditing, and strategic decision-making. The curriculum focuses on a broad range of topics including financial auditing, management control, performance measurement, strategic planning, and data analysis. It is designed to provide both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, with an emphasis on real-world application. Careers paths are open in various sectors, including corporate finance, auditing firms, consulting, and multinational corporations. Typical roles include financial controller, internal auditor, management consultant, and risk manager.

The MSc International Business is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful career in global business. It is centered around developing competencies in international trade, cross-cultural management, international strategy, and global market analysis. Graduates of the program are prepared for roles such as international business consultant, export manager, international sales manager, and roles in multinational corporations or international trade organizations.

The MSc Marketing at KEDGE is a comprehensive program designed to equip students with advanced marketing skills and knowledge. It is tailored for those who aspire to excel in marketing management and strategy within a global business environment. The curriculum offers several tracks, allowing students to specialize in areas like brand management, communication & event management, international marketing, etc. This allows students to tailor their education according to their career aspirations. The program is ideal for those who want to develop a deep understanding of marketing and its role in the success of modern businesses, while also gaining practical experience in the field.

The MSc International sport & event management at KEDGE recognized as the second-best program in the sport and e-sport management category by the EdUniversal 2023 index, delivers a robust curriculum designed to meet the evolving needs of the industry. The program aims to equip students with the skills, knowledge, and international outlook necessary to manage sports organizations, events, and related businesses effectively. It covers a broad range of topics, including sports marketing, event management, sponsorship, digital media, and more. Graduates can pursue roles in various sectors, including sports organizations, event management companies, marketing agencies, and corporate sponsorship departments.

The curriculum includes topics such as international trade & economics, global supply chain management, maritime law and insurance, digital transformation in trade & logistics, etc.

It focuses on the end-to-end process of supply chain management, from procurement to distribution, emphasizing the strategic and operational aspects needed to succeed in a globalized market. Students are offered hands-on experience and they are prepared for careers in various sectors, including manufacturing, retail, logistics, and consulting.

It focuses on innovation management within the purchasing function, preparing students for strategic roles in international business environments. include purchasing and supply chain management, supplier relationship management, innovation management, international business strategies, and sustainable procurement. Students have opportunities to undertake internships and work on live projects with companies, which helps in applying the learned concepts in real-world scenarios and gaining industry experience.

The curriculum covers a wide range of topics, including cultural economics, intellectual property rights, digital transformation in the creative industries, project management, and entrepreneurship. Students also gain practical experience through case studies, internships, and projects and they are prepared to pursue roles such as arts manager, cultural project manager, creative entrepreneur, gallery director, or marketing and communication specialist for cultural institutions.

This interdisciplinary approach prepares graduates to manage creative teams and projects effectively. Graduates are well-equipped for careers in a variety of roles within the creative industries, including: design manager, innovation consultant, creative director, brand manager, product development manager, etc.

Students gain a deep understanding of the healthcare industry, including regulatory frameworks, market dynamics, and the unique challenges and opportunities within the sector. They can pursue roles such as innovation managers, product development specialists, or consultants in healthcare innovation.

This program is designed to equip students with comprehensive risk management skills. The curriculum includes modules and professional workshops conducted by international experts. It covers topics such as the operational and technical aspects of risk management, including risk mapping, risk financing, and crisis management. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as risk managers, risk management consultants, internal controllers, and financial auditors.

This program is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to drive innovation, lead transformational projects, and foster entrepreneurial ventures. The curriculum covers a wide range of subjects, including finance, marketing, human resources, economics, and business law. It also includes courses on digital transformation, entrepreneurship, and innovation, ensuring that students are well-prepared for the evolving business landscape.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisés® Analyse Financière Internationale Études & Décision Marketing
page_content.program_description: The Mastère Spécialisé Études & Décision Marketing at NEOMAl is a specialized postgraduate program designed to equip students with advanced knowledge and skills in marketing research, data analysis, and decision-making. It often involves collaboration with industry professionals and companies, providing them with networking opportunities and exposure to current industry practices. Graduates are well-prepared for careers in market research, marketing analytics, brand management, consulting, and other roles that require strong analytical and decision-making skills.

The Bachelor in Management at Toulouse Business School (TBS) is a highly regarded undergraduate program aimed at students seeking a career in international business and management. It focuses on foundational courses in business management, including accounting, marketing, economics, and organizational behavior. The program also includes advanced specialization courses and an internship. Students can continue with their chosen specialization or opt for a double degree.

The Master in Management Program is a highly reputed, multidisciplinary program aimed at developing well-rounded, globally aware professionals. It is designed for students looking to build careers in various sectors such as finance, marketing, consulting, and entrepreneurship. They can tailor their studies to match their career ambitions through a wide range of specializations in fields like Finance, Marketing, Business Analytics, and International Business. The program also offers opportunities for dual degrees, exchange programs, and internships at partner universities and companies worldwide. It is ideal for those seeking a highly customizable and internationally recognized business education, with strong career prospects and industry connections.
