page_content.program: MBA Marketing and Customer Relationship Manager
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Marketing and Customer Relationship Management is a comprehensive two-year program designed to equip students with the skills needed to develop and manage customer-centric sales and marketing strategies in an increasingly digital and competitive environment. The curriculum focuses on implementing relationship marketing techniques, utilizing performance analysis tools, and developing effective prospecting plans. Graduates are prepared for various roles, including customer relationship manager, sales manager, CRM project manager, key account manager, business analyst, business developer, and e-commerce manager.

page_content.program: MBA Marketing and Customer Relationship Manager  - International Business Development
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Marketing and Customer Relationship Manager with a focus on International Business Development develop essential skills in business and marketing within a global and increasingly digital landscape. It is geared toward preparing professionals for the complexities of international business, from customer relationship management to innovative product design and business development. The curriculum places a strong emphasis on digitalization and modern marketing techniques, equipping students with the competencies to navigate the evolving business world.

The BTS Professions Immobilières at IMSI is a program aims to prepare students for careers in the real estate industry by training them in areas such as property research, estimation, sales, and the administrative, financial, legal, and technical management of real estate portfolios. The second year is a work-study model that blends classroom learning with practical experience in the workplace. Graduates can pursue roles in property management, real estate agencies, housing organizations, and promotion-construction companies

page_content.program: MSc Manager International des Industries et Services en Santé - Marketing
page_content.program_description: This program allows students to professionalize in health industries management within one year. They learn how to develop and implement an international marketing strategy tailored to health industries and services. The curriculum highlights topics such as: fundamental marketing, digital health marketing, health communication, finance, project management, economic intelligence and lobbying, business strategy, etc. Graduates can take on a range of different roles including: product manager, business developer, marketing business analyst, health consultant.

page_content.program: MSc Manager International des Industries et Services - Affaires réglementaires
page_content.program_description: This MSc is a comprehensive program designed to provides students with skills and knowledge to work in pharmaceutical or biotech companies of various sizes, consulting firms, and pharmaceutical product distributors. The course covers areas such as: international regulation of medicines, international regulation of medical devices, regulation of cosmetic products, regulation of clinical studies, etc.

The International Bachelor in Management at PSB is a comprehensive undergraduate program designed to provide students with solid business fundamentals and an international perspective. It emphasizes both theoretical knowledge and practical business skills, preparing them for careers in global business environments or further studies at the master's level. Students can choose from various specializations and have opportunities for internships and professional placements to enhance their learning and gain real-world experience.

The Master in Management (Grande École Program) at PSB is a prestigious, multi-disciplinary program designed to prepare students for leadership roles in global business. It is highly versatile and offers a wide range of specializations, such as finance, marketing, data management, luxury management, and international business, to name a few. The program combines theoretical learning with practical experience, including internships and international exposure. It is accredited by several reputable bodies, enhancing its global recognition.

year_4.specialization: Management des RH & de la Transformation Digitale

page_content.program_description: The MSc in Arts & Cultural Management is tailored for students aiming to pursue careers in the management of cultural and creative industries. It focuses on combining management skills with knowledge of the arts and culture sector, offering students insight into how cultural projects are developed, financed, and managed globally. The curriculum emphasizes strategic management, marketing, finance, and law, tailored to the unique needs of the arts and cultural industries. Students also benefit from a strong network of professionals, industry partnerships, and internships that provide practical, hands-on experience in Paris' vibrant cultural scene.

The MSc in Hospitality Management is designed to equip students with the skills needed to manage and lead in the dynamic hospitality sector. The course highlight strategic thinking, financial management, and operational planning, helping students to thrive in areas such as hotel and resort management, event planning, tourism marketing, and more. Students gain practical experience through a combination of case studies, business simulations, and real-world consulting projects.

This MSc aims to provide students with advanced knowledge in international finance. focuses on developing several key competencies, such as economic development strategies, managing financial portfolios, overseeing market operations and risks, and leading financial teams. The curriculum includes case studies, a stock market simulation, and a professional thesis. Graduates can pursue a wide range of careers within the financial sector such as financial analyst, portfolio managers, corporate finance manager, investment banker, market operator, and so on.

page_content.program: MSc in International Management & Global Leadership
page_content.program_description: The MSc in International Management & Global Leadership is designed to equip students with the necessary skills to succeed in global business environments. It focuses on leadership development, international management practices, and cross-cultural communication. Students gain a comprehensive understanding of business operations on an international scale, with coursework emphasizing strategic management, leadership dynamics, and global business trends. They are prepared for positions including: international business manager, global project leader, business development manager, and team leader in multinational companies.

The MSc in Luxury & Fashion Management provides students with the expertise needed to excel in the luxury and fashion industries. offers a deep dive into key areas such as luxury brand management, retail management, marketing strategies for luxury goods, and consumer behavior in the luxury sector. It combines theoretical instruction with practical experience, including internships and industry-related projects. Students also benefit from workshops, case studies, and the opportunity to build a professional network within the industry. They can work as as brand manager, product manager, retail manager, communication manager, and marketing director within luxury fashion brands.

page_content.program: MSc in Marketing Analytics & Data Intelligence
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Marketing Analytics & Data Intelligence is designed for students looking to master the tools and techniques required to analyze and interpret marketing data effectively. It focuses on advanced techniques in data collection, management, and analysis to derive actionable insights for predictive marketing strategies. The curriculum includes business topics such as finance, HR, and international business and students learn how to apply these fundamentals to marketing practices, enhancing their leadership and teamwork capabilities.

page_content.program: MSc in Purchasing & Supply Chain Management
page_content.program_description: This MSc program aims to provide students with essential skills in supply chain strategy, procurement. It covers critical areas such as supply chain optimization, supplier relationship management, and strategic sourcing. The curriculum is designed to prepare students to address modern challenges in supply chain operations. They will benefit from a mix of theoretical knowledge and practical applications, often working on real-world case studies and projects.

This program focuses on creating professionals who can develop sustainable business practices while driving growth. It combines theoretical knowledge with practical training, preparing students for roles in sustainable business strategies, environmental management, and corporate social responsibility. The curriculum emphasizes real-world application through case studies, projects with industry partners, and internships. Graduates are prepared for roles such as sustainability consultants, CSR managers, business development professionals, and positions in green finance or corporate sustainability departments.

This MSc equips students with the skills to manage and analyze data for business intelligence, web marketing, and sales strategies. It focuses on five key competencies: business strategy development, financial management, project management, team leadership, and data-oriented management. The courses delivered partly in English and follows a work-study format, divided between time at the school and at a company. This approach allows students to develop both managerial and technical skills, facilitating their entry into the workforce.

The Bachelor généraliste ESG is designed to offer students a broad understanding of various fields in business. It provides a comprehensive foundation across subjects like management, marketing, communication, and international business, preparing students for versatile career opportunities. The program covers a wide range of topics, making it ideal for students who are still exploring specific career paths within the business sector. It is structured over three years, with the option for students to enter into a professional contract (alternance) from the third year. The degree opens doors to several career options, including roles like project manager, marketing consultant, and communication officer.

The Bachelor Commerce Marketing is designed to equip students with solid skills in both commerce and marketing, providing a strong foundation for future careers in business. It focuses on the practical application of marketing strategies and commercial techniques, helping students to understand the key drivers of business growth. The curriculum covers essential topics such as consumer behavior, digital marketing, market analysis, and sales techniques. It also emphasizes the development of soft skills, including communication and teamwork, which are critical for successful careers in marketing and commerce. Students will have the opportunity to participate in internships and professional projects, allowing them to apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios.

The Bachelor in Marketing Digital is tailored to prepare students for the fast-evolving world of digital marketing, equipping them with skills in online strategy, communication, and the tools required to succeed in the digital economy. It covers areas such as SEO (Search Engine Optimization), social media marketing, content creation, digital advertising, and web analytics. Students will gain practical experience through internships and projects, and the program also emphasizes the importance of mastering digital tools and understanding consumer behavior in the digital landscape. Graduates typically pursue careers as digital marketing managers, community managers, web content strategists, or social media specialists.

This Bachelor focuses on developing skills in event management, digital communication, and international communication. It is designed for students who are interested in organizing events and managing digital marketing strategies on a global scale. The curriculum includes internships and practical projects to provide real-world experience, and graduates are well-equipped for roles such as event manager, digital marketer, or international communication consultant.

This program focuses on training future leaders in the strategic and marketing domains. It is designed to equip students with in-depth knowledge and practical skills in areas such as market analysis, brand management, consumer behavior, and strategic planning. It prepares students for high-level roles in marketing strategy, including positions like marketing director, product manager, or brand manager.

The Mastère Webmarketing aims to prepare students for strategic roles in web marketing, teaching them how to leverage digital tools to enhance business performance. The curriculum covers a range of topics including search engine optimization (SEO), content marketing, social media strategy, and data analytics. Students also learn about user experience (UX) and how to implement effective digital marketing campaigns. This program emphasizes practical experience and is designed to help students become immediately operational in the field of web marketing.

This program is tailored to provide students with both commercial and technical skills necessary for success in the IT sector. The coursework covers a range of essential topics including business development, negotiation techniques, digital marketing strategies, and a deep dive into IT systems and products. This comprehensive education ensures students gain a solid understanding of both the commercial and technical facets of the IT landscape. Graduates typically find roles in various industries such as telecommunications and digital services. The skill set developed in this program makes them highly attractive to employers, particularly in the fast-growing tech sector.

This master's degree is designed for students aiming to become strategic leaders in entrepreneurship and business management. It provides them with the skills to create and manage innovative projects and understand complex business environments. The program can be pursued in an alternating format, allowing students to gain practical experience while studying. Graduates can pursue various roles such as entrepreneur, business strategist, project manager, or business development manager.

The Mastère International Business at ESGCI aims to equip students with the skills necessary for a successful career in international business. The curriculum is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of global markets, strategic management, and cross-cultural communication. Students will engage in practical case studies and group projects that mirror real-world scenarios in international business. The program highlights the importance of cultural awareness and sensitivity in international business dealings. Graduates can pursue various roles such as marketing manager, export manager, or business development manager.

The Mastère Marketing et Communication is a comprehensive program designed to prepare students for leadership roles in marketing and communication fields. This master's degree focuses on developing strategic thinking and practical skills essential for designing and executing effective marketing campaigns. The curriculum covers key areas such as digital marketing, branding, market research, media planning, public relations, and corporate communication. Students are trained in both traditional and digital communication tools, making them versatile in managing campaigns across various platforms.

page_content.program: Mastère Communication digitale, réseaux sociaux et influence
page_content.program_description: This program aims to equip students with the skills needed to excel in digital communication and social media management. The curriculum covers essential topics related to digital communication and social media, emphasizing the strategic use of these platforms to enhance brand visibility and engagement. It prepares students for various roles, including community manager, digital communication manager, and social media strategist, among others.

This program is tailored to provide students with the essential skills needed for effective communication within political and lobbying contexts. It focuses on various aspects, including public affairs, advocacy strategies, and the intricacies of political communication. The course covers topics such as strategic communication, negotiation skills, and the functioning of public institutions, which are crucial for effective lobbying and political engagement. It emphasizes a practical learning experience, ensuring that students are well-prepared for immediate operational roles in their fields.

This master's-level program is designed for individuals looking to develop expertise in the strategic management of purchases, negotiation with suppliers, and optimization of procurement processes within organizations. It covers key topics such as purchasing strategies, supplier relationship management, risk management in procurement, and international purchasing dynamics. Students are also exposed to emerging trends like sustainable procurement and digital transformation in the supply chain. Graduates of the program are well-positioned for roles such as procurement manager, purchasing director, supply chain manager, and consultant in both national and international organizations.

The Mastère Supply Chain et e-Logistique is a specialized graduate program focused on equipping students with expertise in supply chain management and e-logistics. It is tailored to address the growing demand for professionals who can manage and optimize logistics and supply chain operations in an increasingly digitalized and globalized environment. The curriculum covers essential aspects of the supply chain, including procurement, production, inventory management, and distribution. Graduates can pursue careers in roles such as: supply chain manager, logistics manager, e-logistics specialist, procurement manager, operations manager, etc.

This master's degree is a specialized program aimed at students who want to develop expertise in business development and management of business units. It prepares future business leaders to manage and grow business units while focusing on strategy, sales, and performance. The courses cover topics such as strategic management, sales techniques, leadership, financial management, and innovation in business development. Students learn how to expand market share, manage client portfolios, and develop new business opportunities. They are prepared for roles like business development manager, sales director, head of business unit, strategic consultant, and so on.

This program is designed for students aiming to specialize in accounting and management. It provides a solid foundation in accounting, finance, and business management, preparing students for various roles in the financial and corporate sectors.

The Bachelor in Finance at ESGF is designed to provide students with a comprehensive foundation in financial management, corporate finance, and financial markets. It covers key topics such as financial analysis, accounting, economics, and financial risk management, ensuring that graduates are well-prepared for the dynamic finance sector. Students gain hands-on experience through case studies, financial simulations, and internships. They are prepared for roles such as financial analyst, junior financial controller, financial advisor, or corporate treasurer. The program also offers pathways to continue into specialized master’s programs within ESGF

page_content.program: Mastère Audit et Contrôle de Gestion
page_content.program_description: This Mastère is designed for students aiming to pursue careers in finance, specifically in roles such as financial controller, credit analyst, or audit manager. It offers a robust understanding of financial and managerial auditing processes, budget management, and cost control systems. The curriculum covers essential topics such as internal control, risk management, financial analysis, and corporate strategy. The program is tailored to equip graduates with the skills necessary to monitor an organization's financial health and make strategic decisions based on thorough financial audits. It also includes opportunities for internships, providing hands-on experience that enhances job prospects in a variety of finance-related roles such as credit analysis, audit management, and consulting in financial strategy.

page_content.program: Mastère Gestion de Patrimoine et Gestion Privée
page_content.program_description: Mastère Gestion de Patrimoine et Gestion Privée at ESGF is a specialized master's program designed for those looking to deepen their expertise in wealth management and private banking. This two-year program is intended to provide comprehensive training in financial planning, tax strategies, investment management, and estate planning, targeting future professionals in the private wealth management sector.

This program is designed for individuals aiming to specialize in financial markets and trading. It prepares students for roles such as traders, financial analysts, and operations managers in financial institutions. The course provides a deep understanding of financial markets, including their mechanisms, products, and actors. Students are trained in areas like risk management, portfolio management, and the use of financial instruments such as derivatives. Graduates are well-equipped to work in investment banks, asset management firms, and other financial organizations.

This Mastère offers in-depth training focused on financial management, corporate finance, and strategic financial decision-making. It prepares students for leadership roles in finance, such as financial directors, treasurers, and risk analysts, by equipping them with the knowledge to navigate the financial environments. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge and practical applications through case studies, simulations, and real-world projects.

Mastère Finance et Développement Durable at ESGF is tailored for students who wish to specialize in sustainable finance and its application in business. They learn how to develop short- and medium-term financing mechanisms for all organizational activities, including new sustainable financing methods. The curriculum provides them the skills to manage portfolios of financial assets and analyze the financial and environmental risks of the company. Graduates can pursue roles like financial director, financial analyst, risk manager/analyst, etc.

page_content.program: Mastère Big Data et Data Science en finance
page_content.program_description: This program aims to provide students with the expertise required to thrive in the intersection of finance and data science. They learn how to develop economic growth solutions, oversee and manage market operations and risks, and manage financial operators. Graduates can pursue positions such as data scientists, financial analysts, and treasurers.

Mastère Banque et Relations Entreprises is tailored to equip students with the essential skills and knowledge required for a successful career in banking and corporate relations. It emphasizes practical training and the development of professional competencies. The courses include advanced banking techniques, financial management, and corporate relations strategies. The curriculum is designed to cover both theoretical aspects and practical applications in the financial sector. Graduates are prepared for various roles within the banking sector, including corporate banking, investment services, and financial consultancy, among others​.

The Bachelor Généraliste Augmenté at ESG is designed for students who are uncertain about their specialization and want time to explore different fields. It provides a solid foundation in various business and management disciplines, preparing students to specialize in fields such as communication, digital marketing, business development, and more as they progress through the course.

The Bachelor in Commerce and Digital Marketing is designed to equip students with comprehensive skills in digital marketing and e-business. Throughout the program, participants will develop expertise in key areas such as online communication, digital strategies, and web project management, all taught by industry professionals. The program follows a practical, hands-on approach, incorporating real-life case studies and projects that allow students to directly apply what they learn. Graduates of this program can pursue various roles, including sales manager, digital marketing manager, e-commerce manager, product manager, and business development manager.

This program is tailored to provide students with essential skills in international business, marketing, and management, preparing them for global careers. It emphasizes both theoretical and practical knowledge, including courses in Business English, international business strategies, management, and digital marketing. Students also engage in practical experiences such as business games, case studies, and internships, enhancing their readiness for roles like business developer, key account manager, and international sales manager.

This Bachelor is designed to equip students with the necessary skills for a successful career in marketing and commerce. Students learn how to develop client relationships and retain the client portfolio, supervise and lead a sales team. They are also encouraged to engage in internships, fostering a strong connection with the business world and enhancing employability.

The Bachelor in Communication and Digital is designed to prepare students for a dynamic career in the fields of communication, media, and digital marketing. It focuses on essential skills such as communication strategy, content creation, and digital marketing tools. The curriculum highlights advanced topics such as digital transformation, social media management, and the creation of effective communication campaigns.

This program is designed for those who want to specialize in human resources. It focuses on equipping students with practical skills and knowledge essential for HR management roles, such as recruitment, training, employee relations, and strategic HR planning. The curriculum integrates theoretical learning with hands-on experience, making graduates highly employable in the HR field.

page_content.program: Mastère Business Development et Management de BU
page_content.program_description: This program is designed for students aiming to become experts in business development and the management of Business Units (BUs). It focuses on practical, professional training, with courses delivered by experienced professionals. Students learn how to develop expertise in business strategy and competitive environments, acquire essential commercial skills to drive the success of a business unit.

This program prepares students for professional roles in communication and event management. The curriculum focuses on real-world projects, helping students develop practical skills. It covers strategic communication, team management, and event project management. This two-year program can be pursued in either an initial format or as an alternance (work-study) option, allowing students to gain practical experience while studying.

The Mastère Marketing ia designed for students aiming to develop expertise in various marketing disciplines. They learn how to analyze a market and track trends, design a product or service, define the entire marketing mix, develop the marketing strategy, and oversee its implementation. Graduates are prepared for roles such as Brand Manager, Marketing Research Executive, Marketing Project Manager, etc.

This Mastère focuses on equipping students with the skills and knowledge necessary for effective digital communication and influence marketing strategies, which are essential in today's digital landscape. They learn how to analyze and design the editorial positioning of a brand and its marketing strategy, describe an innovative business model and customer experience. The curriculum is tailored to prepare graduates for various roles in digital marketing and communications such as marketing manager, digital marketing manager, web marketing manager, innovation marketing manage, etc.

This program is designed to equip students with the essential skills for financial management and control. The curriculum covers a broad range of subjects, including auditing, financial analysis, cost management, and fiscal policies. Students participate in activities like decision-making simulations (Business Games) and meet professionals during networking events like conferences and afterworks.

The Mastère Entrepreneuriat et Stratégie d’Entreprise aims to equip students with the skills necessary to launch and manage innovative projects. It focuses on developing an entrepreneurial mindset, strategic thinking, and the ability to navigate the complexities of business in a dynamic environment. The curriculum covers essential topics such as business strategy, entrepreneurship, project management, and innovation. It emphasizes practical application through projects and case studies. The program combines theoretical knowledge with real-world experience, including opportunities for internships and networking with industry professionals.

This Mastère is a specialized program designed for students who aim to develop expertise in managing human resources within organizations. It covers a wide range of HR-related topics, including recruitment, talent management, labor law, employee relations, training and development, and organizational behavior. It also emphasizes strategic HR management, preparing students to align HR practices with business goals. In addition to technical HR skills, the program places importance on developing soft skills such as leadership, negotiation, and communication, which are critical for HR professionals.

This program is tailored to prepare students for managerial roles in marketing and commerce. It is typically structured over two years and focuses on equipping students with advanced knowledge and practical skills in strategic marketing, sales management, business development, and digital marketing. Graduates from this program can pursue various roles, such as marketing manager, product manager, sales manager, business development manager, and digital marketing specialist.

This Bachelor’s program aims to equip students with the knowledge and skills necessary for the rapidly evolving fields of digital marketing and e-business. It focuses on training students in specific techniques related to both digital marketing and commerce, helping them develop the expertise essential in today’s business environment. The courses are taught by industry professionals, ensuring that students receive practical, real-world insights. Graduates of this program can pursue various roles, including sales manager, digital marketing manager, e-commerce manager, product manager, and business development manager.

This program focuses on preparing students for careers in marketing and commercial management. It is divided into three years, emphasizing practical experience alongside theoretical knowledge. Students engage in foundational courses covering marketing fundamentals, business English, legal environment, and organization sociology. They have opportunities for practical experiences that include company visits and competitions. The curriculum advances into areas like market studies, strategic marketing, and digital communication, while continuing to build English proficiency.

The Bachelor in Communication aims to develop versatile and creative professionals who can navigate the rapidly evolving communication landscape. It emphasizes the creation and implementation of communication strategies, project management, and mastery of various communication tools. Students will gain practical experience through internships and projects with real companies, allowing them to apply their knowledge in real-world contexts. The curriculum is designed to prepare graduates for various roles in the field, adapting to technological changes and new media trends.

This Bachelor is a 3-year program designed to provide students with a wide-ranging skill set, combining knowledge from various fields like digital marketing, graphic design, and more. It focuses on versatility, allowing students to explore multiple disciplines to enhance their adaptability and competitiveness in the job market. Throughout the program, students benefit from professional coaching, e-learning resources, and business case studies​.

This Bachelor is comprehensive program designed to develop key skills in international business. The curriculum includes modules on team management, international business strategies, marketing, commerce, and business law. Students also focus on international perspectives, such as international procurement, logistics, and foreign languages (including a second language). They can pursue careers as business developers, key account managers, sales managers, and other roles in international commercial development.

This program aims to provide students with comprehensive skills in marketing, business development, and entrepreneurship. It combines both theoretical and practical learning, including classes taught by professionals in the field, real-world case studies, and hands-on projects. Students learn team and organization management, human resources, and legal aspects of business. The curriculum also includes professional workshops, business games, company visits, and guest speakers from the industry.

The Bachelor Gestion de Patrimoine at ESG focuses on preparing students to manage and grow financial assets effectively. It includes hands-on projects such as writing financial newsletters, creating a fictitious independent advisory firm, and managing virtual portfolios. These activities allow students to stay updated on macroeconomic trends, propose investment strategies, and develop skills in asset allocation, financial consulting, and regulatory compliance. The course aims to build practical knowledge that can be applied in wealth management careers, offering exposure to financial markets and client relationship management.

Bachelor in Human Resources at ESG is designed to provide students with the essential knowledge and skills to manage human capital in businesses. It covers key HR functions such as recruitment, compensation management, career development, and employee relations. The curriculum also includes training in HR tools and software, as well as project management. Graduates are prepared for roles such as HR assistant, payroll manager, recruitment officer, or HR consultant.

The Mastère Marketing is a two-year program designed to equip students with advanced marketing skills, preparing them for leadership roles in various sectors. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with hands-on experience through real-world projects and internships. It focuses on developing comprehensive marketing strategies, ensuring they can autonomously manage campaigns upon graduation. The program includes an internship, often leading to employment. Career prospects for graduates include roles like marketing director, product manager, digital marketing manager, and brand manager.

The Mastère Manager en Ressources Humaines at ESG aims to provide students with the necessary skills to manage HR processes and navigate the complexities of workforce management. The courses cover a variety of topics, including digitalization of HR functions, project management, talent management, and RSE (corporate social responsibility) strategies. It also incorporates practical learning through business cases, professional projects, and interactions with industry professionals.

This program offers training in real estate wealth management, focusing on the strategic and financial aspects of property management. The curriculum is designed to be highly practical, combining classroom learning with case studies, group projects, and professional experiences through internships. The program structure is flexible, offering internships and alternance opportunities to help students gain hands-on experience and build their professional networks. Graduates can pursue roles such as wealth manager, financial advisor, private banker, investment consultant, and portfolio manager.

page_content.program: Mastère Communication Digitale et Marketing d’Influence
page_content.program_description: The Mastère Communication Digitale et Marketing d’Influence is a specialized program designed to equip students with skills in digital communication and influence marketing. The curriculum covers a variety of strategic areas such as: digital marketing strategy, management & leadership, influence marketing, etc. This program emphasizes practical learning through case studies, internships, and projects, and it prepares students for careers in fields like digital marketing, web management, and brand strategy.

The Mastère Entrepreneuriat et Stratégie d’Entreprise prepares students for entrepreneurial roles and strategic management within organizations. It emphasizes practical experience and project development, particularly through its unique Start-up Lab, which acts as an incubator for students to work on their business creation projects under the guidance of industry professionals. The program's goal is to transform students into accomplished entrepreneurs capable of navigating the challenges of the business world confidently.

page_content.program: Mastère Business Development et Management de BU
page_content.program_description: This program emphasizes strategic business development, project management, and operational excellence. Students learn to define a business development strategy, deploy and optimize business strategies, manage business development projects, supervise commercial activities and teams. The curriculum includes courses on strategic management, sales management, marketing strategies, and financial analysis, among others. This comprehensive approach ensures that students gain a robust understanding of various business functions.

The Bachelor Commerce Marketing at ESG Rennes is a three-year program designed to provide students with foundational skills in commerce and marketing. The curriculum focuses on developing practical expertise in marketing strategies, consumer behavior analysis, and business development, preparing graduates for roles in sales, marketing, and commerce. The program includes theoretical coursework, practical projects, and opportunities for internships, allowing students to gain both academic knowledge and hands-on experience in the field.

This program focuses on practices, codes, and regulations of international trade. It equip students with the fundamental skills expected in sales. They  benefit from hands-on teaching approach, based on real-world scenarios. The courses are taught by professionals, experts in commerce and international trade. Graduates can pursue roles such as business developer, sales manager, key account manager, sales manager, sales team leader.

This Bachelor provides students with the fundamentals of business management and understanding the organization of a company. Students learn how to define, design and manage an internal or external communication project and apply their skills in the field of digital communication. They are prepared for positions like digital communication manager, community manager, public relations officer, and social media manager.

The Bachelor Généraliste at ESG is designed to provide students with a broad and foundational education in business, covering essential subjects like management, marketing, commerce, and international business. The program is structured over three years, with the first two years focused on building core knowledge, and the third year dedicated to specialization. ESG also places importance on developing students' professional skills through projects, internships, and international exposure, which is an integral part of the curriculum.

The Bachelor Ressources Humaines is designed to prepare students for careers in human resources management, providing a strong foundation in HR practices and strategies. It focuses on key areas such as recruitment, employee relations, talent development, and HR policies. The curriculum emphasizes the development of practical skills through internships, projects, and business challenges, ensuring students gain hands-on experience in the field.

This bachelor's degree provides students with the skills necessary for the commercial development of a business. They learn how to create their project and its business plan. The curriculum offers practical teaching methods, led by professional speakers who share their expertise and experience with students. They rely on real-life scenarios carried out in groups, just like in a company.

The Bachelor Marketing at ESG is designed to equip students with a solid foundation in marketing principles, strategic thinking, and digital communication skills. The curriculum covers essential topics such as: fundamentals of marketing and communication, international business, digital marketing, etc. Students will engage in various activities designed to enhance their professional skills. They are prepared for roles like marketing manager, digital marketing specialist, communication manager, product manager, customer relationship manager.

page_content.program: Mastère Audit et Contrôle de Gestion
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on developing expertise in audit and management control, preparing students for a range of roles in both private and public sectors. The curriculum covers a variety of essential subjects, including: social audit and management control, corporate taxation, advanced accounting. financial management. cost analysis. Graduates are well-prepared for various positions such as credit analyst, internal auditor, financial manager.

page_content.program: Mastère Business Development et Management de BU
page_content.program_description: Tis program at ESG aims to train professionals in strategic business development and unit management. It spans two years, focusing on key areas like business development, international expansion, project management, and leadership. The curriculum covers areas such as HR and labor law fundamentals, inclusive management, project design and innovation, international marketing and negotiation. Graduates can pursue careers as business developers, sales managers, international consultants, or unit managers.

This Mastère prepares students for careers in wealth management and related fields. The curriculum focuses on providing comprehensive knowledge and practical skills necessary for managing financial assets, investments, and client relations effectively. It covers a wide range of topics essential for wealth management, including: communication and client relationship management, project management and leadership, financial instruments and asset management.  Graduates can pursue roles such as wealth manager, financial advisor, private banker, portfolio manager, investment consultant.

This program is designed to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to succeed in entrepreneurial ventures. It aims to prepare them to become experts in marketing and commerce with a strong focus on entrepreneurship. It combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills needed to launch and manage successful businesses. The curriculum includes subjects such as business strategy, marketing techniques, and entrepreneurship principles. Students also have the opportunity to connect with industry professionals, enhancing their career prospects upon graduation.

This program provides students with the necessary skills for managing and optimizing supply chains and logistics operations. It spans two years, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application through case studies and projects. Students are encouraged to participate in professional experiences, such as internships. The curriculum focuses on strategic and operational supply chain management:, supplier relationship management, performance control, team management. Graduates of the program are well-prepared for various roles, including: supply chain manager, logistics consultant, project manager in logistics, inventory manager, distribution manager.

This program is tailored for students looking to acquire comprehensive skills in both marketing and business development. It blends theoretical and practical learning, focusing on real-world applications like business challenges, case studies, and consulting projects. Students understand the target market and consumer behavior. They learn how to build and manage brand reputation, including e-reputation. Graduates can tale one positions like various roles, such as: marketing director, product manager, brand manager, etc.

The Mastère Communication et Événementiel is a two-year program designed to prepare students for leadership roles in communication and event management. It offers a comprehensive curriculum that combines strategic communication, event management, and leadership skills. Students learn to analyze client briefs, conduct market research, develop communication strategies, and manage creative content and editorial plans. They are well-prepared for roles in corporate communication, event planning, and related industries​.

This program is designed to equip students with advanced skills in wealth management. It emphasizes practical learning through real-world projects and case studies. Students will explore various areas such as asset protection, financial planning, estate planning, and investment strategies. The curriculum covers essential topics such as insurance, retirement savings, inheritance management, financial forecasting, and asset transmission. It focus on both technical skills and soft skills like communication, project management, and customer relations​. Graduates can pursue roles such as wealth managers, financial advisors, private bankers, or investment consultants.

The Mastère Management des Ressources Humaines is a comprehensive two-year program designed to prepare students for advanced roles in HR. They learn about recruitment strategies, career management, compensation policies, and talent management. The curriculum covers organizational systems, change management, internal and external digital communication, and societal transformations. There's also a focus on consulting projects. Graduates can pursue roles such as HR consultant, HR business partner, recruitment consultant, talent manager, and more.

This master's degree is a specialized program designed to develop entrepreneurial and strategic management skills. It is structured to provide both theoretical knowledge and practical experience through a hands-on approach, including real-world business challenges and projects. Students learn to analyze business situations, develop strategic solutions, and offer consultancy services. This includes conducting market studies, performing financial diagnostics, and crafting business plans. Graduates can pursue roles such as strategy consultant, business unit manager, or even launch their own ventures.

The Bachelor Commerce Marketing offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to equip students with the necessary skills for a career in marketing and commerce. The coursework includes essential topics such as marketing fundamentals, international business, strategic marketing, digital communication, and management. It integrates project-based learning, allowing students to engage with real-world scenarios through team projects, competitions, and community initiatives​.

Bachelor in Communication is a comprehensive program designed to provide students with the necessary skills for various communication roles. The curriculum is tailored to meet the demands of contemporary businesses, emphasizing practical skills and knowledge in both digital and event communication. It includes innovative learning methods, such as Business Challenges, where students tackle real issues presented by partner companies, fostering a hands-on approach to education. Graduates can pursue various career paths, including: event project manager, advertising assistant, digital communication manager, community manager.

This program focuses on preparing students for careers in the real estate sector, particularly in commercial roles. It covers key aspects of real estate management and commercial development. Students will learn to develop commercial strategies, including market studies, consumer behavior analysis, and strategic marketing, as well as to manage operational teams within real estate firms. Graduates will be prepared for positions such as real estate sales manager, client advisor, real estate negotiator, commercial consultant, and more.

This program is designed to equip students with the necessary skills to thrive in international business environments. The curriculum offers a well-rounded education in areas such as international trade, marketing, business development, and management, with a strong focus on adapting to global market demands. It also combines face-to-face learning, group work, e-learning, and industry-related events such as conferences. Graduates are prepared for roles such as international trade manager, export manager, or business developer, capable of operating in various international markets​.

This Bachelor is designed to provide students with a comprehensive foundation in business management and progressively guide them toward a specialization that aligns with their interests and career goals. They study subjects including marketing, finance, management, and entrepreneurship. The program also emphasizes the development of soft skills and managerial competencies essential for today’s business environment. Graduates of the program are well-prepared for various roles in different sectors, such as marketing manager, business analyst, project manager, and sales executive.

This Bachelor is a comprehensive program designed to equip students with the necessary skills to manage human resources effectively within various organizations. It focuses on key areas of human resource management, including recruitment, training, employee relations, and payroll management. The curriculum is structured to provide both theoretical knowledge and practical experience, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for the workforce. They can pursue various roles such as payroll manager, HR assistant, recruitment manager, HR consultant, etc.

It is designed for individuals seeking to excel in HR roles or for those looking to transition into the field from related areas. Students are assessed through case studies, professional situational analyses, and reflective practice evaluations. It incorporates innovative learning methods, such as Business Challenges, where students address real-world issues presented by partner companies, fostering a hands-on approach to education. Graduates can pursue various career paths, including event project manager, advertising assistant, digital communication manager, and community manager.

The curriculum is structured to provide a balance of theoretical knowledge and practical experience, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for the workforce. Graduates of the program are well-prepared for various roles in different sectors, such as marketing manager, business analyst, project manager, and sales executive.

page_content.program: MBA Management et Gestion des Entreprises
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Management and Business Administration at MBA ESG is a one-year program designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of business management principles and practices. It aims to develop their ability to identify and analyze market dynamics, introduce effective management techniques, and enhance the operational skills essential for management roles. Graduates of this MBA can pursue diverse career paths, including entrepreneur, consultant in business strategy, and company director.

The MBA Business Unit Manager program is designed to equip students with the skills necessary to lead a business unit effectively. The curriculum emphasizes the development of strategies for business growth, auditing and optimizing economic performance, managing teams, and fostering innovation within organizations. Graduates are prepared for roles such as agency managers, product managers, consultants, project managers, and business coordinators. The program also highlights practical experience through professional interactions during courses and immersive business experiences, aiming to make students operational and support them in building their professional networks.

page_content.program: MBA Manager Marketing Stratégique et Opérationnel
page_content.program_description: This MBA is designed to equip students with the skills necessary to excel in marketing roles. The curriculum covers key areas such as developing market monitoring systems, analyzing the economic performance of product ranges, implementing marketing mix strategies, crafting communication strategies, and managing teams. Additionally, students gain access to digital learning resources such as CrossKnowledge and GoFluent and participate in workshops focused on public speaking, résumé building, and advanced Excel techniques. Graduates are prepared for roles such as marketing manager, brand manager, category manager, product manager, and marketing project manager.

The curriculum focuses on developing expertise in managing digital development projects, executing comprehensive digital marketing campaigns, and optimizing online customer relations and sales. It offers a blend of technical knowledge and strategic insight, enabling participants to effectively oversee digital initiatives. Graduates are well-prepared for positions such as UX designer, digital planner, traffic manager, search marketing consultant, SEA and SEO consultant, social media manager, and data manager.

It emphasizes a comprehensive understanding of legal, financial, and fiscal environments, coupled with a client-oriented commercial approach. The curriculum is also delivered by seasoned professionals, ensuring that students acquire both theoretical knowledge and practical skills relevant to the evolving field of wealth management.

The MBA Finance program aims to equip students with comprehensive knowledge and skills in corporate finance, banking, and insurance. The curriculum covers essential areas such as financial management, banking techniques, and financial markets, ensuring that graduates are well-prepared for the financial sector. A notable feature of the program is its emphasis on e-risk control, integrating digital tools and methodologies to manage financial risks effectively. This focus aligns with the evolving demands of the job market, making graduates valuable assets in modern financial environments. Career paths include financial director, administrative and financial director, financial analyst, financial consultant, credit manager, and financial engineer.

page_content.program: MBA Audit et contrôle de gestion
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on the evolving roles of auditors and controllers in organizations. It emphasizes the importance of not only producing financial figures but also analyzing and effectively communicating them to impact the organization's strategy and management. The courses blend fundamental technical subjects with transversal teachings aimed at developing a view of the organization. It focus also on ensuring the reliability of financial information, controlling costs, and generating strategic recommendations for performance optimization.

The MBA Management du Sport is designed for individuals aiming to pursue careers in the sports industry. The curriculum is comprehensive, covering essential areas such as sports law, project management, accounting, marketing, and event management. It emphasizes real-world application through case studies, practical projects, and interactions with industry professionals.

This program provides students with the skills and knowledge necessary for managerial roles in the hospitality industry. It covers various essential topics, including: hotel marketing, e-business, and digital marketing. The curriculum also includes face-to-face teaching, autonomous work, e-learning, and various related events such as conferences and study trips. Graduates are prepared for various positions in the sector such as hotel director, restaurant manager, event coordinator, sales director.

This program is structured to provide in-depth knowledge and skills related to human resource management, preparing students for leadership roles in the HR field. It combines theoretical insights with practical applications, ensuring that graduates are well-equipped to manage workforce dynamics and strategic HR initiatives in various organizational contexts.

page_content.program_description: This program offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to provide expertise in both legal and management fields. Students will develop the skills needed to serve as legal advisors in corporate settings, addressing commercial, financial, and technical issues. Graduates can pursue careers as corporate lawyers, business lawyers, contract quality managers, legal consultants, and more across various organizations.

It focuses on equipping students with the necessary skills to manage supply chain networks effectively. The courses cover essential topics such as logistics management, procurement, inventory control, and demand forecasting, integrating both theoretical knowledge and practical applications. Graduates are prepared for various roles in sectors that require robust supply chain management skills, including logistics, retail, and manufacturing. Career paths include roles such as logistics supervisor, logistics project manager, administrative logistics and customs manager, supply chain organization manager, and operations site manager.

This program offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to provide students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful career in procurement and supply chain management. They learn how to establish relationship strategies with suppliers, evaluate the financial performance of purchased products and develop purchasing specifications for products and services. Graduates can pursue various roles, including: purchasing manager, procurement controller, product manager, purchasing coordinator.

This MBA offers a comprehensive program aimed at equipping students with the necessary skills for a successful career in international business. The curriculum emphasizes the analysis of complex international contexts, helping students understand global markets and trade dynamics. It integrates professional experiences, allowing them to undertake internships or work placements to enhance their practical skills.

The curriculum covers essential areas such as strategy and creation, human management, project management, innovation, and technology. This comprehensive approach equips graduates for roles like manager of innovative and technological projects, information systems and e-business project manager, and strategy consultant. The program also emphasizes practical experience through the completion of multiple professional projects, allowing students to apply their knowledge to real-world scenarios.

They learn to conceive and develop cinematographic or television projects, oversee production processes, execute post-production operations, and implement distribution and promotion strategies. The curriculum also emphasizes hands-on learning, with opportunities to work on real-world projects and participate in industry visits to companies like TF1 and France Télévisions.

It covers a broad range of topics pertinent to these industries, including: marketing strategies specific to fashion and luxury goods, management principles tailored to the sector, digital transformation and its impact on fashion and luxury brands. Students have the option to pursue the program in full-time study or through a work-study (alternance) format, allowing them to gain practical experience alongside their academic learning.

page_content.program: MBA Management de Projets, Innovation et Technologie
page_content.program_description: This MBA aims to equip students with the skills necessary to lead innovative and technological projects within organizations. They gain a comprehensive understanding of project management, innovation, and technology, supported by a curriculum that blends theoretical knowledge with practical application, aiming to prepare them for leadership roles in these dynamic fields.

page_content.program: MBA Finance et e-Contrôle des risques
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Finance and e-Contrôle des Risques is a specialized program designed to equip students with expertise in financial management and risk control, aligning with the evolving demands of the financial sector. It offers an in-depth study of finance and risk management, integrating traditional financial principles with modern e-control methodologies to address contemporary challenges in the industry. Students can also tailor their learning by choosing from two options, allowing them to align their studies with their career aspirations.

This program designed to equip professionals with the skills necessary to develop, manage, and implement effective cybersecurity strategies within organizations. The curriculum covers key areas such as: cybersecurity fundamentals, risk management, legal and regulatory frameworks, strategic management. It emphasizes a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application, ensuring graduates are well-prepared to tackle real-world cybersecurity challenges. This MBA opens doors to various roles in cybersecurity, including: cybersecurity analyst/manager, risk management specialist, compliance officer.

page_content.program: MBA Management et Marketing du Luxe
page_content.program_description: This program is tailored to equip students with the skills necessary for a successful career in the luxury sector. It covers essential topics such as luxury brand management, marketing strategies specific to the luxury sector, and customer relationship management. The curriculum emphasizes practical experience and professional development through projects. Students have also opportunities to visit various luxury brands and engage with industry professionals, enhancing their understanding of the market and expanding their professional network.

The curriculum covers key areas such as recruitment, training, performance management, and employee relations, ensuring that graduates are well-prepared to handle the diverse challenges faced by HR professionals today. Students also have the opportunity to engage in work-study arrangements starting in the third year, allowing them to gain practical experience while continuing their education. Upon completion of the program, they can pursue roles such as HR assistant, payroll manager, trainer, HR consultant, recruitment assistant, assistant employer, and brand manager.

Students learn to manage both the administrative and regulatory aspects of human resources. The curriculum prepares them to implement and oversee CSR initiatives within organizations. It blends theoretical knowledge with practical application, including case studies, group projects, and real-world business challenges. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as human resources manager, recruitment specialist, or HR consultant.

It offers an in-depth understanding of human resources management, emphasizing both strategic and operational aspects. The curriculum aims to develop expertise in HR performance management, workforce planning, talent development, and organizational transformation. Graduates are equipped to pursue positions such as HR manager, talent acquisition specialist, or organizational development consultant.

Students are equipped with the skills to handle cultural diversity, legal differences, and varied professional practices across countries. The course focuses on expertise in HR and international mobility, managing human capital development, HR performance management, employment policy forecasting, organizational transformation, and team management. Graduates are prepared for roles such as HR business partner, human resources manager, talent management specialist, and HR consultant.

The curriculum prepares future human resources professionals to develop innovative and competitive strategies in these areas. It covers key aspects of HR management, including the design of competitive compensation packages, the analysis of remuneration policies, ensuring regulatory compliance, and understanding the fiscal, legal, and social implications. Graduates often find career opportunities as HR consultants, HR business partners, HR auditors, training and career development advisors, recruitment consultants, inclusion & disability project managers, and HR development officers.

Students will learn to oversee HR performance management at the organizational level and manage the development of an organization's human capital. The curriculum also includes real-world case studies, allowing students to apply theoretical knowledge to practical situations. Graduates can work as HR consultants, HR business partners, HR auditors, training and career development advisors, and recruitment consultants.

Graduates of the program can pursue careers such as recruitment managers, diversity officers, or human resources consultants specializing in disability management.

Students will explore how AI can be utilized in various HR functions, such as recruitment, talent management, and predictive analytics. The program also addresses the challenges and ethical considerations associated with implementing AI in HR settings.

The program includes both theoretical and practical components, with opportunities for internships or work-study arrangements to gain real-world experience.

They can pursue various roles, including sales manager, brand manager, digital marketing manager, and marketing consultant in the luxury sector.
