This connection to the industry can enhance learning through guest lectures, workshops, and internships.

page_content.program: Mastère Marketing du Luxe – Cosmétiques et Parfums
page_content.program_description: This program aims to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful career in the luxury cosmetics and fragrance industries. The curriculum focuses on key areas essential for success in luxury marketing, including branding and product development, consumer behavior analysis, and digital marketing strategies specifically tailored for luxury products. Graduates are prepared for positions such as marketing manager in cosmetics and fragrances, product manager, brand manager, or market research analyst in luxury goods.

page_content.program: Mastère Marketing du Luxe – Design, Mobilier & Décoration d’intérieur
page_content.program_description: This specialized program is crafted for individuals passionate about design and interior decoration, aiming to merge creativity with marketing expertise in the luxury sector. It prepares professionals to understand and enhance the refined world of luxury design, where every detail is paramount. The curriculum explores luxury marketing principles tailored specifically to the design, furniture, and interior decoration industries. Students gain insights into the unique characteristics of luxury consumers and the strategies required to effectively reach them. Graduates can pursue careers in luxury brand management, marketing, and interior design, equipped with the skills needed to excel in high-end design and decoration sectors.

page_content.program: Mastère Communication et événementiel dans l’industrie du Luxe
page_content.program_description: This program equips students with specialized skills in communication and event management, specifically tailored to the luxury industry. Students will learn to define a communication strategy based on an internal and external diagnosis, oversee the implementation of the organization's overall communication plan, and foster individual development through a close management approach. Graduates can pursue roles such as communication officer, media researcher, media planner, digital strategy manager, or media and social media manager.

This Bachelor is a comprehensive program aimed at equipping students with the necessary skills for a career in the tourism industry. The curriculum focuses on marketing strategies, sales techniques, and customer relationship management specific to the tourism industry. It emphasizes internships and practical experiences, allowing students to apply their knowledge in real-world settings and build a professional network. Graduates can pursue commercial development positions within tourism or hospitality companies like business developer, sales manager, key account manager, partnership manager.

This Bachelor is designed to equip students with both the technical expertise and strategic vision necessary for managing modern hospitality establishments. The comprehensive curriculum covers operational aspects such as managing accommodation services, reception, dining, bars, and maintenance operations, while also integrating contemporary trends like wellness spaces and boutiques. The program also focuses on strategic elements, including analyzing satisfaction rates, mastering performance indicators, and developing actions to optimize services. Graduates are prepared for roles such as hotel manager, operations manager, guest relations manager, revenue manager, and event coordinator.

This program aims to prepare students to excel in the restaurant industry, focusing on both operational and commercial development aspects. It offers a balanced mix of theoretical knowledge and practical application, covering areas such as strategic development and marketing in the restaurant industry, operational management and team leadership, and financial management and administrative processes. Graduate are prepared for positions like restaurant manager, commercial development manager, marketing and sales manager, event coordinator, and so on.

This master's degree is a specialized program designed to equip students with the skills necessary to excel in the event tourism marketing sector. Students gain a deep understanding of how to develop effective marketing plans tailored to these industries and learn to implement marketing strategies efficiently. By the end of the program, graduates are well-prepared to take on roles such as product manager, e-commerce product manager, brand manager, marketing project manager, or marketing and event communication manager within the tourism and event sectors.

page_content.program: Mastère en Management Hôtellerie et Restauration
page_content.program_description: This Mastère prepares students for leadership roles in the hospitality and restaurant industries. The curriculum provides them with knowledge of financial management to optimize the profitability of one or multiple hospitality venues, and they learn to conceive and implement communication strategies to enhance the brand image. The courses are also taught by professionals from the tourism and hospitality sectors, ensuring practical and up-to-date knowledge.

page_content.program: Mastère en Management de sites touristiques
page_content.program_description: This program aims to prepare students to effectively manage tourist accommodations and develop tourism strategies. They will gain competencies in designing comprehensive strategies for tourism businesses, leading teams, and managing projects focused on transformation and innovation within the tourism sector. The curriculum emphasizes practical experience through alternance (work-study), allowing students to gain hands-on industry exposure alongside their academic studies. Graduates can pursue roles such as manager of tourist accommodations, event tourism manager, heritage site manager, or tourism consultant.

The Bachelor in Management and Sustainable Development at ESG Act is a comprehensive program designed to provide an expertise in both management and sustainable development. Students acquire essential knowledge in sustainable development alongside core business competencies such as marketing, strategy, accounting, finance, and project management. This integrated approach ensures that sustainability considerations are woven into traditional business education. They also choose a specialization in either marketing or communication, allowing them to tailor their education to their career interests.

The Mastère Marketing et Développement Durable is a two-year program designed to equip students with expertise in sustainable marketing practices. The curriculum emphasizes identifying and addressing sustainability challenges within businesses. Students learn how to develop and execute sustainable operational marketing plans. The program offers a blend of theoretical courses and practical experiences, including opportunities for alternance (work-study). This approach allows them to apply classroom knowledge in real-world settings, enhancing their professional skills.

page_content.program: Mastère Chef de Projet et Développement Durable
page_content.program_description: This Mastère prepares students to lead transformation projects within organizations, emphasizing positive environmental and social impact. The courses cover topics like project planning, stakeholder management, risk assessment, and sustainability principles. Participants also learn how to manage projects, programs, operations, and portfolios effectively, supporting relevant teams. The program includes opportunities for internships and apprenticeships, offering practical experience and connection with potential employers in the field of sustainability.

This program aims to equip students with the skills necessary for sustainable purchasing practices within organizations. It is particularly relevant given the growing emphasis on sustainability in business operations. The curriculum includes integrating sustainable development goals into marketing strategies, assessing stakeholder responsibility, and understanding consumer engagement. It also highlights the management of eco-designed products, transparent communication of CSR commitments, and responsible marketing practices. Students learn about responsible sourcing, negotiation with suppliers, and incorporating sustainability into procurement processes. They are prepared for roles that require expertise in sustainable development and responsible purchasing, which are increasingly sought after in today's job market.

The Bachelor in Sport Business at ESG Sport is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in the sports industry. The curriculum focuses on defining commercial development strategies and covers fundamental aspects of sports marketing, key industry players, economic principles, business law, and consumer typologies in sports. Graduates can pursue various roles in the industry, applying their marketing and commercial expertise in areas such as sports management, event organization, or marketing within sports organizations.

page_content.program: Bachelor E-Sport Business - Communication Digitale et Événementielle
page_content.program_description: The Bachelor Esport Business - Communication Digitale et Événementielle is designed for those looking to enter the rapidly growing esports industry. It focuses on digital communication and event management specifically tailored for the esports sector. The curriculum covers topics such as event organization in esports, digital marketing and communication strategies, project management tailored to esports and gaming environments, etc. Graduates can pursue roles such as event managers, digital marketing specialists, or community managers within the esports industry.

page_content.program: Bachelor Responsable d’une salle de sport
page_content.program_description: This bachelor's program is designed for students aspiring to manage fitness facilities. It includes modules on management principles, marketing strategies tailored to sports businesses, financial management, and the operational aspects of running a gym or fitness center. The skills gained from the program prepare students for a dynamic career in the ever-evolving fitness industry. Graduates can pursue various roles, such as gym management, personal training, event organization, and sports marketing.

This Bachelor program is a comprehensive course designed to equip students with the essential skills and knowledge needed for a career in the sports communication sector. The curriculum covers the basics of marketing, specifically tailored to the sports industry, including branding, sponsorship, and event promotion. Students learn about various forms of media, communication strategies, and the role of digital platforms. They also have opportunities to engage in internships and hands-on projects, allowing them to apply their learning in real-world settings. Graduates can pursue roles such as communication officer, digital communication officer in sports, junior communication project manager, press officer, influencer officer, and sports community manager.

page_content.program: Mastère Sport Business - Clubs sportifs, Collectivités et Fédérations
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on equipping students with the necessary skills and knowledge to thrive in the sports industry, particularly in managing sports clubs, community organizations, and federations. The courses covers topics such as marketing fundamentals, market analysis, consumer typologies, and legal frameworks pertinent to sports organizations. Students learn techniques for managing customer relations and sales in a B2C context. They also participate in various experiential learning opportunities, including visits to sports infrastructures, events promoting climate awareness, and international perspectives on sports.

page_content.program: Mastère Sport Business - Commerce et distribution du sport
page_content.program_description: This program prepares students for various roles in the sports industry, focusing on commercial and distribution aspects. The curriculum covers essential areas such as strategic management in sports, marketing and communication, commercial development, sports law and ethics. Students are also encouraged to engage with real-world challenges, facilitating a deeper understanding of the industry. They are well-prepared for diverse roles, including positions in sports marketing, retail management, event organization, and sports management. The program also supports entrepreneurship in the sports field.

page_content.program: Mastère Sport Business - Entrepreneuriat Startup Sportives
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to prepare students for entrepreneurship in the sports business sector. They will learn to define and implement effective business development strategies tailored to this industry. The curriculum also offers interactions with industry professionals, including guest speakers and partnerships with organizations like Paris&Co, a renowned Parisian incubator. Graduates can take on positions such as international business developer, business development and sales, business engineering manager, key account manager, brand manager, sports equipment manager.

This program aims to prepare students for a career in real estate, with a focus on commercial management. It offers a comprehensive and progressive approach to essential disciplines such as marketing, management, and customer relations, all tailored to the specificities of the real estate sector. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical application, covering areas such as market research and consumer behavior, strategic and digital marketing, performance measurement, and client relationship management (CRM & e-CRM). Graduates are equipped to pursue various roles within the industry, such as sales manager, client advisor, real estate negotiator, agency manager, or marketing and commercial developer.

The Mastère Gestion de Patrimoine Immobilier focuses on preparing students for careers in property management and real estate wealth management. The program covers essential areas such as investment analysis, financial strategies, legal frameworks, and the valuation of real estate assets. It aims to equip students with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills through hands-on projects and internships. Students can expect to engage in a comprehensive curriculum that includes workshops, seminars, and case studies, fostering an understanding of current trends in the real estate market. This program is designed to meet the demands of the real estate industry, allowing graduates to take on roles such as property managers, investment advisors, or real estate consultants.

This specialized program is designed to prepare students for careers in real estate management and business development. The curriculum provides comprehensive training in the legal, financial, and technical aspects of real estate. Participants will learn about property valuation and market analysis and gain practical experience through internships and work placements integrated into the program. Graduates can pursue careers as real estate managers, asset managers, or project developers.

This program is designed to equip students with expertise in sustainable marketing practices, emphasizing ethics, social responsibility, and environmental sustainability within businesses. The curriculum highlights key topics such as foundational courses in marketing principles, business management, and sustainable development concepts. Students will be able to manage stakeholder relationships, including clients, suppliers, shareholders, and employees, with a focus on sustainability. They are prepared for roles like marketing manager, product manager, brand manager, corporate social responsibility (CSR) specialist.

This Bachelor aims to provide comprehensive communication skills tailored to the evolving demands of sustainable development. Students will learn to develop and implement effective internal and external communication strategies, design communication plans, and manage communication projects. The curriculum emphasizes organizing events centered on ecological transition, understanding challenges related to climate change, and utilizing tools to analyze and promote sustainability within businesses, such as carbon footprint assessments and ESG reporting. Graduates can pursue roles like sustainable communication officer, corporate social responsibility (CSR) coordinator, environmental campaign manager, sustainability consultant.

The Bachelor Développement International is tailored to equip students with expertise in international commerce, marketing, and strategy. The courses develop operational skills essential for effective market analysis, implementation of international trade techniques, management of global sales networks, and execution of marketing strategies tailored to international markets. It emphasize also a practical approach, incorporating real-world scenarios to enhance learning. Additionally, students receive training in financial management to analyze the outcomes of their action. They are well-prepared for roles such as international marketing and sales manager, international business developer, international communication manager.

The Bachelor in Law and Business at Elije aims to equip students with a strong legal foundation while providing a comprehensive understanding of business principles. The program focuses on developing practical skills and professional expertise, while also emphasizing personal and interpersonal abilities such as communication, creativity, and critical thinking. Graduates can pursue further studies, such as a Master's in Business, or enter the job market in roles such as project manager, consultant, or office manager.

The Prépa Art program at Atelier de Sèvres is a one-year intensive course designed for students who have completed their secondary education. It focuses on developing technical skills, fostering creativity, and enhancing artistic culture. Throughout the year, students receive guidance in preparing their artistic portfolios and personal statements, essential for applying to top art schools. To support the diverse needs of its students, the institution provides various specialized workshops, including screen printing, photography/video, engraving, and more.

The Prépa Art Internationalele at Atelier De Sèvres is tailored to prepare students for entrance exams to prestigious art schools both in France and internationally. It emphasizes high-quality artistic training, guidance in creating a portfolio, and intensive exam preparation. Students build foundational skills in representation techniques, creativity, and artistic culture through various courses such as drawing, creativity, and art history. The program also features expert instructors who are graduates of renowned art schools, ensuring high-quality education tailored to meet the rigorous standards of art schools.

The Prépa Animation program is designed to prepare students for entrance exams to prestigious animation schools. It emphasizes fundamental artistic skills, particularly in drawing and creativity, and includes intensive practice in various artistic methods. Students engage in a curriculum that encompasses drawing techniques, animation theory, and an understanding of cinema and animation history. By completing this year, students can enhance their chances of being accepted into top animation schools in France and internationally, such as Gobelins, Rubika, and Georges Méliès.

The Prépa Animation Internationale is a one-year preparatory program designed to equip students with the skills necessary to succeed in entrance exams for top animation schools such as Gobelins, Rubika, and EMCA. The curriculum focuses on drawing and animation, ensuring that students receive comprehensive training tailored to their specific interests and career aspirations. Additionally, the school provides access to professional resources and mentorship from experienced artists and industry professionals.

The Bachelor Animateur 2D/3D program is a three-year professional training course designed to teach students advanced techniques and professional software used in animation. It emphasizes the latest animation technologies tailored to the needs of both French and international studios. Students benefit from newly equipped facilities that promote creativity, featuring state-of-the-art technology like dedicated computers and graphic tablets. The program fosters collaboration among students, creating a supportive community that enhances their learning experience. With a focus on small class sizes, the program ensures personalized attention from instructors.

This program is tailored for students aspiring to become designers and animators in the fields of audiovisual and animated cinema. It emphasizes creativity through technical experimentation and the production of short films. Participants engage in various projects and exercises. The curriculum also covers a broad range of topics, ensuring that students acquire the essential skills needed for character design, animation techniques, and storytelling in animation.

The Bachelor in Communication program provides students with the skills necessary for a successful career in the communication industry. The curriculum covers various aspects of communication, preparing graduates for roles such as communication officer, client manager, internal communication officer, public relations officer, and copywriter.

This program aims to prepare students for careers in event management and communication. The curriculum offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical skills, covering areas such as media, design, event planning, web projects, and infographics. This comprehensive approach ensures that graduates are well-equipped to enter the professional world of event communication.

This Bachelor is tailored to train students to effectively manage and animate online communities. Throughout the curriculum, they learn to oversee social media platforms, engage with audiences, and maintain a positive online presence for brands or organizations. The program offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical experience. In the first year, students receive a comprehensive introduction to communication strategies and digital tools. The second year emphasizes professionalization through alternating periods of study and internships, allowing them to apply their skills in real-world settings. This approach ensures that graduates are well-prepared to enter the workforce with relevant experience.

The Bachelor in Journalism at Narratiiv focuses on modern information consumption, digital tools, and storytelling techniques. It is designed for motivated candidates and offers a comprehensive curriculum that prepares students for various journalism roles, including multimedia journalism, sports journalism, and podcasting. The program emphasizes practical learning experiences, with a strong focus on collaboration with industry professionals and real-world projects.

Année Passerelle Communication at Narratiiv is a bridging program designed for individuals seeking to transition into the field of communication. This program is particularly beneficial for those who have completed studies in other disciplines and wish to acquire professional skills in communication. It offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers essential aspects of communication, enabling students to effectively integrate into advanced communication studies or related professional roles.

Année Passerelle Journalisme at Narratiiv is a program designed for those who wish to transition into journalism. This bridge year provides foundational training in journalism, covering various media formats such as print, radio, television, and digital platforms. The curriculum also emphasizes media ethics, press law, and the history of media. Upon completion, students have the opportunity to specialize further by entering the 4th year of the journalism program, choosing from options like: sports journalist, plurimedia journalist, radio/TV journalist, and more.

page_content.program: Année Passerelle Création et Design Graphique
page_content.program_description: Année Passerelle Création et Design Graphique is a one-year bridging program designed for students who wish to specialize in creation and graphic design or pursue further studies in a related master's program.

The Mastère Stratégie de Communication is a comprehensive program designed to equip students with the skills necessary to develop and manage global communication strategies. They learn how to define and implement overarching marketing and communication strategies for organizations, lead the deployment of these strategies across various platforms, and manage teams within communication departments effectively.

page_content.program: BTS SIO Services Informatiques aux Organisations
page_content.program_description: is a two-year vocational diploma aimed at training students in IT services for organizations. This program is offered in two specializations: SLAM (Solutions Logicielles et Applications Métiers) and SISR (Solutions d'infrastructure, systèmes et réseaux). The curriculum includes a blend of general and professional subjects such as general knowledge and expression, mathematics for it, cybersecurity, economic, legal, and managerial culture. The coursework is also designed to prepare students for various roles within IT services, equipping them with skills to tackle repetitive tasks and develop technical solutions.
page_content.school: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

page_content.program: BTS NDRC Négociation et Digitalisation de la Relation Client
page_content.program_description: The BTS NDRC aims to prepare students for roles in client relations and negotiation within various industries. This two-year program combines theoretical knowledge and practical skills to equip them for immediate professional insertion in the evolving market of client relations, especially in digital contexts. The curriculum focuses on essential skills such as negotiation techniques and digital strategies for managing client relationships. Graduates can pursue various roles, including customer relationship management, sales, and business development.

page_content.program_description: This program is designed to train specialists in the management and security of enterprise networks. It focuses on the design, implementation, administration, and security of computer networks. Graduates will work closely with users, and they may also be involved in training them, collaborating with database administrators, technical webmasters, and developers when necessary​. The program also emphasizes practical skills and knowledge required to operate effectively in various roles within the IT sector, preparing students for a dynamic and increasingly crucial field.
page_content.school: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

page_content.program_description: This program aims to provide skills for managing retail operations and leading sales teams. It focuses on various aspects of store management, problem identification, and solution development, allowing to blend practical knowledge with theoretical understanding. The program is offered in partnership with the University Paris-Est Créteil (UPEC), enhancing its academic credibility. Students can earn a Bachelor's degree from PST&B alongside their professional license, providing a comprehensive educational experience that combines commerce and technology. Graduates are prepared for careers in sectors such as e-commerce and digital marketing, making them attractive to potential employers.

page_content.program_description: This program focuses on preparing students for careers in web development, equipping them with the necessary technical skills and knowledge. The curriculum emphasizes both the technical aspects of web development and the business context within which these technologies operate. It incorporates project-based learning, enabling participants to apply their skills in real-world scenarios through partnerships with industry leaders.

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor in Systèmes Réseaux & Cloud is a three-year program designed to prepare students for careers in the growing field of information systems and network management. Its curriculum focuses on developing hybrid profiles that can manage various environments, including local networks, cloud, and hybrid systems. Students learn to administer and design large-scale IT infrastructures. The courses include virtualization, cloud computing, advanced computer networks, and network and cloud security. Graduates can pursue various roles, such as systems information architect, project manager, and lead developer.

Graduates can pursue roles such as data protection officer, SOC analyst, cyber assistant, security solutions integrator.

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor in Data & Artificial Intelligence is a three-year program tailored to provide students with hybrid skills in data management and artificial intelligence. The curriculum covers advanced database skills, big data, networking, communication, and advanced programming in Python. It also aims to develop expertise in data exploitation, focusing on designing and deploying algorithmic solutions based on data analysis. Students will learn to create structured databases, develop web and mobile interfaces, and optimize data interactions, thus opening doors to new opportunities in the digital realm.

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor in Communication & Digital Marketing provides expertise in marketing and communication. Recognizing the crucial role of effective communication in business, the program focuses on developing specialized skills in this area. Students can expect to gain knowledge in defining communication plans and implementing company strategies. The curriculum is structured to keep them updated with emerging technologies that enhance marketing efforts, preparing them for roles such as marketing and communication manager, SEO/SEA consultant, brand manager, UI/UX designer.

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor E-Commerce program aims to equip students with specialized expertise in current web technologies, while also enhancing their business and management skills. This hybrid approach ensures graduates are well-prepared for the evolving digital marketplace. Throughout the program, students gain in-depth knowledge of e-commerce platforms, digital marketing strategies, and the technological infrastructure that supports online businesses. The curriculum emphasizes practical experience, with opportunities for internships and projects that mirror real-world scenarios. Graduates are equipped to pursue careers such as web marketing manager, campaign manager, traffic manager, or SEO consultant.

page_content.program_description: This program integrates computer science and business education. Graduates can take on positions such as tech business developer, product manager, director of sales for data & AI, technical sales manager.

page_content.program: Double Diplôme Concepteur Développeur Global Programming
page_content.program_description: The Bachelor in Concepteur Développeur Global Programming is a program offered by both the Paris School of Technology & Business (PST&B) and EFREI Paris. This program is designed to equip students with comprehensive skills in web and application development, enabling them to thrive in various business environments. The curriculum is designed to train developers capable of creating and managing websites, mobile applications, and software solutions that are sustainable, secure, and scalable. Students have the chance to earn a double diploma, combining technical expertise with business acumen. This is facilitated through partnerships between PST&B and EFREI Paris.
page_content.school: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

It is designed to offer both technical expertise and managerial skills necessary to protect businesses in an evolving digital landscape. The courses emphasize the design and maintenance of secure information systems, enabling students to effectively address and mitigate cyber threats. Graduates receive a double diploma from PST&B and EFREI Paris, providing a significant advantage in the job market by showcasing dual expertise.

This expertise will enable them to influence and guide the marketing strategies of various businesses. Graduates can expect to find roles such as data analysts, business intelligence experts, and data scientists in various sectors, benefiting from the practical experience gained during their studies through company placements.

page_content.program_description: The Mastère FinTech is a specialized program designed to equip students with comprehensive knowledge and skills in the financial technology sector. It emphasizes both theoretical and practical aspects of FinTech, addressing the growing demand for professionals who can navigate and innovate within this rapidly evolving field. The courses covers various topics, including digital banking, blockchain technology, cryptocurrency, and risk management. Students will gain insights into how technology is transforming financial services. They can pursue positions in banking, investment management, and risk analysis. The program prepares them to work in dynamic environments and adapt to changing market conditions.

It focuses on equipping students with the tools and methodologies necessary to analyze marketing data effectively. They will master various aspects of marketing analytics, including: understanding and utilizing marketing data, developing strategies based on data insights, and enhancing decision-making processes through analytics. Graduates of this program are prepared for positions like product manager, UK manager, product innovation manager, etc.

page_content.program_description: The Double Diplôme MSc Cybersécurité & IA offered by the Paris School of Technology & Business (PST&B) in partnership with EFREI Paris is designed to equip students with essential skills in cybersecurity and artificial intelligence. It allows them to pursue dual degrees, enhancing their expertise and employability in these rapidly evolving fields. The curriculum focuses on the interplay between cybersecurity and artificial intelligence, preparing participants to tackle modern challenges in digital security and intelligent systems. Graduates can pursue various roles, including cybersecurity analysts, AI specialists, and data protection officers, benefiting from the growing demand for professionals in these sectors.
page_content.school: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

metadata.school_name: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

page_content.program_description: The Paris School of Technology & Business (PST&B), in collaboration with EFREI Paris, offers an innovative Double Diploma MSc in Data Management. This program combines technical coursework with hands-on projects, equipping students to tackle data analysis challenges. The curriculum is designed to provide both managerial and technical expertise, enhancing graduates' readiness for the professional world.
page_content.school: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

metadata.school_name: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

page_content.program_description: The Double Diploma MSc in Cybersecurity & Management, offered collaboratively by Paris School of Business (PSB) and EFREI Paris, is designed to develop professionals adept at addressing contemporary cybersecurity challenges. This innovative program equips students with both technical expertise and managerial skills, enabling them to effectively anticipate and respond to cyber threats. Graduates are well-prepared for careers in consulting and auditing, possessing a profile that aligns with the demands of employers in the cybersecurity field.
page_content.school: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

metadata.school_name: Paris School Of Technology & Business (Galileo Group)

page_content.program_description: The MSc in Fintech & Digital Sustainability at ESAM is designed for students aiming to pursue careers in financial services, fintech, and sustainable digital solutions. It provides a comprehensive understanding of fintech innovations and their application in promoting digital sustainability. The curriculum focuses on practical knowledge and digital tools essential for addressing challenges in digital finance. Students will develop critical thinking skills pertinent to current fintech issues and learn to propose appropriate solutions. They are equipped to take on roles such as data scientist, project manager, fintech consultant, data risk manager, and growth hacker.

The MSc in Strategic Management & Leadership at ESAM is a two-year program designed to develop entrepreneurial leaders capable of formulating and implementing effective business strategies. The curriculum focuses on quipping students to define comprehensive company strategies that leverage market opportunities and identify growth drivers across various sectors and regions. Graduates can pursue roles such as profit center manager, SME or branch manager, consultant in organization and global strategy, business developer, project manager, sales and administrative manager.

This program focuses on equipping students with the ability to create and manage visual identities for businesses, brands, and organizations. Through a multidisciplinary approach, it helps them develop skills in strategic communication, brand image, and storytelling. The curriculum integrates elements of graphic design, marketing, and digital strategy, aiming to produce designers capable of shaping the identity of 21st-century companies in an evolving digital and societal landscape​.

This program offers a comprehensive education in product design. It is designed to prepare students for the evolving needs of the design industry. Over five years, they will develop the skills to observe, innovate, and design products that meet user needs while anticipating future trends. The curriculum also emphasizes hands-on learning, combining theoretical knowledge with real-world projects, making graduates ready for professional design roles.

This specialized program aims to provide students with the skills necessary to create user-centered digital experiences. The curriculum emphasizes both UX (user experience) and interaction design, focusing on the functional, aesthetic, and emotional elements of digital interfaces. Participants gain expertise in understanding user needs, crafting seamless interactions, and designing systems that enhance the overall experience of digital products. The program prepares graduates for careers in web and mobile interface design, user research, and interaction strategy.

This program trains students to become designers of collective and shared spaces, focusing on environments where people live, work, and interact, including offices, homes, commercial areas, green spaces, and larger territorial spaces. The course integrates key contemporary challenges, preparing students to design innovative, functional spaces that address both social and ecological concerns.

This program prepares students to become specialists in designing mobility solutions for both people and goods. It emphasizes a deep understanding of mobility needs in the modern world, integrating sustainable and innovative design concepts. Participants learn how to create practical, aesthetically pleasing, and forward-thinking mobility objects and systems, while addressing emerging technological, economic, ecological, and social challenges. Throughout the program, they engage with cutting-edge design practices, working on real-world projects that involve prototyping and user-centered approaches to mobility design.

The double diploma in Industrial Design & Engineering offered by Strate School of Design and ESILV (École Supérieure d'Ingénieurs Léonard de Vinci) focuses on the ideation, conception, and creation of objects meant for industrial mass production. This field emphasizes designing functional and aesthetically pleasing products for daily use, including furniture, household appliances, and vehicles. The program teaches principles such as functionality, reproducibility, and market relevance, as well as the importance of durability and user safety in product design. The curriculum focus on building a solid foundation in design techniques and industrial processes, and includes advanced specialization and real-world projects. Graduates are prepared for careers such as industrial designer, product designer, or project manager.

This program is designed for those interested in creating sustainable and innovative mobility solutions. It focuses on conceiving vehicles, transport networks, and mobility systems that are responsible, inclusive, and durable. The curriculum is aimed at developing both creative and technical expertise, making graduates valuable assets in an industry that is rapidly evolving towards more sustainable practices. Participants will engage in hands-on projects, collaborating with industry professionals to design future-oriented mobility experiences.

This program focuses on hands-on learning and the creation of tangible models, making it ideal for those interested in practical design and product development. It aims to train students in prototyping skills, from conceptualization to the realization of functional models, using various materials and techniques. It is designed for individuals looking to bridge creativity and technical proficiency, preparing them for careers in industrial design, engineering, and innovative product design​.

Mastère Innovation x Design is a one-year post-graduate program designed for students and professionals across various fields, aimed at mastering innovation management through design. This program emphasizes interdisciplinary collaboration and real-world project experience, preparing participants to lead transformative, sustainable innovations in diverse organizations.

page_content.program: MSc Strategy & Design for the anthropocene
page_content.program_description: This program, created in collaboration with ESC Clermont Business School, is designed to train professionals in the fields of design and strategic management, focusing on transforming organizations to address ecological disruptions and challenges of the Anthropocene. Students will learn to implement transition policies within organizations, develop new forms of inquiry to tackle critical situations, and design sustainable futures while navigating ecological, social, and legal constraints. This program is particularly relevant for addressing issues such as resource scarcity, climate change, and social crises.

This program focuses on design within territorial contexts and the mastery of user needs. It emphasizes understanding the relationship between design and the environment, engaging with both urban and rural settings to create innovative solutions that cater to users' experiences and interactions. The curriculum aims to equip students with the skills to analyze and address the complexities of territories, fostering a design approach that integrates user feedback and promotes sustainability. It also combines theoretical knowledge with practical applications, encouraging them to engage with real-world challenges in various territorial contexts.

This program is designed to train students in the art of interior architecture, focusing on the layout of built environments, control of volumes and spaces, and ergonomics. It encourages participants to develop spaces that are aligned with the aesthetic values and activities of brands, covering every stage from concept to realization. The curriculum combines academic lessons with modern, practical applications, fostering creative autonomy in students. It also covers residential design, event design, spatial and scenic design, furniture design, and 3D architectural modeling, ensuring a broad and versatile skill set for graduates.

This program stands out due to its strong emphasis on creativity, interdaisciplinary learning, and practical application. It integrates communication strategies with graphic design and digital media, preparing students for careers in art direction, branding, and media management. Graduates are prepared for roles such as communication director, strategy director, brand director, marketing director, event director, innovation director, sponsorship and partnership director, and more.

This program focuses on teaching students to develop a unique, powerful visual identity while mastering different design methods, technical tools, and communication strategies. The curriculum is designed to enhance their creativity and technical expertise, preparing them for careers in various fields such as publishing, video, cinema, 2D/3D image-making, and digital design.

This Bachelor is designed for those passionate about the art market and seeking comprehensive training in art history, market dynamics, and the management of art transactions. This three-year program allows students to explore various aspects of the art market, covering periods such as ancient and modern art, contemporary art, and includes a strong focus on international markets. The curriculum is enriched with professional internships and practical experiences, such as visits to galleries, museums, and auction houses, ensuring students gain hands-on knowledge about the art world. Students have also the opportunity to choose one specialization in their second year to align their studies with specific career goals in the global art market.

page_content.program: Bachelor ICC - Industries Culturelles et Créatives
page_content.program_description: This program at IESA arts&culture is designed to prepare students for careers in the management and production of cultural industries. It focuses on various domains such as cultural production, audiovisual arts, cinema, music, and cultural communication. The first two years of the program provide a foundation in cultural industries and creative practices, while the third year allows students to specialize in specific areas such as Cultural Production or Cultural Communication. The curriculum also includes hands-on projects, internships, and collaborations with professionals in the field, ensuring that participants gain practical experience alongside theoretical knowledge. Graduates can pursue roles in cultural project management, event production, media, and more.

This program focuses on providing students with a comprehensive understanding of cultural production, from concept to execution. It equips them with the necessary skills to manage and produce cultural projects in various sectors such as visual arts, performing arts, and cultural events. The curriculum is designed to balance theoretical knowledge with practical experience, emphasizing project management, production techniques, and the development of artistic concepts. Graduates of this program can pursue various roles in the cultural sector, such as: project manager for cultural events, production coordinator for arts organizations, consultant in cultural industries.

This Bachelor focuses on equipping students with the skills needed for communication within cultural environments. It is designed to provide a solid foundation in both theory and practice, enabling them to understand and engage with the cultural sector effectively. The curriculum covers various aspects of cultural communication, including marketing for cultural institutions, project management in cultural settings, and audience development. Graduates can pursue various roles in the sector, including positions in communication and marketing for museums, galleries, festivals, and other cultural organizations.

Mastère Art ancien et moderne is a two-year graduate program designed for students who wish to specialize in the historical and contemporary art markets. It offers a comprehensive understanding of art from ancient times through the modern era, with a focus on art history, market dynamics, and the skills necessary to work in auction houses, galleries, museums, and cultural institutions. The courses also integrate market analysis, art valuation, and the study of current trends in collecting and dealing in art. Students gain practical experience through internships and participation in art fairs and exhibitions. They are well-equipped to pursue careers as art historians, curators, auction specialists, and cultural project managers.

This Mastère is tailored for individuals passionate about contemporary art and looking to build a career in the art market. This two-year program focuses on the professional skills needed to manage galleries, assist contemporary artists, direct expertise departments in art auction houses, and more. The curriculum also includes hands-on experience, with internships and professionalization contracts tailored to each student's career goals.

This program is designed for those who want to specialize in curating exhibitions in contemporary art. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical experience, preparing students for careers in museums, galleries, and cultural institutions. They learn how to conceptualize and manage art exhibitions, covering aspects like project management, exhibition design, and the financial and legal frameworks involved in curating. The program also include courses in art history, cultural mediation, and communication, allowing to develop a strong foundation in both the creative and administrative aspects of the profession.

This program prepares students for leadership roles in cultural communication. It equips them with advanced knowledge and skills in developing and managing communication strategies for cultural organizations, such as museums, festivals, and cultural institutions. The curriculum focuses on both theoretical and practical aspects of cultural communication, including media relations, digital strategy, event planning, and branding within the cultural sector. Students engage in real-world projects and internships, allowing them to apply their knowledge in professional settings. The program also covers the latest trends in digital transformation, audience development, and the use of social media in cultural communication.

This Mastère at IESA arts&culture is designed for individuals aiming to specialize in the music industry. It equips students with comprehensive knowledge of music production, distribution, and promotion, while also covering the cultural and creative aspects of the industry. The curriculum focuses on key skills necessary for managing music-related projects, whether it's managing artists, organizing concerts, or developing marketing strategies for music distribution. It combines theoretical knowledge with practical experience through industry partnerships and internships, giving participants a strong foundation for a career in music management. The course also covers the legal and financial aspects of the music business, ensuring that graduates are prepared for various roles in this competitive field.

page_content.program: Mastère production et diffusion de spectacle vivant
page_content.program_description: This program aims to provide in-depth knowledge and skills required for managing, producing, and promoting live performances. The curriculum focuses on the entire production cycle of live shows, from conceptualization to dissemination, covering various forms of live entertainment such as theater, concerts, dance, and festivals. Students learn key aspects of cultural project management, including budgeting, production logistics, marketing strategies, audience development, and funding. The course emphasizes practical experience, offering them opportunities to work directly with professionals in the field and participate in live projects. The aim is to equip graduates with the necessary expertise to work in different sectors of the live performance industry, including arts organizations, production companies, and event management agencies.

page_content.program: Mastère Production et distribution cinéma & audiovisuel
page_content.program_description: This Mastère focuses on equipping students with the essential skills and knowledge for careers in the film and audiovisual industries. The curriculum aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of the production and distribution processes in cinema and audiovisual sectors, covering areas such as project management, financing, marketing strategies, and distribution channels. It also combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills, students will have opportunities to work on real-world projects and collaborate with industry professionals, which is crucial for gaining practical experience. They are well-prepared for various roles in the industry, including film and television producers, distribution managers, project coordinators in audiovisual production.

This program is designed to address the specific needs of cultural mediation, combining theoretical knowledge with practical applications. It prepares students to navigate and influence the landscape of cultural policies and practices. The curriculum highlights the importance of cultural mediation in promoting dialogue between diverse audiences and cultural institutions. It emphasizes real-world applications, including internships and projects that connect students with cultural institutions and organizations. Participants also benefit from the guidance of experienced professionals and academics in the field. The faculty's diverse backgrounds enrich the learning environment and provide insights into current trends and challenges in the cultural sector. Graduates of this program can pursue various roles in cultural institutions, non-profits, and governmental organizations, focusing on community engagement and cultural policy.

The Bachelor in Arts Management at IESA arts&culture is designed to provide comprehensive education in managing artistic and cultural projects. It is taught in English and is ideal for students aiming to pursue careers in art galleries, museums, cultural institutions, and the broader creative industries. The curriculum covers areas such as art history, marketing and communication strategies for cultural projects, legal and financial management of artistic endeavors, and the understanding of global art markets. It also emphasizes the development of leadership and organizational skills tailored to the needs of the arts sector. Graduates are well-prepared to enter the job market in roles such as gallery manager, cultural project coordinator, art consultant, etc.

The MBA in Arts & Cultural Management offered by IESA arts&culture, in collaboration with the Paris School of Business, is a comprehensive program aimed at preparing students for leadership roles in the global arts and culture sector. This program provides a blend of theoretical and practical learning, focusing on the development of managerial, financial, and marketing skills necessary for the successful administration of arts and cultural institutions. Students also get the opportunity to network with professionals and organizations within the cultural sector. They also get the opportunity to network with professionals and organizations within the cultural sector.

page_content.program: MBA in Performing arts management & Entertainment
page_content.program_description: This MBA is tailored for individuals aiming to build a career in managing performing arts and entertainment industries. It offers in-depth knowledge of how to manage live performances, cultural events, and entertainment companies, balancing creative and managerial aspects. The course covers a wide range of subjects, including project management, marketing, and financial management within the cultural and entertainment sectors. Students gain hands-on experience through internships and study trips to culturally significant cities such as Berlin. These trips provide insights into international performing arts and entertainment practices.

page_content.program: MBA in Contemporary Art: Sales, Display and Collecting
page_content.program_description: This program is designed for those aspiring to specialize in the contemporary art market. It focuses on developing expertise in key areas such as sales strategies, curatorial practices, art display, and the processes behind art collecting. The curriculum provides in-depth knowledge of the art market, art history, and the cultural industry, helping understand the dynamics of contemporary art from a commercial and curatorial perspective. Participants explore the financial, legal, and logistical aspects of art collection, including provenance research and the ethics of collecting. The program includes hands-on experience through internships, networking events, and site visits to galleries, museums, and art fairs in France and beyond. This ensures that students build both the practical skills and industry connections necessary for successful careers in the contemporary art world.

This program offers a comprehensive curriculum designed for students passionate about the audiovisual and cinematic industries. It is structured over 4 years, each focusing on a different aspect of filmmaking and production. The training begins with a first year that focuses on foundational skills across multiple disciplines such as screenwriting, cinematography, and direction, while also emphasizing group collaboration and practical exercises like short film production. By the second year, students further develop their understanding of cinematic language and techniques, undertaking more advanced projects, such as short films and documentaries, all while gaining insight into different film styles and historical aesthetics. In the third year, participants have the opportunity to specialize in a particular area of filmmaking. This specialization prepares them for a professional career, and they are required to produce several films throughout the year.

This program is designed for students interested in becoming professional film editors. Its curriculum focuses on developing both technical and creative skills essential for film and audiovisual editing. It combines theoretical learning, hands-on production experience, and internships. Students work on real film projects, gaining practical experience and building a professional portfolio. Graduates can pursue positions such as video editor, sound editor, multimedia editor, assistant editor, post-production manager, special effects editor, camera operator, subtitle editor.

This program is designed for individuals aiming to become professional script supervisors, a critical role in film and television production. It offers comprehensive training in the craft of script, covering the responsibilities involved in continuity, time management, and collaboration with directors and production teams. The curriculum is structured over 3 years, with an emphasis on practical experience, including regular short film projects and internships that help students build industry contacts.

This course is tailored for those interested in managing film and audiovisual production. It covers all aspects of production, including technical logistics, personnel management, and the legal and financial aspects of filmmaking. Throughout the program, students engage in both theoretical and practical learning. The theoretical classes cover essential topics such as film economics, copyright laws, production management, and cinema history, while the practical sessions involve producing various types of projects like short films and documentaries under the supervision of industry professionals.

This program is designed for students who want to develop their screenwriting skills through hands-on practice. It is highly practical, focusing on real-world scenarios to prepare students for the constraints and challenges of professional filmmaking. Throughout the course, they engage in collaborative projects that mirror industry conditions, fostering teamwork across various cinema professions, such as directing, producing, and editing.

This program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive education in filmmaking, emphasizing both theoretical and practical aspects. The curriculum covers film culture and professional vocabulary, and practical workshops that focus on using film equipment and exploring different filmmaking roles. Graduates are prepared for roles such as assistant director, casting director, production assistant, technical advisor for film direction, and production manager.

The BTS Audiovisuel program at CIFACOM is designed to equip students with essential skills in the audiovisual field, focusing on both technical and creative aspects. It typically spans two years and can be completed through alternating periods of classroom study and practical work in the field. Students can specialize in different tracks, including: montage, sound, image, and production. This BTS is a recognized qualification that can lead to various career paths in the audiovisual sector, such as sound engineer, production assistant, or editor. CIFACOM supports students in their job search through its relations with industry partners.

This is a one-year program is designed to train students in the fields of video and sound editing, providing a comprehensive understanding of audiovisual production. The curriculum focuses on developing both technical and artistic skills essential for a career in this field. Students work on various projects including trailers, documentaries, short films, and commercials. The program includes practical learning with professional filming equipment and is taught by experienced industry professionals. Graduates are prepared for various roles such as video and audio editors, post-production supervisors, and even independent filmmakers.

This program focuses on training students to become skilled professionals in audiovisual post-production, specializing in visual effects and video editing. It is designed to enhance technical skills in montage and to introduce advanced techniques for creating realistic effects, giving them the tools to bring imaginative concepts to life on screen​.

This program is designed for students aiming to excel in project management within the cultural and audiovisual sectors. Students will learn to analyze artistic challenges, assess production costs, and coordinate technical, logistical, and human resources necessary for project realization. The course emphasizes hands-on learning, incorporating insights from industry professionals to complement theoretical knowledge. Graduates can pursue roles such as production director or cultural project manager in various environments, including cultural institutions and audiovisual production companies.

This Bachelor offers a comprehensive education in graphic design, aimed at preparing students for various roles in the creative industry. It emphasizes both theoretical and practical knowledge, covering key areas such as graphic design, web design, illustration, motion design, and 2D/3D design. Students will engage in hands-on workshops and projects that mimic real-world scenarios, enhancing their skills in a collaborative environment. Graduates of the program can pursue various positions such as graphic designer, web designer, illustrator, motion designer, and more.

The Bachelor Motion Design focuses on equipping students with the skills to become specialists in visual communication through motion design, also known as animated design. This one-year program is conducted in an alternating rhythm, allowing participants to apply their learning in a real-world business context. The curriculum is designed to cover a variety of applications for motion design, which is increasingly prevalent in television, cinema, advertising, video games, and mobile applications. Graduates can take on positions such as animator, video editor, VFX artist, and graphic designer.

This program is tailored for students seeking advanced training in artistic direction. It focuses on developing the skills needed to oversee creative projects across various media, including graphic design, advertising, and digital communications. The curriculum combines theoretical and practical approaches, allowing students to engage in real-world projects while learning key concepts in artistic direction, visual communication, and design thinking. Graduates are prepared for roles such as web designer, UX designer, UI designer, art director, web art director, and so on.

This BTS is designed to prepare students for careers in communication, focusing on developing skills to manage and execute communication strategies. The curriculum covers a range of topics essential for future communication professionals, including creating and managing communication projects, designing communication campaigns, and mastering digital and traditional communication channels. Students learn to craft impactful messages, adapt communication strategies to different target audiences, and manage the technical aspects of media production. Graduates have job opportunities include roles such as communication assistant, project manager, or web marketer.

This program is tailored to prepare students for careers in the real estate sector. The curriculum provides a comprehensive education in real estate professions, with courses in property law, management, marketing, and negotiation. It includes professionalizing internships and practical workshops that help students transition smoothly into the job market. Graduates can pursue careers in real estate agencies, property management, or real estate development.

This program aims to train students for roles within the notarial profession. The curriculum covers various aspects of notarial work, including legal procedures, client management, and document preparation. Participants learn about real estate law, family law, and business law, which are crucial for working in a notary's office. Graduates can pursue various career paths, including roles as notary assistants, legal advisors, or in real estate negotiation.

This program is designed to introduce students to the fundamental skills and tools needed for careers in the digital world. The curriculum includes a broad overview of digital technologies and essential skills, such as web development, UX design, and digital marketing. This year of discovery allows to explore various fields within the digital industry before selecting a more specialized path in their second year. Participants will gain hands-on experience with real-world projects and are guided by professionals. The goal is to develop digital expertise while building essential soft skills like creativity, teamwork, and communication.

This program is tailored for those who already hold a Bac+2 and are looking to quickly transition into the digital sector. This intensive one-year program allows students to enhance their skills in digital project management, becoming proficient in areas such as UX/UI design, web development, and digital communication. It opens doors to various roles in the digital sector, such as project manager, digital communication strategist, or web developer.

This Bachelor aims to prepare students for a career as web developers, focusing on both front-end and back-end development. It covers essential skills needed in the digital job market, such as coding, web architecture, and application development. Students also engage in real-world projects to apply their skills in practical settings, enhancing their problem-solving abilities and creativity. Graduates can pursue various roles such as web developer, full stack developer, project manager in web development, technical expert in software development.

This  2-year program is designed to train students in professional makeup techniques across various sectors such as cinema, television, fashion, special effects (SFX), live performances, and beauty. The curriculum covers a wide range of makeup skills to prepare them for careers in these creative industries. It is structured to provide hands-on experience through workshops and real-world projects. ITM Paris emphasizes building connections with industry professionals, offering networking opportunities through its alumni network and professional partnerships.

This Bachelor aims to train students in professional makeup artistry, particularly for cinema and special effects. It equips them with all the skills needed and focuses on makeup techniques that create realistic special effects, character makeup, and prosthetics. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical workshops, often led by industry professionals, to ensure hands-on experience. Graduates will be prepared for careers as professional makeup artists specializing in special effects, working on film sets, television productions, or even live theater.

The Bachelor Maquilleur Mode & Beauté aims to prepare students for careers in the fashion and beauty industries. It emphasizes professional makeup artistry skills, particularly in fashion shows, photo shoots, and beauty editorials. The curriculum is a mix of theoretical lessons and practical experiences to develop techniques in makeup application for high fashion, special events, and beauty. The program also includes training on new industry technologies and trends.

This program focuses on developing students' expertise in makeup artistry and hairstyling for various professional sectors, such as fashion, cinema, television, and theater. They receive a comprehensive education that includes practical and theoretical training, equipping them with the skills needed to excel in these creative industries.

page_content.program: Bachelor Cosmétiques & Luxe - Développement Commercial et Marketing
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on developing expertise in promoting and managing luxury cosmetic products. It covers essential areas such as market analysis, luxury branding, product development, and sales strategies, tailored to the demands of the high-end cosmetics industry. The final year includes an apprenticeship or professionalization contract, allowing participants to gain hands-on experience.

The Bachelor in Graphic Design is a comprehensive program focused on training creative professionals in visual communication. The curriculum spans three years and is designed to equip students with essential skills in graphic design, including mastery of software tools, development of creative concepts, and a deep understanding of branding and visual storytelling. Participants also engage in projects that simulate real-world scenarios, working on various media such as print, digital, and web design. They learn how to conceptualize and create visual identities, packaging, editorial designs, and websites, making them versatile across multiple graphic disciplines. The program also emphasizes the importance of understanding client needs, developing strong communication skills, and working collaboratively on projects.

This Bachelor is a comprehensive program designed for those who interested in pursuing a career in spatial design and environment creation. Students will acquire competencies in space conception and 3D modeling, and proficiency in utilizing innovative technologies, such as virtual reality, to enhance their design projects. Graduates can pursue careers in various fields, including: architectural firms, event management companies, global design agencies, retail design studios.

This Bachelor is tailored for aspiring fashion professionals, focusing on both fashion design and accessory creation. Throughout the course, students will learn to create clothing collections and accessory lines for various demographics, including women, men, and children. The program emphasizes trend analysis, helping participants to develop a keen eye for fashion innovations. This dual specialization enhances graduates' attractiveness in the job market. They pursue careers in various sectors, including ready-to-wear fashion, haute couture, department stores, and even the entertainment industry.

The Bachelor Animation 2D program is designed for those who want to master the art of 2D animation, offering a comprehensive curriculum that blends creativity with technical skills. It emphasizes the development of a strong artistic foundation, as well as the understanding of animation principles and techniques. The curriculum covers essential tools and software used in the animation industry, including storyboarding, character design, and animation production.

This program is tailored for those who wish to specialize in 3D animation. Throughout the course, students gain in-depth technical skills in 3D modeling, animation, and production processes. The curriculum emphasizes creativity, storytelling, and professional-level mastery of animation tools. Participants also work on various projects, gaining hands-on experience that prepares them for careers in the animation industry, whether in video games, film, or visual effects.

The Bachelor Concept Art program at Bellecour is a comprehensive three-year course designed to develop expertise in creating visual concepts for the entertainment industry, especially video games and animation. The curriculum emphasizes both creative and technical skills, with a strong focus on character design, environment design, creature design, and 3D modeling. Throughout the program, students are encouraged to work on illustration, visual storytelling, and digital rendering, which culminates in the creation of a professional portfolio that showcases their personal style and versatility. This portfolio is essential for launching a career in concept art. In addition to the artistic aspects, the program includes courses in business English, culture of the image, and professional development, helping students understand the business side of the creative industry.

This Bachelor is designed for those who passionate about video games, aiming to develop creative and technical skills to become game designers. It emphasizes a strong foundation in game mechanics, level design, and the development of both board and digital games. Students will learn to conceptualize, prototype, and produce games, combining creativity with practical knowledge. The curriculum also integrates aspects of storytelling, animation, and user experience design to provide a well-rounded education in game creation. Graduates can pursue various careers, such as game designer, level designer, and project manager in game development studios.

This program aims to develop high-level expertise in interior architecture. It focuses on creating functional, aesthetic, and sustainable interior spaces. The curriculum covers various aspects of interior design, including architectural culture, design techniques, and innovative 3D modeling. One of the unique elements of this program is the emphasis on professionalization, helping students become industry-ready through workshops, real-world projects in collaboration with external partners, and access to a wide professional network.

page_content.program: Mastère Direction Artistique et Design Digital
page_content.program_description: This program is highly specialized, combining artistic and technical knowledge to prepare students for leadership roles in digital communication, design, and brand strategy. It emphasizes the development of a strong design methodology, critical thinking, and mastery of digital tools. Participants will work on projects involving branding, web and mobile interfaces, motion design, and interactive design. The program also integrates creative direction training, focusing on managing design projects and teams, and making strategic decisions to meet clients' objectives.

This master's degree is a comprehensive program designed to equip students with the necessary skills to thrive in various communication fields. It emphasizes a blend of strategic and creative approaches, making it suitable for aspiring professionals in diverse roles such as communication directors, brand managers, and event communication specialists. Students learn to define brand strategies, manage communication plans, and understand corporate communication intricacies. The program emphasizes practical learning through theoretical studies, workshops, and real-world projects with notable brands.

The Acting in English program at Cours Florent is a three-year curriculum designed for those who interested in exploring drama in English. It employs various acting methods and focuses on interpretation classes that help participants express themselves through both voice and body. Students engage in various projects, including monologue preparations, character arc explorations, and scene work. They also have the opportunity to work on personal projects and public performances, which enhance their practical experience.

The Bachelor in Graphic Design at LISAA is designed to provide students with a solid foundation in visual communication and design. It emphasizes creativity and technical skills, allowing to develop expertise in branding, print, web, and multimedia design. Students are introduced to various disciplines, including typography, color theory, illustration, digital tools, motion design, and editorial design. They also work on real-world projects, helping them to build a professional portfolio. The curriculum integrates collaboration with industry professionals and internships, preparing graduates for careers in graphic design, web design, art direction, or communication agencies.

This Bachelor is a comprehensive program designed to prepare students for careers in 2D and 3D image creation, with applications in fields such as animation, video games, visual effects, and architectural visualization. It emphasizes project-based learning, allowing students to develop their portfolios and gain practical experience in concept art, 3D modeling, lighting, texturing, and animation. Students benefit from workshops and masterclasses, often led by industry professionals, which help bridge academic learning with professional practices. The program also offers a mix of individual and team projects, providing exposure to the collaborative nature of the industry. Graduates are well-prepared to enter creative roles such as 3D modelers, animators, and visual effects artists, or to pursue further specialization.

This program is a comprehensive five-year course designed to equip students with the expertise needed to excel in interior architecture and design. It covers foundational design principles, technical skills, and professional project management. In the early years, students are introduced to the fundamentals of architecture and design, including computer-aided design (CAD), visual communication, and construction materials. As they progress, the curriculum incorporates advanced courses in project management, marketing, architectural technology, and 2D/3D graphic design. The final year emphasizes specialization projects, advanced prototyping, and industry-standard design techniques.
