The Master of Science (MSc) in Data for Business at Albert School is a two-year program designed to integrate business knowledge with advanced data analytics. It focuses on full-funnel marketing strategy, SEO, SEA, corporate valuation modeling, finance for new ventures, supply chain fundamentals, responsible AI, and more. The program combines theoretical learning with practical experience through apprenticeships, allowing students to apply academic knowledge to real-world business challenges. Graduates can pursue roles such as business analyst, strategy consultant, data architect, data scientist, business developer, and project manager.

The MSc in Data for Finance is tailored for those passionate about utilizing data to drive financial decision-making, predict market trends, and optimize investment portfolios. Students gain hands-on experience through real-world projects with top-tier partners like LVMH and BCG. The courses include data analysis for corporate auditing, financial regulation and reporting, investment valuation, and AI for algorithmic trading. Graduates are prepared for roles such as financial data analyst, strategy specialist, trader, and data scientist.

The MSc Data for Marketing is a two-year program designed for individuals eager to blend creativity with analytics to drive impactful marketing strategies. The curriculum is structured to provide a comprehensive understanding of both marketing principles and data analytics. Students explore strategies for online advertising, social media marketing, and content creation. They will also gain knowledge in gathering and analyzing business data to support decision-making processes, emphasizing the use of data warehouses and analytical tools. The course also offers practical projects with industry leaders such as Orange and LVMH, alternating studies with an apprenticeship in the field of marketing. Graduates are well-prepared for various roles, such as marketing manager, data analyst, digital marketing specialist, e-commerce manager, and social media manager.

This MSc program aims to integrate data analytics with environmental stewardship. It offers practical experience through real-world projects with partners and includes an apprenticeship in the sustainability field. The curriculum focuses on sustainable business practices, integrating data, AI, and regulatory insights. It covers key regulations and data analysis techniques to diagnose and measure sustainability metrics effectively. Students are prepared for impactful roles such as sustainability consultants, environmental data analysts, or regulatory affairs managers.

page_content.program: Master in Artificial intelligence and Data science (Master Grande École)
page_content.program_description: This master's degree is a comprehensive program designed to equip students with advanced skills in AI and data science. The curriculum emphasizes both theoretical knowledge and practical application, preparing graduates for careers in these dynamic fields. It covers topics such as machine learning, data visualization, big data analytics, and natural language processing. Students engage in hands-on exercises using programming tools and analyze real-world data provided by industry professionals. Graduates work as machine learning engineers, data scientists, big data consultants, and artificial intelligence engineers.

page_content.program: Licence Professionnelle Responsable de Projet Développement Durable & Transitions
page_content.program_description: This professional bachelor's degree, offered by HEIP (Hautes Études Internationales et Politiques) in partnership with the University of Haute-Alsace, is designed to equip students with the skills necessary to lead sustainable development projects and manage transitions within organizations. The curriculum covers topics such as organizational theory, administrative and political institutions, climate issues, geopolitics, international affairs, and public international law. It also emphasizes project management methodologies and Design Thinking to prepare students for effective project planning and execution. Graduates are qualified for various roles in sectors such as sustainable development, environmental and social transitions, and territorial policies. Potential positions include sustainable development project manager, sustainable development consultant, economic development officer, and territory development officer.

The Master in Management-Engineering (Grande École Programme) at Audencia is a specialized program that combines management education with engineering principles. This program aims to equip students with the skills necessary to address contemporary economic, technological, and social challenges. It offers an 18-month specialization track, conducted in English, or a 24-month learning path with courses conducted in French and an apprenticeship option. The coursework encompasses advanced management subjects, with opportunities to specialize in areas such as finance, marketing, or management. Students engage in practical projects and internships to gain real-world experience. Graduates are well-prepared for roles requiring a combination of engineering expertise and business strategy within a global environment. Potential career paths include positions in project management, operations management, consulting, and various engineering sectors.

year_1.specialization: All Masters of Science are available

page_content.program_description: The MSc Digital Marketing & E-Commerce is a specialized program designed to provide students with advanced skills in digital marketing strategies, online sales, and e-commerce management. It focuses on the latest trends and tools in digital marketing and helps them master the technological, analytical, and strategic dimensions of online marketing and commerce. Students learn how to design, implement, and manage digital marketing campaigns across various platforms. By the end of the program, they will be able to pursue roles such as digital marketing manager, e-commerce manager, SEO/SEM specialist, social media strategist, CRM manager, data analyst for digital marketing and online brand manager.

This program is tailored for students interested in launching their own businesses, managing innovation, or contributing to entrepreneurial projects within existing companies. It emphasizes the development of entrepreneurial mindsets and practical skills for business creation. The curriculum focuses on entrepreneurship theory and practice, business model design, leadership and team management, financing and scaling startups. Graduates are well-positioned to launch their own businesses, work as innovation managers, join startup teams, or act as consultants in entrepreneurial ecosystems.

The MSc Finance is tailored for students aiming to develop advanced skills in finance, preparing them for high-level careers in financial management, investment banking, asset management, and other related sectors. Students explore how capital markets work, how to value a company, the practical challenges and opportunities of the main financial decisions. They will be able to enter roles such as financial analysts, portfolio managers, risk analysts, corporate finance consultants, and investment bankers.

page_content.program: MSc Gestion de Patrimoine et Banque Privée
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Wealth Management & Private Banking at ESSCA Business School is a full-time program conducted in French, designed to equip participants with the expertise to provide comprehensive wealth management services and develop strategic private financial planning solutions. The curriculum includes key subjects such as global challenges for business, ESG investment, private wealth management techniques, data analysis for managers, financial approaches for business owners, personal branding, and professional ethics in wealth management. Graduates can pursue various roles, including wealth planner, private banker, wealth management consultant, independent asset advisor, and head of a specialized wealth management division within an accounting or law firm.

The Master in Management (MIM) program at ESSCA is a top-ranked course designed for students who have completed an undergraduate degree or its equivalent. Participants acquire advanced management skills and can choose from a variety of specializations, allowing them to tailor their education to their career goals. Graduates are well-prepared for careers in various sectors, including consulting, finance, marketing, and international business.

year_2.specialization: Gestion des prix et des revenus
All Masters of Science are available

page_content.program_description: The Master Cycle of IÉSEG's Grande École Program is a comprehensive program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary for successful careers in various management fields. The curriculum spans two years, allowing students to specialize in areas aligned with their professional aspirations, such as finance, marketing, or accounting. It includes core courses addressing contemporary business challenges, such as data visualization, artificial intelligence, positive leadership, and corporate social responsibility (CSR). Participants also have the option to take part in an exchange program abroad or pursue a double degree internally or at a partner university, enhancing their global perspective and experience. Graduates often secure roles such as account manager, business development manager, deputy head of digital change, product manager, supply chain manager, international negotiator, and startup founder.

year_1.specialization: Audit, Contrôle de Gestion & Direction Financière
Institutions Financières : Gestion des risques et conformité
Gestion des Opérations et de la Supply Chain
Management du Commerce de la Grande Distribution
Gestion des données pour les entreprises

year_2.specialization: Audit, Contrôle de Gestion & Direction Financière
Institutions Financières : Gestion des risques et conformité
Gestion des Opérations et de la Supply Chain
Management du Commerce de la Grande Distribution
Gestion des données pour les entreprises

page_content.program_description: The MSc Digital Marketing & Sales prepares students to excel in the rapidly evolving fields of digital marketing and sales. It focuses on the latest trends, tools, and techniques in digital marketing, providing a comprehensive understanding of how to manage digital channels and optimize sales strategies in a digital context. The program offers a wide range of topics including digital marketing strategy, e-commerce, social media marketing, data analytics, consumer behavior, and sales management. It also includes practical projects, case studies, and internships to give students hands-on experience. Career paths are open in various fields such as digital marketing management, e-commerce management, social media strategy, digital sales, and more.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisé ISLI Global Supply Chain Management
page_content.program_description: This master's degree is a comprehensive program designed to develop the strategic, analytical, and leadership skills essential for modern supply chain management, ensuring that graduates are well-prepared to navigate and lead in the dynamic global supply chain landscape. Participants learn how to conduct internal audits to identify supply chain challenges and establish preventive outsourcing schemes. They will be equipped to promote the adoption of key performance indicators and quality control measures, as well as manage the budgetary and financial commitments of the supply chain. Career paths open to graduates include positions such as supply chain manager, supply chain consultant, supply chain engineer, and SCM manager.

This comprehensive program is designed to equip students with both technological and managerial expertise, tailored to meet the demands of companies seeking managers capable of implementing effective commercial strategies in B2B environments through the mastery of negotiation and sales techniques, ultimately leading to successful contract finalizations. The curriculum emphasizes the management of high-value-added projects, requiring proficiency in navigating complex commercial, technological, and industrial ecosystems. It trains students to oversee cross-functional projects, coordinating actions across diverse teams, including commercial, marketing, financial, technical, and legal departments. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as business engineers, project managers, and consultants, particularly in sectors that demand a blend of technical and managerial skills.

This Bachelor is designed to equip students with the skills needed for the modern digital communication and marketing industries. Students learn how to design and manage a communication project, implement communication actions and they will also be able to deploy these projects digitally, on the internet or social media. The program emphasizes practical, project-based learning, allowing students to engage in real-world projects such as business games, hackathons, and collaborations with companies. This approach helps them to develop teamwork, creativity, and problem-solving skills, which are critical in the professional world.

This program focuses on preparing students for commercial roles in the real estate sector. It is designed to equip graduates with the necessary skills to excel in various aspects of the real estate industry, including sales, marketing, and property management. They will be able to develop a business development plan, implement a client portfolio development strategy, and oversee a communication project.

The Bachelor in Business Development focuses on equipping students with the skills and knowledge necessary for success in various commercial roles. The curriculum includes various courses that address critical areas in business development, such as marketing, sales, and project management. Students are encouraged to engage in internships  to gain practical experience and enhance their employability.

page_content.program: Bachelor Tourisme et Hôtellerie - Développement commercial
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor program equips students with practical, in-depth knowledge of the tourism and hospitality sectors, emphasizing business development. The curriculum covers key areas such as managing tourism structures, implementing sector-specific marketing strategies, and overseeing human resources within an international context. It also highlights activities designed to attract new travelers, retain existing clients, and maximize revenue. These include identifying market opportunities, building strategic partnerships, optimizing distribution channels, and creating impactful communication and marketing campaigns. Graduates can pursue roles such as business developer, sales manager, key account manager, sales consultant, area manager, and more.

page_content.program: Bachelor Tourisme et Hôtellerie - Développement commercial
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor’s program prepares students for careers in the tourism and hospitality sectors, with a focus on business development. It combines theoretical courses, practical projects, and professional networking opportunities. The curriculum covers strategic topics such as consumer behavior analysis, strategic and digital marketing, commercial action plans, and CRM management. Students also gain hands-on experience in managing operational teams, organizing events, and understanding global tourism trends. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as tourism development manager, hotel manager, marketing and sales manager in tourism, and more.

This program aims to train future accounting and management professionals. It spans three years and covers essential subjects such as the fundamentals of law, contemporary economics, management information systems, accounting, and business English. Graduates can find employment in various roles, including accountant in a firm, controller in an organization, HR positions, auditing, and more.

The MBA in International Strategy prepares students for international roles, such as integrating into international management, managing a representative office in a specific geographical area, or overseeing a subsidiary. The curriculum is designed to provide practical and concrete knowledge and is facilitated by a faculty composed of active professionals who share their passion and expertise. The teaching methodology incorporates real-life scenarios, immersing students in corporate environments through internships and work-study programs. Graduates can pursue roles such as agency manager, SME manager, product manager, consultant, project manager, and business coordinator.

This MBA is designed to equip students with comprehensive skills in procurement management. The program is structured to provide a deep understanding of the procurement function, ranging from sourcing to supply operations. It emphasizes practical learning through real-life scenarios, with courses delivered by experienced procurement professionals who share their expertise and knowledge. Graduates can pursue various roles, including general services buyer, industrial purchaser, procurement manager, product manager, and purchasing coordinator.

The Mastère Marketing program at ESG offers a comprehensive education designed to equip students with essential skills in marketing, business development, and project management. The program emphasizes practical experience and theoretical knowledge, preparing graduates for a range of careers in the marketing sector. The curriculum includes courses on digital marketing, reputation management, customer experience, and agile management, as well as advanced Excel skills. Students engage in various practical projects, such as street marketing campaigns and entrepreneurial challenges. They are prepared for roles such as business developer, marketing manager, brand manager, or market research analyst.

The Bachelor Marketing et Commerce program at ESG is designed to equip students with comprehensive skills in marketing and commerce, preparing them for various roles in the business sector. It focuses on developing a broad understanding of marketing and commerce principles. Students learn to manage product creation, service delivery, and customer relationships effectively. The curriculum is structured to help students become versatile professionals capable of meeting the demands of the business world. Graduates can pursue roles such as marketing manager, event manager, sales manager, communication manager, or account manager.

The Bachelor in Communication at ESG is designed for students who aim to develop their skills in communication, marketing, and public relations. Students learn to lead communication projects from inception to completion using design thinking methods. The program also covers practical skills such as desktop publishing, media relations, and innovative formats for social media. Graduates can pursue various roles, including communication officer, public relations officer, digital communication officer, community manager, and social media manager.

This program is designed for individuals aiming to pursue careers in human resources management. It is tailored to meet the needs of businesses in areas such as talent management, social legislation, and team leadership. The program equips students with the skills and knowledge required to thrive in the HR sector. The curriculum offers a comprehensive understanding of key HR functions, including recruitment, payroll management, career development, and labor law. Additionally, it emphasizes the importance of managing social climates and optimizing organizational performance. Graduates can pursue roles such as HR manager, recruitment consultant, training manager, or payroll administrator.

This Master's degree in International Business is designed to equip students with the essential skills needed for success in the global business landscape. It covers various aspects of international business, including strategy, marketing, finance, and management, and aims to prepare students for the complexities of operating in diverse markets. The curriculum emphasizes practical experience, which is crucial for developing a deep understanding of international business dynamics. Graduates can expect to pursue roles such as international business manager, export manager, or global marketing director.

page_content.program: Diplôme de Comptabilité et de Gestion
page_content.program_description: This program aims to train future accounting and management professionals. It spans three years and covers essential subjects, including the fundamentals of law, contemporary economics, management information systems, accounting, and business English. Graduates can pursue various roles, such as an accountant in a firm, a controller in an organization, an HR professional, an auditor, and more.

page_content.program: MBA Management de la production musicale et développement d'artiste
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Music Production Management and Artist Development is designed to equip students with the operational skills required in the music industry. The curriculum provides a comprehensive understanding of the industry, covering areas such as music production techniques, artist management, marketing strategies in the music sector, and project management within cultural contexts. The program also emphasizes practical experience, offering strong support for securing internships and work placements in the industry. Graduates of the program can pursue roles such as artist manager, music publisher, project manager, press officer, producer and digital manager.

The BTS Communication program at Narratiiv is a two-year course designed to prepare students for careers in advertising and communication. The curriculum emphasizes both theoretical knowledge and practical experience, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for professional challenges. It covers various facets of communication, including advertising, event management, public relations, and digital media. This broad spectrum allows students to gain a deeper understanding of the field and discover their areas of interest. They are also trained to produce impactful communication content, utilizing storytelling techniques across multiple formats and media platforms. This focus enhances their ability to craft compelling narratives that resonate with diverse audiences.

page_content.program: Bachelor Création de contenu et Communication
page_content.program_description: This bachelor's program prepares students to create and manage digital content across various platforms. Throughout the course, they learn to develop web marketing strategies aligned with brand objectives, produce tailored content, and distribute it effectively across multiple channels. Students also have the option to continue the program through an apprenticeship, allowing them to gain practical experience alongside their studies. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as content creator, digital marketer, community manager, and other professions within the digital communication field.

This program aims to equip students with expertise in transport and mobility design, addressing both current and future challenges through a multidisciplinary approach and tailored training. The curriculum emphasizes project-based learning, integrating humanities, social sciences, and life sciences to provide a comprehensive understanding of design within societal contexts. It includes courses in color theory, sketching, design methodology, software tools (3D and 2D), perspective, design projects, humanities and social sciences, team building, rough modeling, and bibliography research. Students engage in research-driven design excellence, ethical and sustainable design practices, and collaborate with industry partners to align their training with contemporary design requirements. Graduates of this program can pursue various career opportunities, including transportation designer, exterior designer, interior designer, component designer, and color and material designer, among others.

This two-year course aims to develop strategic designers capable of providing companies with innovative and responsible solutions aligned with today's and tomorrow's major challenges. The program is conducted entirely in English and is designed to enable future designers to understand and rethink the connections between various ecosystems and fields of human experience, such as living conditions, food, climate, environment, education, health, and mobility. Students will learn to formulate and formalize a transformative vision to support social, environmental, and ecological transitions, focusing on the conditions under which the world remains habitable on any scale. Upon completion, graduates will be equipped to pursue roles such as strategic designer, service designer, public policy designer, social innovation designer, prospective and radical innovation manager, CSR project manager, and sustainability consultant.

This program is designed to prepare students for roles in the banking sector, particularly as client advisors. It focuses on customer relations, banking operations, and financial services. The curriculum aims to develop skills in advising individuals and small businesses on financial products, managing banking portfolios, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Graduates can pursue roles such as client advisor, financial advisor, account manager, or administrative agent in banking institutions.

This BTS program is designed to train students in managing and developing a business's commercial activities. It focuses on customer relations, team management, and business performance improvement. Graduates can pursue roles such as sales manager, customer service manager, department manager, or store manager.

page_content.program: BTS NDRC Négociation et Digitalisation de la Relation Client
page_content.program_description: This program focuses on sales and customer relations, with a strong emphasis on digitalization. It aims to equip students with the skills necessary for various roles in sales, such as prospecting, business development, and negotiation, both in person and remotely. The curriculum covers key competencies, including communication, client relationship management, and proficiency in digital tools essential for modern sales environments. It prepares participants for careers as sales representatives, business developers, and account managers.

page_content.program: BTS GPME Gestion de la PME
page_content.program_description: The BTS GPME aims to train students to assist small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) with their administrative, commercial, and financial management. This two-year program provides a strong foundation in business management, equipping participants with the skills to handle tasks such as accounting, human resources, customer relations, and project management. Graduates typically secure positions as office managers, administrative assistants, or project coordinators in small and medium-sized businesses.

This program provides a comprehensive education in accounting and management. It is designed to prepare students for various roles in the financial and administrative sectors, such as accounting assistants, payroll managers, and cost controllers. Students receive training in real-world accounting tasks, including client and supplier management, treasury operations, and tax declarations (e.g., VAT). The program emphasizes practical experience, offering numerous opportunities to apply theoretical knowledge through internships or work-study arrangements.

The BTS Tourisme program is tailored to provide comprehensive and professional education in the tourism sector. It prepares students to handle a wide range of tasks, from customer service to tour organization and management, making them ready for a dynamic industry. The course offers immersive learning experiences, combining both theory and practical knowledge through internships and projects. Participants will develop skills in areas such as tourism management, event planning, customer relations, and marketing of tourism products. Additionally, the program emphasizes language proficiency, particularly in English, to enable graduates to work effectively in international settings.

page_content.program: MBA Expert en Communication et Événementiel
page_content.program_description: This MBA is a specialized program designed to equip students with advanced skills in global communication management and event planning. It offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers strategic communication, media relations, and the intricacies of organizing both physical and digital events. This blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application ensures that students are well-prepared to tackle the evolving challenges in the communication and event management sectors. Graduates can take on positions such as communication officer, client manager, public relations and event relations officer, media studies officer, media planner, and digital strategy manager.

page_content.program: Master in Interior Architect & Global Design
page_content.program_description: The Master's in Interior Architecture & Global Design prepares students for professional roles in interior architecture and design. They specialize in interior architecture and global design, adopting a holistic approach that encompasses spatial design, product and packaging design, visual brand identity, digital interfaces, and retail environments. Graduates can pursue various roles, including global designer, interior architect, interior decorator, scenographer, and art director.

The Master of Science in International Business is a comprehensive program aimed at equipping students with essential skills for international management careers. Taught entirely in English, the curriculum covers key areas in international business, including global trade, intercultural management, and strategic decision-making, while incorporating interactive methods like seminars, case studies, and group discussions to foster practical understanding. Students also engage in a beginner-level French language course to help integrate into the French business environment.

This program is designed to train professionals capable of designing, implementing, and deploying decision-making projects by leveraging theoretical foundations, BI tools, data analysis, and project management methodologies. Graduates of this program are prepared for roles such as BI expert consultants, BI project managers, directors of information systems integration projects, and specialists in BI consulting and project management.

This course allows students to enter the Grande École Engineering Program immediately after obtaining their baccalaureate. Spanning two years, it serves as the initial phase of their education. During this period, students immerse themselves in a high-level scientific and technological curriculum, exploring various fields of study that lead to promising professional careers. They acquire essential scientific foundations, take the first courses in their chosen specialty, and develop both transversal and soft skills essential for engineers. Additionally, they engage in their first projects and complete their initial internships.

The Engineering Program at Cy Tech offers students the opportunity to build their career path according to their profile and aspirations in four main areas: Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Civil Engineering, and Biotechnology & Chemistry. They can choose a specific orientation from among 21 specializations. Graduates can pursue various roles, such as IT project manager, web and mobile project manager, consultant in integrated solutions, telecom and network engineer, and more.

year_2.specialization: Mathématiques et Finance - Modélisation Mathématiques pour la Finance
Mathématiques et Informatique - High Performance Data Analytics
Mathématiques et Informatique - Finances et Technologies
Mathématiques et Informatique - Data du Développement Durable
Génie civil - Conception Construction Ingénierie Bâtiment
Génie civil - Conception Construction Ingénierie Travaux Publics
Génie civil - Matériaux Ouvrages Recherche Innovation
Génie civil - Bâtiment Intelligent Efficacité Énergétique
Parcours Biotechnologies et chimie - Chimie macromoleculaire pour l'energie et pour la sante
Parcours Biotechnologies et chimie - Biomateriaux pour la sante

page_content.program: Master in data mining and optimization architecture (ADEO)
page_content.program_description: This program leverages the expertise of CY Tech Graduate School in areas such as Business Intelligence, Decision Support, Economic Intelligence, and Business Analytics/Big Data. It aims to train future specialists in Information Systems and Decision Support. The curriculum offers a strong foundation in mathematics and incorporates a wide range of computer-based tools, enabling students to address real-world problems, analyze their complexities, and develop effective algorithmic and architectural solutions. Graduates of this program can pursue roles such as data analyst, optimization consultant, information systems architect, research and development engineer, and project manager in IT and data science.

page_content.program: MBA Enterprise Resource Planning ERP Management
page_content.program_description: This MBA is designed to train and prepare high-level executives for the deployment of ERP solutions. It provides knowledge of various business functions within a company and ensures a strong command of ERPs. Students develop solid skills in project management and gain opportunities in internationally oriented departments in roles such as ERP functional consultant, ERP project manager, head of system applications, and head of key user business lines.

page_content.program: MBA in Cybersecurity and Smart Systems
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Cybersecurity and Smart Systems aims to train future IT managers to evaluate, manage, and optimize an organization’s IT security as a whole—covering privacy, reliability, safety, and legal aspects—at the technical (networks, software, data, systems, etc.), legal, and organizational levels. The skills developed in this program meet the current demands of software and hardware architects across the entire transmission and data processing chain dedicated to connected and intelligent objects. This training prepares graduates for various professions related to networks, security, mobility, and the Internet of Things, whether in engineering, architecture, consulting, or auditing. Career opportunities include roles such as security engineer, architect and developer of new technology applications, auditor, controller, information systems security expert, and security architect.

page_content.program: MSc Stratégie marketing et développement commercial
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Marketing Strategy and Business Development prepares students for careers in marketing and sales for both consumer (B2C) and business (B2B) markets in sectors such as consumer goods, capital goods, services, or projects. The program emphasizes that business development results from marketing decisions and adaptations to the product range, considering both customer expectations and internal requirements. The curriculum includes topics such as strategy and innovation, project management, business operations, retail marketing, big data and business analytics, B2B marketing and key account management, and sales performance management. Graduates can pursue various roles, including marketing project manager, key account manager, market manager, department manager, and buyer.

page_content.program: Mastère Spécialisé MAI Management des Achats internationaux et innovation
page_content.program_description: This program prepares students to become international buyers, equipping them with the skills to manage complex and multicultural environments, create significant value for companies, and drive economic performance and innovation. Graduates are sought after for roles such as international buyer, purchasing and logistics manager, and strategic purchasing director in multinational companies across various sectors.

page_content.program: Master en transformation digitale et technologique (Master Grande École)
page_content.program_description: The fourth and fifth years of the Programme Grande École at HETIC are designed to deepen students' expertise in digital fields and prepare them for leadership roles in the industry. Students engage in comprehensive studies of digital strategies, focusing on the integration of innovative technologies and methodologies to solve complex business challenges. The program also includes collaborative projects with industry partners, providing practical experience and networking opportunities. Graduates can pursue roles such as product manager, product owner, data analyst, digital marketing manager, cybersecurity expert, back-end developer, full-stack developer, and UX designer.

This program is a one-year preparatory course designed for students who wish to strengthen their digital skills before entering a master's program. The curriculum focuses on various aspects of the digital field, including web development, digital marketing, and project management. Students engage in both theoretical and practical learning experiences, working on real-world projects to apply their knowledge. The course aims to equip students with the necessary competencies to succeed in advanced digital studies and careers.

The Bachelor Fashion Designer is a four-year course that is designed for students who wish to develop skills in fashion design, focusing on creating apparel for various sectors including couture, womenswear, menswear, and sportswear. The program spans three years, followed by an additional year focused on professionalization. Its curriculum emphasizes creativity, allowing students to develop their personal style while gaining essential technical skills. It includes design techniques, understanding fashion trends, and the overall creative process involved in fashion design. Participants also benefit from a network of industry professionals and partnerships that enhance their learning and job placement opportunities. Graduates pursue roles such as fashion stylist designer, assistant stylist, textile stylist designer, fashion creator, stylist consultant, pattern maker, collection coordinator, and art director.

This master's degree is designed to equip students for successful careers in international management, particularly in areas such as sales, marketing, and business development. It includes a variety of experiences to enhance both academic and practical skills. Students can choose between various international course options and gain practical experience through placements. They have also opportunities for international exchanges and gain intercultural insights.

year_1.specialization: Management du commerce responsable & Expérience client

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor’s in Computer Science & Cybersecurity at ESILV is a three-year program designed to train digital specialists in all areas of computing, connected systems, and essential scientific foundations, while also emphasizing the development of soft skills. Students build a strong foundation in computer science, mathematics, and digital systems, with a focus on programming, databases, and algorithms. They also develop expertise in electronics, modeling, and system architecture. The curriculum includes practical projects and internships, equipping students with valuable professional experience. In the final year, students choose between two specializations: Cybersecurity or Data & Cloud Engineering. Graduates are well-prepared for roles such as cybersecurity engineer, full-stack developer, DevSecOps engineer, cloud engineer, and security solutions integrator.

year_3.specialization: Ingénierie des Données et du Cloud

page_content.program_description: The Bachelor in Technology & Management, offered jointly by ESILV Graduate School of Engineering (Léonard de Vinci) and EMLV Business School (Léonard de Vinci), equips students with foundational knowledge in both digital technologies and management, addressing the challenges of integrating connected technologies into businesses. The curriculum covers key areas such as programming, cloud computing, social media strategy and SEO, UX design and website development, the Internet of Things (IoT), project management, sales and negotiation, business law, the digital economy, and more. Graduates can pursue careers as digital project managers, technical sales engineers, product managers, business analysts, and consultants in digital transformation.

The integrated preparatory program at ESILV provides students with a strong generalist foundation, emphasizing the acquisition of solid scientific knowledge and exposure to the corporate world. This two-year curriculum is designed to equip students with the essential scientific fundamentals needed to progress into the engineering cycle. The program is structured with a balanced focus: 50% on sciences, 25% on elective subjects, and 25% on technologies. Unlike traditional preparatory classes, ESILV's integrated preparatory program covers a broader range of subjects, including algebra, analysis, statistics, algorithmics, system environment, databases, object-oriented programming, mechanics, electricity, thermodynamics, and materials science. Additionally, students engage in cross-disciplinary subjects such as soft skills, personal work methodologies, languages, and communication tools.

This work-study master’s program is a two-year course that combines theoretical education with practical experience in a professional setting. Students learn to manage transport design projects, including problem analysis, research into innovative concepts, and the development of viable solutions. The curriculum covers various sectors, such as industry, mobility, digital technology, and interaction design. The program prepares students for key positions in integrated design departments, manufacturers, equipment suppliers, and specialized agencies. While it offers numerous opportunities in the automotive sector, graduates can also pursue careers in other industries, including urban transport, aeronautics, and nautical design. Possible roles include transport designer, colour and material designer, automotive interior designer, and automotive exterior designer.

page_content.program: MSc in Biotechnology and Artificial Intelligence
page_content.program_description: This MSc program, created by SupBiotech in collaboration with EPITA (School of Engineering and Computer Science) and ESME (Special School of Mechanics and Electricity), is an innovative two-year course designed to train future specialists in bioinformatics and AI. The curriculum focuses on developing both technical expertise and professional competencies, with all lectures and seminars conducted in English. Students gain practical experience through interdisciplinary projects and a long-term internship at the end of the first year. The program provides in-depth knowledge of the role of AI and bioinformatics in advancing biotechnology. Graduates are equipped to address current and future challenges in biotechnology, applying AI solutions in key fields such as medical research, agriculture, environmental sustainability, and pharmaceuticals.

This Bachelor's program equips students with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in human resources roles. The curriculum covers key aspects of HR, including talent acquisition, employee relations, performance management, and organizational development. Students engage in both theoretical learning and practical applications, ensuring a well-rounded understanding of HR practices. The program also emphasizes strategic thinking and leadership development, preparing graduates to effectively manage human capital in diverse organizational settings. Graduates often pursue roles such as HR assistant, payroll manager, recruitment consultant, human resources officer, and personnel management assistant.

This master's degree equips students with the skills and knowledge needed to manage IT projects effectively. The curriculum covers key aspects of IT project management, including planning, execution, monitoring, and completion. Students will explore project management methodologies, risk management, quality assurance, and team leadership. Additionally, the program develops competencies in aligning IT projects with business needs and integrating sustainable practices. Graduates are prepared for roles such as IT project manager, information systems consultant, digitalization project manager, and business information systems project manager.

The Master’s cycle of the Grande École Program at ISTEC is a flagship course that ensures excellence across all domains, allowing students to specialize in their chosen field through majors such as digital marketing, international business, or supply chain management. The program emphasizes practical learning through internships, company projects, and workshops led by industry professionals. It also provides significant international exposure, offering opportunities to study abroad for multiple semesters and courses taught in English. Designed to align with industry needs, it prepares graduates effectively for the workforce.

year_1.specialization: Marketing et management de la santé
Business intelligence, IA et réalité augmentée

year_2.specialization: Management de la supply chain (double diplôme avec ENIM) Price
Marketing et management de la santé
Business intelligence, IA et réalité augmentée
Immobilier ( ESPI) - Évaluation et finance immobilière
Immobilier ( ESPI) - Aménagement et promotion immobilière

page_content.program_description: The MBA Corporate Finance program at ISTEC Business School in Paris is designed to train professionals in banking, insurance, and broader financial institutions. This multidisciplinary program provides in-depth knowledge in areas such as cash management, fiscal strategy, portfolio management, FinTech, structured finance, project finance, mergers and acquisitions, and taxation, while considering the legal and economic aspects of these sectors. The courses are primarily taught by qualified professionals, emphasizing group work and real-life situations to promote leadership skills. Graduates pursue roles such as financial manager, responsible of a bank agency, head of marketing studies of financial products, financial strategy advisor, and head of financial department.

This MBA is designed to equip students with advanced skills in digital marketing and e-commerce, preparing them for leadership roles in the digital economy. The curriculum includes subjects such as digital marketing strategy, e-commerce management, data analytics and consumer behavior, social media marketing, search engine optimization (SEO) and search engine marketing (SEM), mobile marketing, content marketing, and digital advertising. It combines theoretical coursework with practical projects, including case studies and internships, to ensure a hands-on learning experience. Graduates work as digital marketing managers, entrepreneurs in the internet sector, social media managers, communication consultants, e-business consultants, and e-store managers.

The MBA in International Commerce provides students with comprehensive knowledge in areas such as intercultural management, geopolitics, strategic development, negotiation, and international investment opportunities. The program emphasizes mastering technical skills, languages, and multicultural subjects, aiming to train executives capable of navigating the globalized economies, anticipating market changes, deploying strategies, and managing international teams. Graduates can pursue roles such as export director, manager of trade marketing, responsible of zone export, director of business export, and responsible for international projects.

The MBA Business Engineer program at ISTEC equips students with the skills necessary to develop and implement commercial strategies, manage complex projects, and lead teams. The courses include consumer behavior, fundamental marketing, entrepreneurship, strategic management, performance tools, business plan construction, financial strategy, fundamental finance, sales force management, international business strategy, and human resources management. Graduates can pursue roles such as business engineer, technical sales engineer, business manager, key account engineer, project manager, project engineer, and sales manager.

The MBA in Luxury Management is tailored to train professionals capable of meeting the challenges of the luxury industry. This comprehensive program emphasizes a managerial and entrepreneurial approach to international luxury sectors, preparing graduates for senior management positions in these markets. The courses cover key areas such as digital communication, market of luxury products and services, brand management, jewelry and watchmaking, and international marketing. Graduates can take on positions including sales manager, marketing consultant, digital marketing & e-business manager, operational marketing & communication manager, brand manager, and international marketing manager.

page_content.program: MBA Audit et contrôle de gestion
page_content.program_description: This program is designed to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel in the fields of auditing and management control. The curriculum includes various aspects of audit and management control, along with core business management courses. The training is based on a solid theoretical foundation, as well as a practical approach with seminars, projects, application workshops, an internship in a company, and personalized support. Graduates are prepared for roles such as client portfolio manager, financial and accounting auditor, manager of a business unit or SME, management controller, assistant audit project manager, financial advisor, and back-office manager.

The MBA in Hospitality Management trains students to excel as managers and leaders in the hospitality and tourism sectors. Through the program, participants gain a comprehensive understanding of how various elements and industries integrate to create appealing client offerings. This academically rigorous program aligns with current job market demands, emphasizing strategic thinking, creativity, and strong quantitative skills—key competencies for leadership roles in hospitality. Graduates will be well-prepared for high-level positions in hospitality, dining, and tourism enterprises.

This program aims to provide students with advanced skills in marketing and communication, preparing them for leadership roles in the industry. The courses focus on analyzing market trends, consumer behavior, and competitive landscapes to inform strategic decision-making. Students learn to design and implement effective communication plans across various channels, including digital media. The curriculum also covers techniques for building and maintaining strong brands in competitive markets. Graduates are prepared for roles such as marketing manager, communication director, brand manager, digital marketing specialist, and public relations manager.

page_content.program: MBA Business Development en Systèmes d'Information
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Management of Information Systems at ISTEC is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to become experts in managing information systems (IS). The program covers various aspects, including project management, change management, quality testing, and database management. As a qualified IS management expert, you will be prepared to face the challenges of a growing sector in both the French and global job markets. Graduates are prepared for various roles, including IS consultant, IS project manager, testing and acceptance consultant, functional support consultant, IT business analyst, and change management consultant.

This three-year Bachelor’s program is designed for students aiming to pursue careers in audiovisual and artistic production, content creation, and communication. The curriculum covers the fundamentals of production and communication, equipping students with multidisciplinary skills. They explore marketing and distribution strategies for audiovisual content while actively engaging in the design and promotion of production projects. Graduates are prepared for roles such as assistant production manager, producer, production manager, broadcast manager, and tour manager.

page_content.program: Mastère Communication - Management de la Communication
page_content.program_description: This Mastère is a highly specialized graduate-level program designed to develop strategic communication professionals. It prepares students to assume managerial roles in the fields of corporate communication, media relations, public relations, and digital communication. They learn how to manage internal and external communication strategies for organizations, handle public relations and media relations for businesses or public entities, develop and implement digital communication strategies, lead communication teams and manage communication projects from start to finish.

The Global Design program is a comprehensive five-year course that integrates interior architecture, product design, and graphic design. This multidisciplinary approach equips students with a broad range of creative and technical skills, preparing them for diverse professional opportunities in the design industry. The curriculum covers fundamental aspects such as developing artistic and graphic abilities, learning design methodologies, and translating creative concepts. Students also explore technical drawing, cultural and technical references, and project feasibility analysis. They undertake professional projects in collaboration with established companies and participate in internships to gain industry experience. Graduates of this program are well-prepared for careers as design managers, art directors, space designers, and other related roles.

The Scenography program is a comprehensive four-year course focused on designing spaces and visual atmospheres for events, exhibitions, and performances. It equips students with the skills needed to become professional scenographers capable of creating immersive environments across various domains. The first two years emphasize foundational learning, introducing students to spatial concepts, scenography principles, and both theoretical and technical training. The curriculum incorporates professional experience through individual and group projects. The final year is dedicated to thesis preparation, two end-of-study projects, and an internship. Graduates can pursue careers as scenographers for temporary exhibitions, window displays, and museum exhibitions.

The Bachelor in Web Development program equips students with the skills needed to become proficient web developers. The curriculum covers both front-end and back-end technologies, providing a well-rounded understanding of the field. In their third year, students choose from three specializations and work on hands-on projects in real-world scenarios to apply their knowledge effectively. Graduates can pursue various roles in the tech industry, including product owner, back-end developer, full-stack developer, web developer, mobile developer, cybersecurity expert, IT consultant, big data engineer, and data scientist.

This two-year program is designed to develop advanced expertise in cybersecurity and data/AI. It focuses on strategy, specialization, and project management within information systems. The curriculum covers core subjects such as Information systems strategy, project management, professional English, and digital law. Students can specialize in either Cybersecurity or Data, with courses on cloud architecture, CI/CD automation, database security, containerization, cryptography, and system hardening. In the final year, the program builds on previously acquired knowledge, emphasizing risk analysis, compliance, strategic planning, and crisis management. Graduates can pursue roles such as software engineer, product owner, digital product manager, DevOps support engineer, and front-end developer.

This Bachelor’s program at IFA Paris is a comprehensive three-year course designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel as fashion designers. It blends the timeless elegance of French haute couture with cutting-edge fashion technology and a global perspective, preparing students to thrive in today’s industry. Participants develop technical expertise in pattern-making, draping, and sewing while gaining a deep understanding of French fashion heritage. The curriculum not only hones these technical skills but also fosters creative expression through advanced projects in knitwear, menswear, fashion accessories, and sustainable fashion. It also emphasizes innovative approaches, including the integration of artificial intelligence in design. Graduates are prepared for diverse roles within the global fashion industry, such as trend forecaster, production manager, digital fashion stylist, patternmaker, lead fashion designer, textile designer, and photo stylist.

The Bachelor in Fashion Business & Marketing prepares students for the dynamic world of fashion business. It is taught entirely in English or French, providing a global perspective on the fashion industry. The curriculum is designed to ensure a progressive validation of learning objectives, incorporating continuous challenges to enhance students' ability to work in multicultural teams. It covers key topics such as marketing, branding, consumer behavior, retail management, buying and merchandising, and digital marketing. Students also gain hands-on experience in fashion event management by organizing and promoting shows for peers in fashion design programs. Graduates can pursue careers as international development managers, fashion product managers, merchandisers, fashion buyers, e-commerce managers, event managers, sales managers, and press officers.

The Postgraduate Degree in Fashion House Creative Direction at IFA Paris is a two-year program designed for students aiming to pursue careers in fashion house management. The curriculum includes a workshop to help them develop their artistic identity, encouraging self-exploration and innovation. It focuses on assessing and revitalizing fashion brands through innovative strategies. Students learn how to preserve fashion heritage while positioning a brand as contemporary. They master emerging technologies such as AI-driven design and virtual reality to create immersive brand experiences. The course also covers managing and resolving image crises caused by PR scandals, identifying market opportunities, and developing compelling business plans. Graduates pursue various career paths, including community manager, press officer, photo stylist, workshop manager, creative director, brand director, and production manager.

This program is designed for students who want to create and produce an eco-responsible fashion collection. Students will make strategic choices and experiment with design approaches, production techniques, material sourcing, marketing strategies, and circularity, with an emphasis on transparency and traceability. They will push the boundaries of sustainable fashion by developing visionary designs that integrate cutting-edge eco-friendly materials, zero-waste techniques, and circular design principles, driving the industry toward radical sustainability. The curriculum includes hands-on workshops featuring real-life case studies from partner brands, as well as professional development through personalized coaching to secure a six-month internship. Career opportunities include fashion collection manager, brand director, head of product development, production manager, workshop manager, lead fashion designer, creative director, and community manager.

This MBA is tailored for fashion designers aspiring to launch their own brands and produce their own collections. It combines creative development with essential business acumen, equipping students with the tools and knowledge to transform their fashion visions into thriving ventures. Students will gain expertise in creating and launching fashion brands by designing business models aligned with market opportunities and leveraging strategic brand development, creative storytelling, and entrepreneurial insights to build successful, sustainable fashion labels. The curriculum covers key areas such as market research, prototyping, fashion and luxury retail management, and the legal environment for startups. Graduates pursue careers as heads of product development, press officers, brand directors, fashion collection managers, community managers, and textile designers.

This MBA is designed for individuals passionate about fashion media and content creation. The curriculum develops the ability to produce compelling media content using advanced techniques in photography, videography, and digital editing to craft visually powerful narratives aligned with brand identity and market goals. Students learn to execute innovative marketing campaigns that integrate fashion imagery, media production, and storytelling, leveraging multimedia platforms to enhance brand visibility. They gain a deep understanding of the intersection between creative media production and business strategy, learning to manage budgets, resources, and teams while ensuring fashion media initiatives drive brand growth and profitability. Graduates can pursue roles such as international development manager, fashion product manager, brand director, e-commerce manager, community manager, event manager, and press officer.

This program is designed for students seeking to drive innovation in the fashion and luxury industries. They will master both traditional luxury marketing channels and modern digital platforms, including social media and the metaverse. Participants will develop a deep understanding of the global luxury and fashion markets, including consumer behavior, cultural nuances, and regional trends, enabling them to position and expand brands effectively across international markets. They will explore and apply cutting-edge digital marketing tools, from social media to AI-driven personalization, to create immersive experiences that enhance brand loyalty and drive growth. Career opportunities include roles such as distribution manager, press officer, sales manager, brand director, community manager, and marketing manager.

This MBA is a specialized postgraduate program designed for students who aim to integrate sustainability into the core strategies of fashion companies and drive positive global change. It equips students with the skills to design and implement innovative business models that prioritize sustainability, emphasizing circular economy practices, ethical sourcing, and environmentally responsible production methods. The curriculum aligns with United Nations sustainability goals, and participants engage in projects addressing global sustainability challenges. Key areas of study include sustainable value creation, eco-design, sustainable sourcing, smart supply chain systems, textile processing, finishing techniques, design processes, and marketing. Graduates can pursue roles such as event manager, fashion product manager, sales manager, marketing manager, and brand director.

The MBA in Fashion Entrepreneurship – Tech Major fosters the entrepreneurial mindset and skills needed to launch and scale fashion tech startups. It covers opportunity recognition, business model innovation, and strategic decision-making in a dynamic, competitive market. Students learn to integrate cutting-edge technologies such as AI, augmented reality, and digital platforms. The program also prepares them for management roles by deepening their understanding of industry standards and challenges. Graduates are equipped for careers such as fashion product manager, sales manager, community manager, marketing manager, distribution manager, and e-commerce manager.

The Grande École Engineering program is a five-year curriculum that consists of two cycles: the preparatory cycle and the engineering cycle. The preparatory cycle is designed to provide students with a strong foundation in scientific and technical disciplines, preparing them for the engineering cycle. The program emphasizes a multidisciplinary approach, combining theoretical knowledge with practical projects and soft skills development. The engineering cycle aims to enhance students' scientific expertise, enabling them to innovate and master future technologies. It offers 12 majors, taught in either French or English, providing a unique opportunity to experience La French Tech in Europe’s leading business district. These majors are continually updated to align with evolving economic trends, ensuring that students acquire the most current skills and knowledge. The degree is designed to meet industry demands and serves as a gateway to students' desired professional careers.

The Master's degree in Engineering (Grande École Programme) at ESILV is a two-year program designed to equip students with the skills to develop and manage future technologies while enhancing their scientific expertise. It offers 12 majors, allowing participants to specialize in their chosen field. These majors align with current industry needs and technological advancements. Some include Cybersecurity & Cloud Computing, Creative Technology, Industry & Robotics, Data Engineering & AI, Fintech, and Financial Engineering, among others. Participants engage in industrial innovation projects related to their specialization, gaining practical experience and applying theoretical knowledge to real-world challenges. Additionally, ESILV's career services support students in defining and achieving their professional goals through dedicated career coaching.

The MSc in Computer Science & Data Science at ESILV is an international program designed to train IT and development professionals in a rapidly evolving world. It prepares them for the modern digital economy, with a focus on cybersecurity, green computing, and artificial intelligence. The courses strike an effective balance between theory and practice within a multidisciplinary environment. Modules include web scraping and data processing, database engineering, the big data ecosystem, data visualization, AI and ethics, business intelligence, machine learning applications, and security. Graduates can pursue roles such as application developer, cybersecurity analyst, data analyst, game developer, machine learning engineer, software engineer, UX designer, web designer, and web developer.

This MSc is designed for engineering and design students who aim to bridge the gap between research, innovation, and manufacturing in a transdisciplinary environment. Students will develop innovative products and applications by leveraging the latest technological advancements and scientific knowledge. Their transdisciplinary expertise will enable them to design integrative, systemic solutions across various aspects of product and software development. The program covers key areas such as innovation management, UX design, visual communication, applied innovation, artificial intelligence, and computer graphics. Graduates will be prepared for roles such as creative technologist, CEO/CTO of startups, lead developer, R&D engineer, product designer, and more.

This master's program is designed to develop expertise in cybersecurity, crisis management, and organizational resilience. The curriculum offers a unique blend of theoretical knowledge and practical skills essential for addressing modern cybersecurity challenges. Students gain a deep understanding of cyber threats and the strategic resilience needed to ensure organizational success in an evolving threat landscape. Graduates will emerge as highly skilled professionals, ready to enter the workforce immediately. They will possess strong competencies in data risk analysis, business intelligence implementation, security architecture design, regulatory compliance, and crisis management anticipation.

The MSc Financial Engineering is designed for students seeking to excel in quantitative finance and investment management. This program bridges mathematics, finance, and data science, equipping students with the skills to navigate the evolving global financial markets. The curriculum emphasizes practical applications through hands-on projects, real-time financial data analysis, and industry-standard tools such as Bloomberg. Combining theory with practice, the program fosters autonomy, analytical thinking, and problem-solving in a dynamic environment. Graduates are prepared for roles such as quantitative analyst, risk manager, algorithmic trader, financial engineer, portfolio manager, derivatives analyst, quantitative developer, financial data scientist, ESG analyst, investment specialist, and financial consultant.

This MSc is designed for those seeking to specialize in the aeronautical and aerospace sectors. The curriculum bridges the gap between design, development, and practical applications in a multidisciplinary context. Students will optimize aircraft and space systems by applying the latest methodologies in design, materials science, propulsion, and advanced systems modeling. The program incorporates hands-on projects, allowing students to work with state-of-the-art simulation tools, computational software, and laboratory equipment. This experiential learning approach immerses participants in real-world engineering challenges, fostering problem-solving skills, autonomy, and teamwork in a dynamic environment. Graduates are prepared for roles such as aerospace engineer, avionics engineer, spacecraft systems engineer, aerospace project manager, safety and regulatory compliance specialist, researcher or academic, and defense or military aerospace engineer.

The MSc Fintech & Digital Banking at ESILV, developed in collaboration with EMLV Business School, integrates business principles with engineering expertise to equip students for the rapidly evolving financial technology sector. This program bridges traditional finance and modern technological advancements, preparing graduates for careers in digital finance, blockchain, and financial innovation. The curriculum emphasizes practical skills, blending finance, technology, and regulatory knowledge. Students gain hands-on experience in blockchain, AI, big data, and cybersecurity while exploring the latest trends in digital banking and payment systems. The program’s learning approach focuses on real-world applications and regulatory considerations, fostering problem-solving, adaptability, and technological proficiency. Graduates pursue in-demand roles such as blockchain developers, AI and data analytics specialists, cybersecurity experts, UX/UI designers, and sustainable fintech innovators.

The MSc Computer Graphics & Game Engineering is tailored for students who aspire to lead in the fast-paced and evolving video game sector. Combining the technical strength of ESILV with the game development expertise of IIM Digital School, this program emphasizes advanced programming techniques, software development skills, and real-time problem-solving. The curriculum provides a comprehensive education in game engine development, tools programming, and the latest technologies, including AI, DevOps, and immersive experiences. The curriculum covers game engine development, tool creation, and the latest technologies used in video game programming, including AI, DevOps, and immersive experiences. Graduates take on positions such as game engine developer, tools programmer, artificial intelligence (AI) programmer, graphics programmer, DevOps engineer for game development, virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) developer, and freelance developer.

page_content.program: MSc in Healthcare Innovation & Data Science
page_content.program_description: This program provides comprehensive knowledge of healthcare systems, policies, and management practices. Students learn how to manage healthcare organizations effectively, including aspects such as strategic planning, operations, and quality improvement. Graduates are well-prepared for various roles, such as: medical affairs advisor, healthcare strategy & innovation consultant, data analyst, global market intelligence expert, and medical innovation project manager.

This MSc is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in the sports industry. It provides an international transdisciplinary approach applied to sport cases study. Students explore various aspects of sports management, including marketing, sponsorship, and event management. This includes financial management, strategic planning, and operations, with a focus on how these principles apply specifically to sports organizations. Graduates are well-prepared for various roles, such as: sports marketing manager, event manager, sports sponsorship manager, sports consultant and team manager.

This MSc is tailored for individuals aspiring to excel in the high-end luxury sector. It focuses on the unique aspects of managing and marketing luxury brands, combining business management skills with an understanding of luxury market dynamics. Students will gain a deep understanding of the behavior and preferences of high-net-worth individuals and luxury consumers. They will have the opportunities to pursue roles within the luxury sector, including: luxury brand manager, marketing manager for luxury brands, retail manager, product development manager and luxury consultant.

page_content.program: Master in Digital Marketing & Data Analytics
page_content.program_description: This MSc is designed to blend digital marketing expertise with advanced data science skills. This combination prepares students to effectively leverage data to drive marketing strategies and optimize digital campaigns. They will learn how to pilot a digital marketing strategy, plan, report and forecast with business analytics and automation, utilize programmatic skills to contribute to marketing challenges and identify new responsible opportunities in a data-driven environment.

page_content.program: MSc in Supply Chain & Operations Management
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Supply Chain & Operations Management is designed for students aspiring to work alongside top professionals in the field. It covers all aspects of supply chain management, including logistics, operations, inventory management, and the optimization of end-to-end processes. The program emphasizes the integration of digital and robotic technologies, equipping students with cutting-edge tools for effective supply chain and operations strategies. Additionally, it offers international exposure, including a seminar in Europe, to enhance students' expertise in a global context. Graduates are prepared for diverse careers, such as purchasing manager, supply chain management consultant, or business analyst, benefiting from emlyon's extensive network of renowned companies and a strong alumni community.

The MSc in Finance at emlyon business school is designed for individuals seeking to build a career in finance with a focus on analytical and strategic skills. The program offers a comprehensive education in financial management, investment analysis, and financial markets, equipping students for diverse roles in the financial sector. They will learn to analyze financial statements, assess investment opportunities, and manage financial risks. Graduates are prepared for careers in investment banking, consulting, financial structuring, asset management, wealth management, insurance, and risk management.

page_content.program: Master in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence Strategy
page_content.program_description: This MSc is a cutting-edge program that integrates data science and AI with strategic business management. It bridges the gap between business and engineering education in AI, equipping leaders with action-oriented approaches to mastering fundamental technological practices while understanding their human and business impacts. Students will develop expertise in data science techniques, AI technologies, and their business applications. Career opportunities include AI strategist, data scientist, machine learning engineer, business intelligence analyst, data governance consultant, AI consultant, tech project leader, and financial analyst.

The MSc in Strategy & Consulting at emlyon business school is a specialized program designed to prepare students for careers in strategic management and consulting. It focuses on developing the skills needed to analyze complex business problems, design effective strategies, and provide consulting services to organizations across various industries. Graduates of this program are well-prepared for various roles, including: strategy consultant, management consultant, business analyst, strategic planner and project manager.

The Bachelor in Finance program at ESLSCA is a comprehensive three-year course designed to equip students with the essential skills and knowledge for careers in various financial sectors. It is recognized by the French government with an RNCP title. The curriculum progresses over the years, allowing students to specialize in either corporate finance or market finance in their third year. Key courses include business fundamentals, accounting and law, financial management, mathematics, advanced statistics, an introduction to VBA coding, and management information systems (ERP, CRM, databases), as well as research methodology. Graduates can pursue roles such as financial analyst, treasurer, junior management controller, assistant administrative and financial manager, operations manager, and assistant risk analyst.

The Bachelor in Data Science program is a comprehensive three-year course designed to train developers proficient in data analysis who understand both the technical and operational challenges within a company. Students acquire a solid foundation in data science, big data, and artificial intelligence. They master the development and deployment of applications. The curriculum covers topics such as the fundamentals of software engineering, machine learning, virtual and mixed reality, banking and financial intermediation, and an introduction to IoT. This Bachelor's degree is recognized by the French State and holds an RNCP title. Graduates can pursue various roles, including junior data scientist, junior data analyst, designer-developer, and web developer.

The Bachelor in Banking and Insurance is a third-year program designed to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application in the banking and insurance sectors. This program equips students with a comprehensive understanding of commercial strategies within banking and insurance agencies, preparing them for immediate entry into the workforce or for further studies in MBA programs.
