The program covers key modules such as new economic models (CSR), financial markets and financial institutions, the general framework of banks and insurance companies, client portfolio development, management of insurance and financial contracts, and banking product offerings. Career paths available for graduates include agency collaborator, sales advisor, insurance advisor, business manager in banking and insurance, and client manager.

This program equips students with advanced financial expertise and prepares them for leadership roles in the financial sector. They gain a deep understanding of financial concepts and quantitative techniques, enabling them to analyze and interpret financial data. Additionally, in the second year, participants can choose a specialization based on their career aspirations. The common curriculum covers subjects such as financial management, advanced accounting, corporate law, econometrics, portfolio management, auditing of accounting and financial systems, Python programming, business intelligence, and international accounting standards (IFRS). Graduates often pursue careers as asset managers, traders, risk managers, quantitative analysts, data analysts, or financial engineers.

This MBA equips students with advanced skills in quantitative finance and data analysis. It responds to the evolving demands of the financial sector, emphasizing the integration of digital technologies and data science into financial practices. The curriculum focuses on three main areas: Mathematics, Finance, and Data Science. Students master data extraction tools (APIs) and acquire essential skills in Finance and Data Science to adapt to disruptions in the finance industry due to digitalization. They gain proficiency in processing large datasets and applying machine learning techniques. The courses include finance and quantitative engineering, quantitative risk management, fundamentals of big data, and digital finance. Graduates are prepared for roles such as asset manager, risk manager, quantitative analyst, credit analyst, data scientist, data analyst, and business intelligence manager.

The MBA in Business Engineering is a specialized program aimed at training managers in strategic planning and business development—key functions across digital enterprises, startups, and commercial organizations. Throughout the program, students learn to adapt products and services to market demands, evaluate business plans to align with company goals, and develop strategic frameworks that enhance forecasting and long-term stability. The curriculum covers essential areas such as corporate finance, sustainable development and corporate social responsibility (SD/CSR), sales strategy, international negotiation, and project management. Participants gain a comprehensive understanding of the entire sales cycle, from prospecting to customer retention, across diverse industries. Upon completion, graduates are equipped for various strategic and technical roles, including business engineer, technical sales engineer, business developer, key account engineer, project manager, and sales manager.

page_content.program: MBA Logistique et Management de la Supply Chain
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Logistics and Supply Chain Management, offered in partnership with CNAM (Conservatoire National des Arts et Métiers), is designed to equip students with the essential skills to master current techniques and technologies, while also fostering innovation in shaping the future of supply chains. Participants learn to develop industrial logistics strategies, manage supply chains and information systems, and analyze products to optimize costs and enhance customer satisfaction. The program includes company visits, infrastructure tours, participation in trade shows, and attendance at industry-specific conferences. The curriculum covers core areas such as business strategy, production processes, inventory management, international procurement, contract law, and negotiation. Graduates are well-prepared for a variety of roles, including supply chain project manager, production planner, operations manager, inventory manager, project buyer, and investment buyer.

he MBA in International Business Law provides comprehensive legal expertise tailored to the dynamic business environment. The program is structured to address evolving challenges in business and markets, such as financial crises, digitization, digital law, compliance, Fintech, and Blockchain. It aims to train exceptional jurists by providing both solid theoretical knowledge and the practical tools necessary to navigate these changes in accordance with current regulations. Students are actively involved in the program’s activities, enhancing their understanding of business and market issues and ensuring they are operationally ready in the short term. The curriculum includes subjects such as business law, intellectual property, contract practice, international trade, credit and bank guarantees, and CSR. In the second year, participants choose from two specializations. Career paths include in-house lawyer, specialist lawyer, KYC officer, editorial project manager, compliance officer, and risk analyst.

year_2.specialization: Droit des Affaires Internationales - Spécialisation Management et Finance
Droit des Affaires Internationales - Spécialisation Conformité et Gestion des Risques

page_content.program: MBA Management et Marketing du luxe
page_content.program_description: This MBA is tailored to provide students with a balanced education in luxury management and marketing concepts, personal development, and intellectual openness. The curriculum covers various aspects of luxury management, including digital transformation, business planning, brand management, qualitative and quantitative research, marketing, and customer relationship management (CRM). Students benefit from visits to workshops and luxury houses. Additionally, in the second year, they have the opportunity to enrich their studies with an international experience during the second semester through a partnership with Rome Business School. Graduates can pursue roles such as product manager, product owner, sales manager, marketing manager, digital manager, PR manager, gallery manager, entrepreneur, community manager, and CRM manager.

This program aims to develop ethical managers equipped with advanced technical and financial skills, emphasizing the importance of sustainability and technological advancements, such as blockchain, in the financial sector. It provides in-depth knowledge of financial institutions, products, and practices, with a focus on corporate financial decision-making in an international context. Students learn to evaluate investments, manage cash flow and risks, and understand capital-raising techniques in financial markets. In the second year, they can specialize by choosing from four specializations based on their aspirations. The curriculum highlights key areas such as corporate finance, business intelligence, econometrics applied to finance, portfolio management, accounting and financial auditing, and international financial reporting standards (IFRS). Graduates are prepared for careers as credit analysts, credit risk assistants, business managers, and foreign exchange treasurers.

This program is designed to train specialists in data analysis by combining theoretical knowledge with practical experience. The curriculum includes mathematics, IT development, project management, and soft skills, aiming to prepare experts for leadership roles in digital transformation, with a focus on Big Data, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. The courses cover the conception of Big Data and AI program architecture, the implementation and industrialization of data processing, and professional skills development. Career paths are open for roles such as data scientist, data analyst, consultant (particularly in fields related to technology, digital transformation, and project management), and developer.

The MBA in Trading – Financial Markets is a 12-month program that provides students with a strong understanding of global financial markets and trading techniques. It covers key topics such as foreign exchange, interest rates, stocks, commodities, and both traditional and complex financial products. Students also learn about hedge funds, risk management, and actuarial work. The program includes hands-on activities such as trading simulations, risk management exercises, and test challenges to help students prepare for real-world finance jobs. Graduates can pursue careers as traders, salespeople, fund managers, financial analysts, quantitative analysts, or financial risk managers.

page_content.program: MBA Gestion de patrimoine et Banque - Assurance
page_content.program_description: The MBA in Wealth Management, Banking, and Insurance at ESLSCA Business School Paris is designed for students interested in the banking sector and long-term client relationships. The program aims to provide students with comprehensive knowledge in banking management, real estate, insurance financing techniques, compliance, family law, customer relationship management, and essential management skills, while keeping them abreast of product and regulatory developments. Students will master the legal environment essential to business activities, understand the fundamentals of property, banking marketing, and big data, and learn to implement a wealth management strategy. Career opportunities include roles such as professional customer advisor, branch manager, insurance inspector, private banker, investment advisor, general insurance agent, and more.

page_content.program: MBA Droit des Affaires Internationales - Spécialisation Management et Finance
page_content.program_description: The MBA in International Business Law, with a specialization in Management and Finance, is specifically designed for legal students and professionals seeking to develop expertise in legal matters relevant to their industries. This program delivers a comprehensive understanding of market and business dynamics, offering a strategic advantage in today’s highly competitive environment, where legal and business spheres are increasingly interconnected. Participants acquire advanced knowledge in key areas of business law, along with a robust grasp of regulatory frameworks and financial practices. The curriculum equips graduates with the essential skills to support a company’s financial, accounting, tax, and social strategies. Upon completion, graduates are well-positioned to pursue diverse career opportunities, including roles such as corporate lawyer, KYC officer, regulatory monitoring officer, and editorial project manager.

page_content.program: MBA Droit des Affaires Internationales - Spécialisation Conformité et Gestion des Risques
page_content.program_description: This program is intended to equip students with comprehensive knowledge and expertise in business law, focusing on compliance and risk management. It prepares graduates for diverse roles in various organizations, both in France and internationally. Participants receive in-depth training in multiple areas of business law, ensuring up-to-date knowledge and expertise in regulatory requirements. They learn to adopt a cross-functional approach to the company, including risk prevention, post-risk management, image control, and liaising with administrative and judicial authorities. The curriculum covers topics such as financial law, international business law, digital law, project management, financial market compliance, and advanced corporate taxation. Positions open to graduates include risk analyst, compliance manager, and head of compliance and internal control.

he MSc in Purchasing & Supply Chain Management at ESLSCA is a highly specialized program designed to equip students with advanced expertise in the supply chain domain, complemented by broad managerial competencies. Delivered in partnership with ESC Clermont Business School, the program leads to a co-diploma and is accredited by the Conférence des Grandes Écoles (CGE). The curriculum prepares students to effectively address the evolving challenges of the sector, with a strong emphasis on innovation, responsibility, and professional excellence. Core modules include introduction to purchasing, international procurement regulations, negotiation strategies, supplier relationship management, cost and risk analysis, project management, and business intelligence. Graduates are well-positioned for a variety of roles, such as supply chain project manager, production planning coordinator, inventory manager, consultant, industrial buyer, and public sector procurement officer.

This MSc program trains students in project management, communication, and leadership. It is offered in partnership with ESC Clermont Business School and leads to a joint diploma. Students can also prepare for certifications from the Project Management Institute (PMI), as well as in Lean Management and Agile methods. The course includes hands-on projects guided by experienced professionals. Core modules cover topics such as project management principles, cost and resource management, quality and risk assessment, Lean Management fundamentals, project management software, and information systems for managerial decision-making. Graduates are well prepared to pursue careers as project managers, program leaders, product owners, Scrum Masters, entrepreneurs, or consultants.

The Bachelor in Sports Management at SMS is a three-year program designed to train future professionals in the sports industry. Through a combination of academic learning and practical case studies, students gain a solid understanding of the sports business environment. The curriculum focuses on developing key managerial skills and preparing students for entry-level positions in marketing, events, communication, sales, and other areas within the sports sector. Courses cover a wide range of topics, including sales techniques, sports history, national and international competitions, sports event management (planning, budgeting, evaluation), sports economics, branding and communication strategy, and social media marketing. Graduates are well-equipped to begin careers as sales managers, commercial agency managers, business unit managers, and more.

The BBA in Sports Management is a four-year program taught entirely in English. It is designed for students who want to build a career in the international sports industry. The program offers a global education, with opportunities to gain experience abroad and work with top industry partners. Students develop strong leadership, communication, and intercultural skills, as well as a deep understanding of sports management. After graduation, they can work as sports club managers, marketing managers, event coordinators, or consultants in the sports field.

This Master of Science is a comprehensive program designed to train future managers in the international sports business sector. It is offered in partnership with EDC Paris Business School and has been accredited by the Conférence des Grandes Écoles, highlighting its excellence in imparting knowledge and skills in the field of sports management. Participants delve into the fundamentals of sports management, drawing on practical case studies from industry-leading companies. The curriculum covers subjects such as corporate finance, business development, supply chain management, big data and knowledge management, digital marketing and analytics in sports business, sports event management, esports management, and sports product management. Career opportunities in the industry include roles such as marketing manager, commercial coordinator, business development manager, sponsorship manager, project manager, and event manager.

The MBA in Sports Management is designed to train future leaders in the sports industry, both in France and internationally. This program prepares students for the RNCP-recognized title of Sales and Marketing Manager. Through a practical and strategic approach, students develop key competencies in sales, marketing, and management tailored to the sports sector. The curriculum covers essential areas such as sports event organization, the sports equipment market, sponsorship strategies, international sports marketing, and legal aspects of sports and contracts. Graduates are equipped to take on management roles within sports organizations, agencies, and companies, with career opportunities including sales and marketing manager, key account manager, business sales engineer, and customer director.

This MBA is designed to equip students with the skills necessary for careers in the evolving field of sports media and communication. It provides a comprehensive, strategic, and operational understanding of sports media. Students will develop the expertise to design, manage, and produce sports media content, while gaining a deep understanding of the media and digital landscape in the sports industry, including legal and technical aspects. The curriculum focuses on marketing strategy and activation, the sports equipment market, sponsorship approaches, brand creation strategies in sports, commentary preparation, live written commentary, media knowledge, and sports rights. Graduates are prepared for various roles, including communication director, digital marketing manager, social media specialist, digital strategy consultant, content manager, and marketing data analyst.

The MBA in Sports Events is designed for individuals aspiring to become professionals in the sports event industry. It equips students with the essential skills to plan, organize, and manage sports events effectively. The program covers key topics such as event organization and management, sponsorship, licensing and merchandising, communication and media coverage, project management, as well as event administration and legal aspects. Upon graduation, career paths may include positions such as event and hospitality manager, event coordinator, site manager, technical director, logistics manager, project manager, and media coordinator.

The MBA in Sports Marketing and Digital is designed to equip students with the expertise required to become professionals in the field of marketing. Participants gain proficiency in managing marketing projects, from identifying the initial problem to implementing the strategy. The curriculum includes topics such as the digital transformation of the sports industry, marketing strategies in sports business, communication and media coverage of sports events, public relations, community management, and more. The program is certified by the RNCP and delivered in French. Graduates are prepared for roles such as digital marketing manager, sports marketing manager, sales manager, sponsorship manager, sports marketing project manager, and other related positions.

This MBA program is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the rapidly growing sports product market. It offers a comprehensive understanding of both the strategic and operational aspects of commercial management in sports. Students are prepared to become entrepreneurs in the sports industry, mastering the sales cycle and tackling the challenges faced by distributors. The program includes essential courses in sports marketing, the economic and legal environment of sports, accounting, entrepreneurship, and project management. Advanced topics focus on international trade, commercial production management, legal and tax issues in sports organizations, partnership negotiations, and business strategy in sports. Graduates are well-equipped to pursue exciting careers as sales promoters, product managers, customer advisors, marketing directors, and purchasing managers.
test
test

The Mastère Spécialisé Data Protection Management trains professionals (DPOs, CPOs, legal and cybersecurity experts) in data protection, legal compliance, and AI governance.
It focuses on mastering GDPR and AI regulations, developing compliance programs, crisis management, and fostering a strong data protection culture.
The program includes a professional thesis, real business case work (like the DPO Clinic), and international conferences.
It targets students and professionals with Bac+5 or Bac+4 + 3 years of experience, offering a Bac+6 degree accredited by the CGE and RNCP level 7.

The MSc in Business Development & Business Engineering is a highly specialized program aimed at students looking to excel in both business development and engineering aspects. It equips them with the necessary skills to innovate and lead in various sectors by blending business management with technical and engineering knowledge. The courses include project management, digital transformation, commercial contract law & business taxation, marketing B to B, and entrepreneurship. Students learn to handle various technical aspects of business, from digital tools to complex data management systems, which are increasingly crucial in modern business environments. They are prepared for positions like business development manager, sales manager, area manager, and sales director.

This MSc aims to train students to become transformative leaders in the evolving financial landscape. The curriculum combines core principles of management with expertise in financial risk and markets. Participants gain the skills to drive change and navigate complex global challenges. They explore courses such as mergers and acquisitions (M&A), regulatory compliance, asset price dynamics, political and market risk management, financial stability, financial modeling, and quantitative analysis. Graduates are well-positioned for diverse career paths in fintech innovation, risk management, M&A advisory, financial stability analysis, innovation consulting, and entrepreneurial ventures.

The Bachelor in Media, Culture & Communication at BSB is a three-year program designed to equip students with comprehensive skills in management, the cultural and media sectors, and communication strategies. Students study fundamental principles of marketing, finance, and management as they apply to these fields. From the outset, they engage in real projects, allowing them to apply their skills in professional contexts. The program offers graduates diverse career opportunities, including business developer, business manager, communications officer, marketing project manager, export assistant, procurement analyst, export zone manager, buyer, marketing assistant, community manager, and assistant product manager.

The Master in Management is designed to provide students with a comprehensive education in management and business administration. It is highly regarded in France and internationally, known for its rigorous academic standards and a strong emphasis on research-driven teaching. Students can choose from a wide range of specializations in areas such as finance, marketing, international business, and more. This allows them to tailor their education to their career goals. They are well-prepared for leadership roles in various sectors, including finance, consulting, marketing, and international trade.

year_2.specialization: Supply chain management et achat international

page_content.program_description: This MSc is designed for students seeking to enhance their expertise in global business strategies and management. It provides comprehensive training in business challenges, focusing on strategy, management, and innovation. The curriculum includes key modules such as global supply chain and risk management, international business law, international negotiation and sales, international project management, sustainable business development, and corporate governance. Additionally, it emphasizes the development of soft skills, including leadership, agility, creativity, and teamwork. Graduates are prepared for various roles in management and international business development, such as business analyst, business consultant, trade and customs manager, import and export compliance specialist, supply chain manager, and global business strategist.

page_content.program: MSc Sustainable Strategy Management and Environmental Change
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Sustainable Strategy Management and Environmental Change prepares students for strategic roles focused on sustainability and corporate responsibility. It equips them with the skills to drive long-term ecological transitions and develop sustainable business models. The curriculum covers topics such as the sociology of global development and sustainability, corporate social and environmental responsibility, sustainable management, ESG performance measurement, sustainable entrepreneurship, and green product design. Graduates can pursue various roles, including CSR project manager, CSR communication manager, ecological transition manager, sustainable product manager, and sustainable entrepreneur.

The MBA in Wine & Spirits Business program is designed for professionals passionate about the wine and spirits industry. The curriculum includes courses in viticulture, oenology, sensory analysis, and global wines and spirits. It also covers topics such as the economic environment, company strategy, wine marketing, and finance. Additionally, students explore international legal issues related to the industry. Graduates can pursue mid-level positions in general management, export, marketing, sales, communication, purchasing, and finance.

This specialized postgraduate degree is designed for individuals seeking to develop advanced skills in managing business units within organizations. Typically spanning one year, it focuses on strategic management, operational efficiency, and leadership in a business context. The curriculum integrates advanced management theory with practical applications to prepare graduates for high-level roles. Career paths include deputy director, commercial manager, city center manager, franchise facilitator, store performance manager, and network, agency, or business unit manager.

The Bachelor in Liberal Arts with a specialization in International Relations is a new interdisciplinary program offered in partnership with Siena College. The first two years are taught in Lyon, and the third year takes place at Siena College in Albany, the capital of New York State. The program focuses on International Relations, addressing key global challenges and political issues while providing students with a comprehensive education in the social sciences. The curriculum includes courses in business computer applications, microeconomics, macroeconomics, communication, academic methodology, political theory, international law, and diplomacy. Students gain an understanding of the European Union and the legal environment of international business. Graduates can pursue careers in marketing and communications, education and academia, nonprofit and social work, business and management, creative arts and media, and technology.

This master's degree prepares students to become professionals in interior architecture and design. It offers specialization in interior architecture and global design, focusing on sustainable design, scenography, landscape, and urban space, among other fields. The curriculum takes a transversal approach with a holistic vision of projects, covering space design, product and packaging design, brand visual identity, digital interfaces, and points of sale. By the end of the program, students will be equipped to fulfill a client’s request for a global design project, meaning they will be able to conceptualize and oversee the production of an interior architecture and/or design project. Graduates can pursue careers as interior architects, interior decorators, scenographers, global designers, creative directors, or art directors.

page_content.program: Mastère spécialisé® (MS) Manager des Risques et de la Transition Écologique
page_content.program_description: This program offers a comprehensive curriculum that integrates risk management methodologies with ecological transition principles. Students take courses in strategic management, environmental risks, and sustainable development practices. The program enables participants to develop specialized expertise in a rapidly growing field while leveraging their prior knowledge and professional experience. Graduates can pursue roles such as environmental and risk management manager, ecological transition and territorial resilience consultant, CSR manager, responsible procurement officer, environmental project manager, environmental research officer, waste and pollution management expert, and more.

The master's cycle of the Programme Grande École at ICARD Business School is a prestigious degree designed to enhance students' professional competencies and international exposure. The program spans over two years, each with distinct objectives and learning opportunities. Additionally, participants have opportunities to study abroad and participate in internships in global markets, helping them develop a multicultural perspective—an essential asset in today’s business world.

The master's cycle of the Programme Grande École at EMLV Business School is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in the global business environment. The curriculum offers various specializations, allowing participants to tailor their expertise in fields such as purchasing and supply chain management, audit and performance management, corporate finance, digital marketing and data analytics, and more. It also balances technical knowledge with the development of soft skills, equipping students to collaborate effectively in hybrid and transversal professional environments.

year_1.specialization: Management des systèmes d’information et des data
Digital Marketing & Data Analytics x IIM Digital School

page_content.program: MSc Digital Marketing and Artificial Intelligence
page_content.program_description: The MSc Digital Marketing and Artificial Intelligence aims to provide students with practical, technical, and advanced skills in three key domains: AI fundamentals, transformative applications in Digital Marketing, and Project Management. Students learn to digitalize business processes, improve online communication, master UI/UX design, manage social networks, analyse marketing data, and automate processes.

page_content.program: Bachelor in Management and Engineering Sciences
page_content.program_description: This Bachelor aims to train multi-skilled people to manage technological projects and it combines management principles with engineering sciences, preparing students for diverse careers at the intersection of business and technology. The curriculum covers essential topics in management, finance, marketing, and engineering. Students learn to apply technical skills in business contexts, focusing on problem-solving and strategic thinking.

This two-year master's degree is offered jointly by MBS and ESMA, ranked as the world’s No. 1 school for excellence in 3D animation production. The curriculum combines strong management expertise with a deep understanding of artistic professions, preparing students to tackle the challenges of the creative industries. They will develop essential skills to master project management and managerial competencies critical to successful productions, oversee budgets and business aspects of creative projects in real-world conditions, understand development and production techniques for audiovisual works, animated films, video games, and visual effects, and analyze the impact of technological innovations—such as artificial intelligence—on the entertainment industry. Graduates can pursue various international roles such as executive producer, line producer, creative producer, production/post-production director, and production manager.

The Bachelor Tech for Management is a three-year program offered in partnership with ESIEA, a prestigious engineering school founded in 1958 and renowned for its expertise in computer and digital sciences. The program is designed to equip students with the skills needed to manage technological projects, analyze data, and develop secure, innovative solutions to meet the challenges of tomorrow, such as digital transformation and automation. The curriculum combines management and technology, covering subjects like programming, data science, cybersecurity, marketing, project management, and finance. In the third year, students choose one of three specialization tracks based on their professional goals. Graduates can pursue diverse career paths, including roles such as project manager, pre-sales assistant, product owner, business analysis consultant, solution manager, or assistant information systems security manager.

The master’s cycle of the Programme Grande École allows students to focus on specific areas of business. They can choose from specializations such as Marketing and Sales Strategy, Finance, Audit and Control, International Management, and more. In the final year, participants have the option to further specialize and pursue double degrees with partner institutions in countries such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Spain, and others. The program aims to develop cultural awareness and prepare students for the international business environment. It also includes practical experience through internships and work placements, offering roles in sales, startups, and other positions related to the chosen specialization.

year_1.specialization: Entrepreneuriat et management de la TPE/PME
Management et Ingénierie Culturelle x ICP Paris

year_2.specialization: Entrepreneuriat et management de la TPE/PME
Management et Ingénierie Culturelle x ICP

page_content.program_description: The MSc Digital Entrepreneur & Project Management program trains future entrepreneurs and project managers for the digital economy. This 100% online course equips students with the tools to start their own business or lead innovation projects within existing companies. It focuses on identifying, evaluating, and managing business opportunities in a digital context. The curriculum includes project management, business ethics and CSR, research methods, strategic management, digital economy, e-entrepreneurship, and business analysis. Students gain hands-on experience through either a long-term internship or a work-study option. Graduates can pursue careers such as Chief Transformation Officer (CTO), Chief Digital Officer (CDO), Digital Transformation Officer (DTO), strategy consultant, business unit manager, or digital/web project manager.

This MSc is a fully online program designed to train future digital marketing professionals with a strong foundation in data analysis and an understanding of the ethical issues related to data use. It is accredited by the Conférence des Grandes Écoles and leads to Ascencia's Artificial Intelligence Project Manager certification, registered with the RNCP. The curriculum focuses on the analysis of a company's global strategy at the level of an operational unit and the management of digital transformation. It covers core areas such as programming in Python, CRM and marketing, machine learning, text data extraction and management, databases and big data, and business intelligence. Graduates often work as digital project managers, traffic managers, media traders, web and data analysts, marketing data consultants, key account managers, brand managers, and product managers.

The MSc Manager of Digital Transformation program is designed to equip students with the skills necessary to lead digital transformation initiatives across various sectors. The program is available in both French and English, providing flexibility for international students. It covers CRM and marketing, web marketing and digital enterprise, project management, the digital economy, and innovation management. Students have the opportunity to engage in work-study programs or long-term internships with companies. Graduates are prepared for roles such as digital transformation manager, web strategy and communication director, business unit manager, digital entrepreneur, digital project manager, and web business developer.

page_content.program: MSc in Digital Marketing & Artificial Intelligence
page_content.program_description: The MSc in Digital Marketing & Artificial Intelligence equips students with in-depth knowledge of digital marketing while teaching them how to apply cutting-edge AI tools to address current and future business challenges. The program includes a well-rounded curriculum with courses in marketing communication, media and community management, digital marketing, AI basics, data science, and AI-driven SEO. Participants also complete a 4- to 6-month internship and a Master’s thesis. With a diverse international student body, the program offers a dynamic, multicultural learning environment. Students work in global teams on real-world projects, gaining hands-on experience. Graduates are prepared for advanced roles in marketing, sales, and international business, such as product manager, social media manager, international marketing manager, or export manager.

The MBA in International Business Development at IPAG Business School is a specialized international degree in Business Administration (Master of Business Administration), designed for managers who wish to work in an international environment and within companies expanding into foreign markets. Students will acquire all the necessary skills to understand international business. The courses cover new market development, key international business decisions, global financial markets, trade negotiation, and the legal and regulatory frameworks of international trade. They will gain an understanding of both regional and global market specificities and will master the principles and rules of international trade. Graduates can pursue various roles, including international business developer, international franchise developer, international expansion manager, international account manager, and market development consultant.

year_1.specialization: Dual degree MBA x MSc in Digital Entrepreneur & Project Management

page_content.program_description: dpejcwep'jcxwjcw

The International Pre-Master program at NEOMA Business School is designed to provide a pathway to a Master of Science (MSc) for graduates with a three-year higher education qualification. The program, taught on the Rouen campus, offers a strong academic foundation, helping students from diverse backgrounds develop key business competencies. It also enhances intercultural skills by focusing on cross-cultural communication and management in an international context. Upon successful completion, students can progress directly to the second year to earn their MSc degree.

The MBA in Finance & Investments at IPAG Business School is designed to prepare professionals for the dynamic world of global finance. This program emphasizes advanced quantitative methods in wealth and investment management, incorporating elements such as artificial intelligence, risk management in global financial markets, and the integration of sustainability challenges in corporate finance. Students will master investment management tools, including the main drivers of machine learning applications, and gain knowledge of global and local regulations. The curriculum focuses on developing financing projects for sustainable investments, covering models such as Wealth Management and Investment Management. After the first 12 months of the MBA, participants also have the opportunity to earn a dual degree by joining the Online MSc in Digital Entrepreneurship & Project Management to acquire additional digital skills. Graduates can pursue various roles, including financial manager, corporate financial strategist, wealth manager, portfolio manager, investment adviser, and more.

year_1.specialization: Dual degree MBA x MSc in Digital Entrepreneur & Project Management

page_content.program_description: The MBA in Digital Strategy, Design & Transformation prepares students to become leaders in digital innovation. Participants acquire the skills to manage digital transformation, develop new business models, and implement comprehensive digital strategies. The curriculum includes web marketing, digital communication, and project management, alongside an in-depth understanding of digital technology’s impact across various industries. Upon completion of the first year, students may opt to pursue a dual degree by enrolling in the Online MSc in Digital Entrepreneurship & Project Management to further enhance their digital expertise. Graduates are well-positioned for careers as digital transformation consultants, chief digital officers, innovation consultants, innovation managers, and related roles.

year_1.specialization: Dual degree MBA x MSc in Digital Entrepreneur & Project Management

page_content.program_description: The MBA in Energy & Sustainability Transformation provides students with comprehensive knowledge and hands-on skills in sustainable development, renewable energy, and corporate social responsibility (CSR). The program emphasizes the integration of sustainability into business strategy, covering areas such as the development of sustainable business models, interpretation of international policies and legal frameworks, management of sustainability projects, financing of sustainable initiatives, and expertise in closed-loop supply chain concepts. Graduates are well-equipped for roles such as chief sustainability officer, CSR specialist, lead sustainability specialist, and CSR consultant.

year_1.specialization: Dual degree MBA x MSc in Digital Entrepreneur & Project Management

page_content.program: Bachelor SIN Sciences Informatiques et Numériques
page_content.program_description: The Bachelor in Computer Science and Digital Sciences is a comprehensive three-year program designed to equip students with essential technical and analytical skills. In the third year, students can choose to specialize in areas such as SysOps or Artificial Intelligence (AI). The curriculum is structured to prepare graduates to thrive in the evolving world of computing by mastering advanced technologies, understanding the challenges of digital transformation, and developing innovative applications. In addition to technical expertise, students receive in-depth training in data management and digital project management, ensuring a well-rounded professional profile. Graduates are well-prepared to adapt to rapid technological advancements and meet the evolving demands of the IT job market. Career opportunities include roles such as web or mobile developer, cybersecurity expert, data scientist, cloud architect, IT project manager, and product owner, among others.

This program is designed to equip students with the skills needed to manage and optimize IT systems, ensuring their efficiency and reliability. The first two years focus on building a strong foundation in software development and computer science. In the third year, students specialize in SysOps, gaining expertise in administering and optimizing infrastructure solutions tailored to application requirements. They also learn to test and deploy hardware resources to improve system performance. The curriculum incorporates hands-on projects, real-world scenarios, workshops, and practical exercises. Graduates are prepared for roles such as systems and network administrators, infrastructure administrators, cloud administrators, IT security administrators, database administrators, and network managers.

This Bachelor’s program is designed to equip students with the skills necessary to develop and implement innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions. Participants learn to build both the back-end and front-end of AI applications, seamlessly integrating AI components. They are expected to master big data techniques, including analysis, utilization, and data visualization. The curriculum covers modules such as DevOps and agile methodologies, communication and project management, data science workflows, machine learning, and data exploitation. Graduates often pursue careers as business intelligence developers, Python developers, data developers, AI application developers, project managers, lead data developers, and similar roles.

The Bachelor in AI and Data Science is designed for students eager to address the challenges of artificial intelligence. The program equips them with the skills to design, develop, and deploy innovative AI solutions to solve complex real-world problems. Students will also learn to lead AI-driven projects, develop business applications, and build advanced digital infrastructures. The curriculum covers a wide range of topics, including front-end web development, database design, web application frameworks, mobile design and user experience, agile methodologies, and DevOps through Scrum workshops. Graduates will be well-prepared for roles such as Business Intelligence Developer, Python Developer, Data Analyst, AI Application Developer, and Development Project Manager.

Le MS IAI est une formation Bac+6 accréditée par la Conférence des Grandes Écoles, conçue pour former des experts du développement commercial à l’international. Sur 12 mois à temps partiel, ce programme aborde la gestion de projet, la négociation, le marketing et la maîtrise des risques. Les diplômés accèdent à des postes variés : ingénieur d’affaires, business developer, chef de projet ou consultant. Le programme affiche un excellent taux d’insertion professionnelle (98 %).

Le MSc International Business est un programme 100 % en anglais, conçu pour former des managers internationaux capables d'intégrer les enjeux technologiques dans leur réflexion stratégique. Reconnu comme Diplôme National de Master, il dure 1 ou 2 ans selon le profil, avec un semestre de professionnalisation. Il prépare à des postes à responsabilités dans la gestion, le marketing, la finance ou les systèmes d’information. Le programme met l’accent sur la transformation numérique et l’internationalisation des entreprises. Il est enregistré au RNCP (titre n°35910).
